The house is very clean and cozy which is the same with photo advised host is also helpful and nice even drive us to the subway station Just a bit far from central so will take some time if u want to go shopping to Ginza or shibuya or other places but also within one hour The infomation guide from host got everything needed also there is a direct train from the house to Haneda airport very convenientbrI will definately recommend this place if u want to experience the local life style here with your family

在这里住了四晚非常难忘的经历房子所在的位置非常安静是远离闹市和喧嚣的居民区距离最近的地铁站步行5分钟房子周围也有不少超市好吃的居酒屋和东西齐全的药妆店br房子是装修和设计很精致的二层小楼一楼是床二楼是榻榻米住着非常舒服惬意我们也很享受厨房和小饭厅每天晚上在超市买点食材自己开火做吃的非常安逸步行十分钟的另一个地铁站旁边有大超市能买到很棒的生牛肉回来自己煎牛排的体验简直太棒了br谢谢接送我们和每天嘘寒问暖的小哥朴实热情心细下次如果是多人出行东京很大概率还会选择这里

great

KarunbrThis has to be one of the best experience Ive had staying with Air BnB The house is very clean and organized There are English labels to indicate instructions every where in the house This makes it very easy to navigate MrT is a fantastic host He always check in on us daily to see if we need anything His apple juice is delicious brI mixed it with Sake brId recommend this place to anyone if you come to Tokyo  its a must  brNicolebrThis has to be the best experience I have had when using Airbnb Our host Mr T was very attentive to our needs and engaging while visiting us in the mornings He would ask about our plans for the day and help out how to get there There was an booking mistake that we lost a day but he arranged for us to stay an extra day at the Airbnb I really enjoyed his company when we went out to eat dinner with him fed us the best of the best in the local area while drinking some sake Definitely recommend him for bookingbrMichaelbrCant really think of what else I would want The host Mr T brought us drinks and fresh towels and also showed us the best local restaurant and its secret menu The house was quiet clean and close to the train station

Apartment was cosy but beautiful Absolutely spotlessly clean and in a great outoftheway area with easy train access and plenty to do locally Bedrooms lovely and stylish although it could do with some curtains in the downstairs bedroom brIts not right in central Tokyo but trust me thats a good thing Access to the city is super quick and easy if you use Google Maps and get a Pasmo card brHosts were exceptional and went above and beyond our expectations It was halfway between an Airbnb and a hotel with fresh towels being brought round every day brMr T even came round on our second day to say hello and give us some delicious apple juice There was also great tea and coffee in the house brThe apartment had both unlimited WiFi with decent speeds and a separate pocket WiFi which you can take around the city with you which is amazing Has a 7GB limit presumably per month We used about 05GB over our four nights brNo train noise inside the apartment whatsoever even though its fairly close to a trackbrNo traffic although the occasional moped going past at various times and single glazing means you can hear passers by although its not problematicbrVending machine right outside with hot and cold coffees so great in the morning if youre the one who got up latebrGreat info provided by the hosts and when Mr T dropped round he gave us a handy map of stuff to do in the local area brOn checkout Mr T turned up and insisted on giving us a lift to the station which was really nice of him brOh it has two toilets which was great and the shower is extremely nice brIf youre looking for a residential area Airbnb then I would absolutely recommended this one It was a really really enjoyable first experience of Japan for us
Highly recommend this property to all the travelers

You will not regret to spend your time in Tokyo and rest in Pine House that will giving you Japanese semi modern style The Host MrT is very humble and very kind He pick up us on station and giving fresh apple juice as welcome drink and give recommendation about food nice place on nearest place arround house I can promise you that you will spend good time if you stay in Pine House

My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Pine House   The place was exactly as advertised clean and easy to find thanks to the very thorough directions from the hosts  Hosts were exceedingly gracious and accommodating  We recommend
Great location  hospitality Would certaiinly book again when next time in Tokyo
The town is very quaint Mr T picked us up and dropped us off at the station which really is a help when you have luggage I would 100 stay again Access to Tokyo is easy once you know the station names

The Pine House is a great accommodation Very roomy for Japan The location is very close to the train station and local places to eat It is in a very quiet neighborhood which is great for getting a good nights sleep Both rooms are very spacious and it is great to have 2 toilets The only thing that was amiss is the fact that the house internet was not working due to a previous guest that used a illegal download service This cancelled the internet service for the room as the Japanese take illegal downloading very serious It will also cost you a 1000 usd fine I am happy there was also a pocket wifi to use which we did use and everything was fine
Super clean and incredibly quiet in a neighborhood approx 30 minutes into the center of Tokyo with a close train station Very helpful host

If you want to discover Tokyo in couple in family or with friends you are in the right place  The house is perfect with space and perfectly clean Its also decorated in a japanese way which is really nice for us Last but not least the host have offered us a quality of service that Ive never seen in a Air b and B Arigato

The hosts were friendly and accommodatingthey communicated well with us  They offered to pick us up and drop us off and their instructions were very clear and helpful  The neighbourhood was pleasant and very quiet

Koji y su familia son fantásticos Nos han tratado súper bien hablan castellano se ofrecieron para recogernos y llevarnos a la estación la verdad que nos hemos sentido muy a gusto La casa además esta lo bastante cerca del centro de Tokyo en metro y lo suficientemente lejos como para hacer vida de barrio Una visita de 10

Pine House is a great little hideaway in the back streets of Tateishi We were chauffeured from Aoto station by Mr T and transported to Pine House The neighbourhood around the station is quiet but well serviced by traditional restaurants and bars and a nice change from the chaos of the tourist spots of Tokyo The house can easily accommodate up to four people and is well serviced and has pretty much everything you need for a night in or a breakfast before heading out There is a terrific supermarket under Aoto station Highly recommended
The first of our airbnbs for this apac trip and we were extremely pleased with this selection They set the bar high and some of the others we stayed at didnt measure up KN were super fantastic hosts

K  Ns place is awesome Highly recommended as it is very close to the train station and amenities brThe host cleaned up the place everyday while we were out and warm bed lights were always welcoming us when we come back at night It is truly a home away from home brAlso the free pick up service  Aoto Station has made our trip to and from the airport much easier brThank you so much for the thoughfulness Will certainly come back in our future visit to Tokyo

This was the perfect place for our family of four Mr T met us at the train station and drove us to the apartment which was so wonderful after the long flight The apartment is in a safe lovely neighborhood that is right near the river I enjoyed running on the river walk and doing yoga in the park in the mornings It is only a 35 min walk from the train station It was easy to get around brThere are 4 beds Two bedrooms Very comfortable and plenty of room Two great bathrooms and one shower All modern and sparkling I also appreciated the washer and dryer They worked even faster than the US machines which is not a surprise as all technology here is just simply better brThe kitchen has everything you need It was stocked with tea and coffee And KN brought nice gifts both when we arrived and when we left brI would definitely recommend

An outstanding place to stay Starting off with arriving at the station to avoid any transfers the host offered us a ride from the local train station to the Airbnb where we were personally checkedin We loved meeting our hosts and Mr T who were all very friendly and helpful throughout our stay which included exchanging towels taking out our garbage and addressing any of our concerns They provided very clear instructions directions and local recommendations that our family enjoyed during our visit A very clean house with a traditional feel and the neighborhood was very quiet The location was also conveniently nearby convenience stores and the train station less than a 5 min walk To Tokyo Ginza Tsukiji Market and Tokyo DisneylandSea the train ride was about or within 45 minutes as many lines brought us directly to our locations Great service location and place we hope to visit Tokyo and stay here again

Nice little home The cleanliness was second to none Located in a quiet neighborhood and a conveniently short walk to the metro Mr Ts hospitality made our stay feel welcoming He would show up every day only to drop off fresh towels and make sure the toiletries are stocked and trash bagsrecycling are empty Would stay again and highly recommend this to anyone

We stayed a week in K  Ns place and loved it Cozy convenient and peaceful K  N are great hosts who helped with getting us to and from the train station offered helpful suggestions on traveling around Tokyo and were always available for questions We loved staying at the Pine House

Very quiet neighborhood many shops and near stations They clean the house everyday and change the towels Its so refreshing we love coming home to a clean place Id recommend this place to anyone traveling to Tokyo

The Tateishi station is very near to the accommodation and there are some nice shops and  restaurants next to the station Very convenient location and very nice place to stay in Tokyo The host will change towels and the dustbin every day Kawano San is very helpful and I felt very warmly welcomed Thank you very much
Great place away from the main city Stayed here with my wife and two boys Fantastic local tips and very close to the supermarket combini and station

We had a great time in Tokyo The place was perfect for 4 people Everything you need for a few days is there and the place was very clean High speed internet in the appartment portable WiFi hotspot to take with you clean up and new towels everyday 5 stars for thatbrThe area has enough food shops and small restaurants but is very quiet at night It is only a few minutes walk to the Kesei Tateishi station which gives access to most areas in Tokyo in 1535 minutes Our host gives great service He picked us up at the Aoto station by car which is accessible by a direct train from Narita airportbrI highly recommended this place for anyone who wants to explore Tokyo

We had an amazing stay in Pine House The place was very neat and the service was very well We really appreciated the transfer from and to Aoto Station The location was a bit out of the city but it was a nice experience to stay in a local neighborhood far away from Tokyos craziness And besides that trains run very often so access to the city is not that bad

The appartement is just as described Very well equipped the wodden design looks luxurious but still cosy  everything is very clean The surrounding is charming and quiet but still close to lots of sightseeing spots Perfect place to relax after a day in Tokyo
Very good

Was a great place to stay while visiting Tokyo It is a 2545 min from most places in the heart of the city but it was nice to come back to a super quiet and real neighborhood  Slept great and very nice place Just a few min walk from the train to go anywhere you needed and lots of restaurants and grocery stores within 5 min walk from the house They picked us up and dropped us off from station with our bags so was super nice and no work

We had a great stay The host was lovely and spoke good English Everything was smooth and easy New towels each day The place is nice This is well positioned just next to the station and easy to access We loved this place it is easy to go in and out of centre  We had 4 days so the place was perfect And we loved having our own place and something bigger If you have only one day I would suggest staying more central as you do spend some time travelling into the center It was not an issue for us as it was easy and we found it was nice to discover a real neighbourhood First night we went into a small restaurant and spend the evening laughing with some locals don t get that anywhere else I definitely recommend if you are staying 4 days like us for one day only stay more central

Highly recommend this place Very thoughtful host We had a very comfortable stay

The house is lovely very clean comfortable great for a family The host Mr T is very helpful and welcoming he communicates straightaway  The house is in a quiet town but with easy access to Tokyo and the airports The town has a lot of great restaurants bars supermarkets and family marts Highly recommended

The town has a certain nostalgic touch walking distance to the station market restaurants and SEGA arcade Also walking distance to the waterfront where you can walk around the river The house is comfortable and clean it is being cleaned and towels are changed everyday

I cannot recommend or rate KNs place highly enough They were incredible hosts and extremely hospitable throughout our entire trip Mr T picked us up from the train station and presented us with a delicious bottle of apple juice that we consumed instantly The home was cleaned and towels replaced daily The neighborhood is lovely and quaint with lots of restaurants and convenient stores and grocery stores Everything you could possibly need is within a 10 minute walk Central Tokyo is easily a 4560 minute train ride away but it was so nice to come back to a quiet neighborhood after a long and exhausting day in the city Please consider staying here if you want to experience local charm and easy access to the rest of the city
Excellent professional and efficient hosts Great area  out of the craziness of Tokyo House was clean well looked after and all needs provided for

This was the most hospitable Airbnb experience Ive ever had The host offered transportation to the Airbnb upon arrival as well as to the station on check out We ended up arriving quite a bit before our check in time but they were so accommodating and allowed us to hang out while they finished cleaning brThe house was spacious and super clean and even though we were only there for a few days the host came by daily to take out trash and change out the used towels Unfortunately we were here during the supertyphoon Hagibis but the host came by the day of in the pouring rain to check all the windows change out towels and bring us extra water brAlthough the location is a little ways outside of the main city it was nice to stay in a quiet neighborhood with the city still being very accessible Would definitely recommend

Mister T came to pick up and drop off us at the station tins really noce from him We have had an Apple juice it was really good There are two bedrooms you can choose wich one you want a normal bed or a futon The area is really quiet you have a station at 5mins and a supermarket just on feint of the station brReally good place to be when you come in Tokyo

K  Ns place was great for our family of 4 It was close to Sky Tree and has awesome supermarkets and restaurants nearby Its just 5 mins walk to Tateishi station but far enough away not the hear the warning bells from the crossing when trains approach We did find that many of our trains trips to see the attractions we wanted to go to took us the the western side of Toyko so with four people the train fares were around 4000 yen per day which you should factor in Cannot fault the house itself though Perfect hosts and a really nice property

The Pine House is a cozy stay with a great location Close enough to main Tokyo but far enough that youre sleeping peacefully  very easy access to public transport The owners are very lovely and accommodating and the train station transfer with our bags were much appreciated The pocket wifi was also a great help  we recommend bringing a portable charger to charge it if youre doing a big day trip so you can use it to help you find your way home All in all my two friends and I had a fantastic stay here and recommend the Pine House to anyone wanting to see what Japan has to offer Thanks again K and N

I had a great time in Tokyo The place was perfect for what I was wanting  Everything you might need for a comfortable stay  is there and the place was very clean  Highspeed internet in the apartment and a portable WiFi hotspot to take with you when you go out sightseeing the cleanliness and new towels got to give 5 stars for thatbrThe area has a lot of food shops convenience stores and small restaurants and bars but is also very quiet at night   The building is only a few minutes walk to the KeseiTateishi Station which gives access to most areas in Tokyo in 1535 minutes The host gives great personal service He picked me up at Aoto station by car  Aoto Station was accessible by a direct train from Narita airport so there was no need to change trains  That was a big reliefbrI highly recommended this place for anyone looking for a clean comfortable stay in Tokyo

The rooms were clean and comfortable and the apartment provided for all of the daily necessities microwave shower washing machine etc I had no trouble finding the place and Koji even picked me up at Aoto station when I arrived and provided me with directions to the local station and then directions from the house to the station It was a very easy neighborhood to navigate I really enjoyed my stay Koji was a gracious host and introduced me to a great local ramen restaurant where I think we had some of the best ramen in my life The area around Tateishi Station has a completely different feel from central Tokyo and I really enjoyed staying in this quiet historical neighborhood It was nice I could get away from the noise of the city and rest after a long day of walking and exploring central Tokyo while still only being four train stops away from Tokyo SkyTree Absolutely recommend

Thank you K Family for being such a Super Host   I had a wonderful time during my stay at this apartment it was clean and lovely and perfect for my needs  It was a great homey location as it wasnt so touristy I really  enjoyed the neighborhood Everything is easily accessible food lots of local restaurant around supermarket convenience store and train station Thank You MrK for your quick responses Thank You MrT for being such a great Host for always checking on your guests and for all your recommendation  This apartment is good place for family with ample space for big luggage  I will definitely be back and recommend this place to everyone Thank You once again

The family is extremely helpful generous and friendly They live nearby so are available immediately for any needs that ma arise The house is clean and very cozy Having two toilets is a definite plus  It is in a very quiet neighborhood Its only a few minutes walk to the train station from where it connects well to Asakusa Oshiage Sky Tree and other areas in the northeastern part of Tokyo Highly recommendable

A wonderful experience staying here We were made to feel very welcome from the moment we arrived all the way through to the end of our stay Our kind hosts went above and beyond to help organise transport both when we arrived and left and were always available to answer tips and questions about tourism in Tokyo The location is nice and quiet and was easy to commute to lots of the central spots in Tokyo using the train The house was very clean and a comfortable place to rest after long days of tourism A much more personable and friendly experience than Im used to with Airbnb and Id definitely stay again
One of the best hosts you can imagine
Probably the best decision if you want to be in Tokyo but still in a quiet place Everything was Perfect

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Pine House Mr T was an excellent communicator who not only made fantastic recommendations but also proactively helped us when we booked a flight that departed early in the morning while trains werent running The accommodation had everything we needed and was a short walk to shopsthe train stationplenty of food options We will definitely be back

KNs place was great and Koji was extremely friendly and picked us up from the station and showed us around as well as recommending some local restaurants The place was spotless and exactly like the listing The location is a 5 minute walk from the train station and close to coffee shops and restaurants Very quiet as well I highly recommend staying here

Nami Koji and Mr T are great hosts Mr T met us at the station and gave us a ride to Pine House After a long trip it was so nice to be driven right to our door and not have to roam around searching for the house with our luggage in towbrNami met us there and together they provided us with all the information we needed and showed us around The house is great And there are two toiletsVery rare for an Airbnb in Japan Super helpful for a family brNami  and Mr T had excellent restaurant recommendations and were of great help They had yummy unexpected refreshments in the refrigerator and went above and beyond to make our week comfortable and memorablebrIt was nice staying in Katsushikaaway from the hustle and bustle of the city but just a quick train ride away We enjoyed exploring the area thanks to some great information provided by K  NbrThanks Nami Koji Mr T and Pine House for a wonderful week in TateishiKatsushika brHighly recommend

We had such a good time with Nami and Koji they were really helpful They helped us making calls for restaurants since most places we were looking for needed reservationbrThe place was like the pictures and even morebrThey picked us up at the station and took us back too at the end which was a big help with our suitcases They are really friendly people and I would recommend their place to anyone staying in Tokyo
호스트분들도 정말 친절하셨고 숙소도 일본 느낌이 나서 정말 좋았어요 주위에 먹거리도 많고 전철도 예쁘고 모든 것이 완벽했습니다

Hosts were very responsive kind and helpful We immediately felt at home as they gave us a comprehensive overview of the area including the best places to eat drink and relax They even gave us some delicious apple juice The neighborhood is quaint and quiet at night the perfect place to come back to after a day in downtown Tokyo We hope to come back again  Mr V

The K family were great hosts  They were attentive kind and friendly  brThe picked us up from the train station and took us to train station on our departure brWe would have loved to get to know them better but we were always on the go  brWe hope to see them again on our next trip to Japan

K and N are fabulous hosts  Unlike most Airbnbs where you never actually meet the hosts K and N live and work nearby and are incredibly personable and helpful  The place was immaculate  We loved the pine interior and unique design  Well supplied too Not only did we have at our disposal all the gadgets one needs but they supplied us with coffee and coffee too  Conveniently the washer and dryer were right outside the door  The river is nearby and the Tateishi Station is a short and fun walk away  I almost forgot the added bonus K or N  or Mr T or someone else in this delightful family will pick you up from the bigger Aoto station and take you back when you depart  My wife and I were sorry to leave  Great hosts excellent Airbnb
第一天到到時候有來接我們真的讓我覺得很貼心房東們推薦了很多當地美食還做了交通指引是我遇過最親切的房東走路三到五分可以到車站附近也很多商店房間十分乾淨整齊和照片一樣入住的期間我們十分開心和幸福若是來到東京我真心的推薦KN的房源
Absolutely the best hosts we have ever had Thoughtful kind and helpful near 2 stations we will be back

5 stars recommendbrMr T from landlord group will pick you form Aoto station to BB and give the best city tour when driving brThen depends the flight time to take you to Aoto station on last day too its really sweet and convenience servicebrThe house is clean quiet took 67mins walk to 京成立石 station
We really appreciated how helpful and responsive they were during our stay We never had any issues and the location is great for taking the train Thank you Pine House for a great first visit

We arrived later than planned and when contacted about the delay Koji adjusted pickup time  Mr T  a brother met us at the train station at 9 in the evening and then even toured us a bit before arriving at the house  We were met by Koji and his wife Nami and before even going in were given a tour of the family business close by  They then spent half an hour explaining many things about the house the area the train system and local attractions  brThroughout our stay we were contacted to ensure all was well  They recommended going to a Koto concert in a teahouse on a Sunday afternoon in Shibamata which was very special  brWe didnt lack for anything even coffee when we were running low was delivered straight away  Accommodation was superb in every way in a spotless housebrThey clearly love having guests and have two other homes close by that they manage  On our departure day we were taken to the train station at 800 with a farewell sendoff from the family  HIGHLY recommended

We very much enjoyed our stay It was so convenient to be picked up at Aoto Station after a long day and night of travel and the beds were comfortable Once we felt human again we were able to fully appreciate how lovely Pine House is and how great the hosts Im sure I had silly questions but they all were answered promptly The home was clean in a quiet neighborhood and close to the train station This was our first trip to Japan and finding this AirBNB made a memorable vacation even better Thank you

1010 would stay again They were so welcoming and helpful Always replied within a good time frame and gave great recommendations on where to go and how to get there The house was so charming I miss it already lol The neighborhood is a calm quiet one so be sure to keep that in mind when booking Also the train station really is 5 mins away as well as the local convenient stores Thank you so much for having me and Gisamy we thoroughly enjoyed our stay

What a gem The hosts were wonderful  very responsive and friendly They picked us up from the local train station and drove us to the house The house itself is small but very well laidout clean and has everything you need We were a group of three and were very comfortable brThe neighborhood itself is outside of the main part of Tokyo but for us that was a plus because it wasnt so packed with people and felt really authentic You can definitely find good places to eat and drink in the neighborhood  the hosts ramen shop recommendation was excellent The station is only a few minutes walk away so you can easily take a train into central TokyobrOverall we were 100 happy with our stay
Sehr freundliche Gastgeber br Super ausgestattet br Alles wie auf den Bildern br Alles fußläufig erreichbar brJeder Zeit wieder gerne

I have stayed with this lovely family 5 years ago and this experience was even more special as I brought my dear husband they are very accommodating and always responded immediately Pine House is very comfortable and felt like home during a short stay It was also nice to chat with them and to speak a little Spanish with them They provided a ride to the station to head to airport Overall we had a wonderful time and the area is very authentic and a place where locals live and have great markets and restaurants and bars I would stay again

We loved staying here Mr T and his family were very helpful and always went the extra mile to make sure our stay was comfortable and we had everything we needed They were the nicest hosts Ive had on Airbnb The house was beautiful and we couldnt have asked for more
K  N were incredible hosts and their place was perfect the neighbourhood is lovely and the train is walkable and makes it easy to get where you need to go Loved every minute of it

We were treated very well we were given a lot of local recommendations that we got from the hosts many of which were well worth our timebrThe place was clean and comfortable We had a pretty stormy day on our visit but had a very pleasant day inside the accomodationbrWhenever we needed help we were treated very kindly by one of the hosts in a matter of minutesbrThank you so much for your hospitality when staying at your accomodation Kawa and company

We thoroughly enjoyed our week long stay The hosts were wonderful very helpful responsive and friendly It was so nice to leave the crazy part of Tokyo at the end of the day and come back to our peaceful relaxing house in Katsushika It was also conveniently located close to a train station I highly recommend staying here if youre coming to Tokyo

PERFECT even though this apartment didnt have any comment so far  the pics were so thrilling to me that I took the chance and booked the place for one week in october 2013I travelled with a friend to do both business and tourism in tokyothe whole communication ahead of the stay was perfect we got perfect travel and meeting instructions from mas our hostwe even got event tickets for a rare to find traditional japanese geisha performance as a welcome gift were we were the only foreigners we arrived very early in the morning no problem we were picked up at 7 am from the metro station close to the apt by superfriendly mas it was superb to be able to have the apt this early in the morning  right after a longhaul flight from europethe place was spotless clean and is located in a very nice neighbourhood with loads of charming also european restaurants and coffe shops with almost no tourists we liked it a lot  found our favorite restaurant hang out and loved it to come back to this peaceful place after strolling around in the more crowded areas of shinjuku and shibuyathe apt itself was exactly like in the pics everything was brandnew  we were the first guests everything perfect fantastic bed furniture interior design shower towels shampoo and and and our host mas gave us detailed infos about bars clubs taxis etc whenever we asked by mail  perfectPERFECT  PERFECT PERFECT thank you mas for everything we had a fantastic time in STUDIO D

I booked this room not knowing Tokyo at all hoping that it might be in a good spot I really wasnt disappointedFrom the pictures you can see the room is immaculate with fantastic amenities The Internet is highspeed sound system awesome bathroom luxurious and decor coolWhat I wasnt expecting was its perfect spot just one row back from the coolest little street Ive found in the city Its a little French inspired district oozing with character Full of restaurants I urge you to go to the one down the hill with the plastic doors and buckets of seafood outside for the tuna cheek just 1200 and enough for 2 people and bars You instantly feel at homeThere are very few tourists but you dont feel out of place Plus it is close to the transport links at Iidabashi to get anywhere in the city within 20 minutes I honestly cant speak highly enough of the place Im in Tokyo for a month yet only booked it for a week Somebody else booked the following week before I decided to stay meaning I had to move to a hotel for a week before returning once againMas is a great host who will tell you anything you need to know then leave you to it with his number in case you need him Exactly the way it should be

I enjoyed everything about the stay and would definitely come back I was greeted by Mas at the train station who took me to the apt Apt was very clean and all the furnishings were high end The area is highly unique and still close to major tourist points All in all an excellent stay

Just Wow Mas is a great host with fast and clear communication providing advices to get to the apartment from the airport and waiting for us at the subway exit He was available for any questions we had during our stay and he was very nice to usThe apartment itself was just perfect  Brand new with touches of technology and design everywhere The bed is crazy large and confortable the bathroom is well equiped and ultra convenient with the bath that becomes a shower with a builtin curtain Thanks for the bath products and towels as well  The balcony is very pleasant The TV and sound system is awesome The attention to details is everywhere The location is just perfect  Iidabashi is the perfect place to get around in the city  JR and metro a few steps away The apartment is located in a small walking street very quiet surrounded with many restaurants shops and barsWe were so happy to come back at our place and chill at the end of the day after walking in this beautiful cityOnce again thanks to Mas and his amazing apartment we had a wonderful time in TokyoWe are looking forward to come again for a longer stay in Japan and for sure studiod will be a part of it
great stay and wonderful host
Great place  Massaharu was a great host

This place if great studio apartment off quiet street yet steps away from scores of fantastic bars restaurants shops bakeries you name it  Our host Mas met us at the train station to guide us to this hidden treasure and gave us pointers on what to do where to eat etc  Ive been to Tokyo half a dozen times in the last 3 years and this neighborhood and this apartment are the best Ive found yet Whats not to like  It is a single space so great for couples single visitor as while bathroom and kitchen are nice its all pretty open and cozy frosted glass between bathroom and main space kitchen table pulls out when needed  With that in mind it cant be beat

Apartment is beautifully appointed and a very cool place to stay We had no trouble getting there as our host met us at the station Mas is a wonderful host very helpful We had everything we needed Just perfect One of the best locations in Tokyo Kagurazaka is a beautiful area with a wonderful feel and has great restaurants and bars and even has good coffee and you really dont need to leave the area to enjoy the best of Tokyo
Mas is amazing the houseroom is amazing the neighborhood is fantastic If you have the chance please book it for a unique  relaxed Tokyo experience Thank you Mas for a special stay

What can I say about Mas Kagurazaka apartment  The apartment was immaculate and well appointed  When you walk into the apartment youll be struck by how attractive it is  However youll gradually see all of the details and thought that has gone into the apartment  Carefully curated furniture linens plates and accessories gave it a home away from home feel  It was really like having my own piedàterre in TokyoThe location was fantastic  In very chic Kagurazaka youll get a taste for old and new Tokyo  Youll find the most charming winding alleys that lead to exclusive Japanese invitation only restaurants ryotei as well as a healthy number of French really good French restaurants in the neighborhood as well  It is definitely like staying at your cool friends pad in Tokyo  Kagurazaka is a conveniently located place Only about 5 minutes by foot to the JR Train Station even less to the subway station and located in central Tokyo  youll be able to get just about anywhere easily  Or if you want to take a taxi there are a ton in the area in the evening that can wisk you away to your desired location  Not really as expensive as youd thinkMas is a fantastic host  He was so accommodating and went above and beyond to make my stay memorable  He made an extensive list of options for a party I wanted to throw at a restaurant in Kagurazaka  With his help I was able to host a party for 12 of my friends in a charming restaurant that my Japanese friends even were impressed with  Im so grateful for his help with making my party a success  Mas Kagurazaka apartment was just lovely  It makes me want to pick up and move to Tokyo just to live in Kagurazaka  I highly recommend for anyone who wants a quiet place outside of the bustling tourist spots where they can get a taste for a higher echelon of Tokyo

How happy we are to have chosen this appartment for our week in TokyoThe area is really well located with three stations in less than 200m from StudioD and with loooooots of restaurants and bars right next to itThe appartment was perfectly clean well designed fully equiped and super cozyMasaharu is such a helpfull housemaster well organized and attentive for ANYthing that can serve you better Gracias Mas

Mas was one of the most well organized hosts I have had the pleasure of staying with The apartment came with a detailed instruction manual as well as maps and suggestions for the local areaMas stayed in regular contact with us before and during our stay and nothing we ever too much trouble from helping us organize sim cards to reserving our transportation back to the airport In previous visits to Tokyo I have stayed in small but expensive hotel rooms in busy areas staying in Kagurazaka was a totally different and altogether far more pleasant way to enjoy Tokyo The nearby station has connections all over the city which make it a great base for exploring however I would recommend spending significant in the local area it has fantastic restaurants cafes bars and many friendly people

You can stop searching and book this apartment It is a gem  Masaharu was so incredibly kind caring and helpful he went above and beyond for us  The apartment is so chic and cute not to mention spacious clean comfortable well equipped etc Much much much better than any hotel room at this rate  AND the neighborhood is incredible  Just stunning  The alleys off the main street boast an endless number of the most charming restaurants bars coffee shops stores etc  And it is so conveniently located next to so many trains  I will definitely return to this apartment many many times

Beautifully appointed apartment managed to the the highest degree by fantastic host Mas SuzukibrExceptionally comfortable bed first class toiletries and amenities brThe apartment is in a small side street so very quiet The balcony is a lovely place to enjoy your morning coffee whilst watching the local people passing by and the restaurant owners setting up especially on a laid back Sunday brIidebashi is one of the best areas in Tokyo especially for foodies You are literally surrounded by some of the best restaurants in the city Make lunch or dinner plans locally and then head off on your adventuresbrTake time for a stroll along the canal running through the heart of Iideabashi brTransport connections are fantastic youre very close to the station which connects extremely quickly with Harajuku and Shinjuku as well as Ueno Tokyo and RyugokubrPerfect apartment in an amazing area of Tokyo brWill stay again 100 on our next visit to Tokyo
Amazing apartment and amazing host Do not look further if youre looking for a wonderful stay in Tokyo

We couldnt expect more from this fabulous loft for our stay in Tokyo The place is exactly as described on airbnb with a big comfortable bed nice furniture and everything you need to spend a very nice moment hairdryer washingmachine fridge etc  We would have loved staying longer Moreover the location is perfect and was easy to find since somebody came to pick us up at the JR station which is always a good thing in Japan Thanks for everything we wish we could back

What a great place to stay for a week We try to visit Tokyo every year and we found this to be one of the best accommodations weve had yet Its one big room plus a deck and bathroom The quality and design of everything is superb The bed is huge and the bathroom is modern brThe location is perfect tons of shops and restaurants are just outside but its off the Main Street so there is no noise And best of all it is very close to the station brMas met us late in the evening when we arrived and showed us to the studio he was courteous and professional and explained everything we needed to know brThanks Mas

StudioD is indeed your cool friends apartment in Tokyo We highly recommend it as a comfortable convenient and beautiful place to stay for anyone visiting TokyoYour cool friend Mas is a great host Thank you Mas for answering all our questions about Tokyo and coming to meet us at the station During our stay Mas kept in contact via email  Airbnb for bits and pieces which was very helpfulMas has lovingly made the apartment very comfortable with everything that is needed for some rest and relaxation The kitchen and bathroom are modern and the living area and bedroom are wellfurnished and decoratedKagurazaka is a very nice area with a busy central street You could almost spend all your time there Restaurants and cafés izakaya convenience shops tea shops a shrine a temple shopping and lovely stonepaved streets The street even shuts down to cars during lunchtimes and for most of SundayIf you do want to explore of course you do transport is very convenient Iidabashi Stationi is 5 minutes walk away The Tokyo Metro and JR East Line make it easy to get to Shinjuku Akihabara Shibuya and Ginza for example We bought a Suica and used it for getting everywhereThank you Mas We loved it

Lovely place Masaharu went to JR station to meet us took us to the apartment gave us very helpful guidanceWe had some troubles with the wifi and safety box he responded quicklycame quickly to solve the problemI highly recommand this place

StudioD is the most fabulous apartment in Kagurazaka  the apartment is immaculate and Mas was an amazingly gracious host If you are looking to stay in Tokyo look no further The space is close to many wonderful restaurants and bars And is easily accessible by Tokyo metro and Japan Rail StudioD feels like a home away from home We hope you make it yours Cheers

Mas was just perfectWe ask him to help us to book different restaurants with very strictly policy and he was successfulThe house is as you can see in the pictures and now looking the ad Ive a lot of nostalgiaThe house is in a strategic location and a lot of metro line are only 4 minutes away even going there from the Tokyo station is very simple

Mas is a very friendly and helpful host We needed a last minute help with luggage delivery and he helped us immediately  The room is very nicely designed and clean We will definitely stay here again on our next trip

Die Unterkunft war super Eine schöne Einzimmerwohnung in super Lage Wir konnten von dort aus alles super erreichenbrDie Kommunikation lief prima und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühltbrKurzumempfehlenswert

Mas was very helpful with our taxi to Kakurazagaand checked us in swiftly The apartment is in a great central location of Tokyowith a plethora of restaurants to chose from If you are not into traditional Japanese cuisinethere are many amazing Italian and French restaurants to chose from within a few minutes walk A very calm and peaceful location  to enjoy your time in Tokyo Close to trainssubways and taxis

This is a stunning studio in a popular area of Tokyo Mas and the area  restaurant information were both very well organised and helpful The bathroom is a bit transparent for my taste  but very stylish nontheless

Très bien situé à deux pas de la station Iidabashi en plein quartier Kagurazaka le studio proposé par Masaharu remplit toutes les conditions pour un bon séjour spacieux design propre tout équipé et jouissant dun balcon agréable Je recommande vivementNous remercions par ailleurs lhôte qui sest montré dune extrême gentillesse et disponibilité avant le voyage par mail et par téléphone et une fois sur place

This was a great place to start our introduction to Tokyo  With Mas waiting for us with beautifulbrUmbrellas The room has everything that is necessary for a comfortable stay and the area is alive and convenient with transport Would suggest this place enthusiastically  Thank you Mas for being a great host
Great apartment in a fantastic part of Tokyo Mas was a great host and was very helpful from meeting us at the station making restaurant reservations and even supplying an electrical converter

I stayed a workweek in Mas apartment in Tokyo Im always happy to find places to be WYSISYG and Mas place was 11 as the images online Mas was awaiting me at my arrival with a huge bike suitcase and other luggage from the airport It was a precise and short hand over  just as you want tired it after a long flightThe apartment is small and functional with nice aesthetics Cool design and great functional features The neighbourhood was a positive surprise I have traveled to Tokyo more than 50 times but never seen this area full of small eateries and waterholes

My husband and I stayed at Mass apartment during our honeymoon and we enjoyed every minute of it The location could not be beat  it was conveniently located just a short 5 minute walk from Iidebashi Metro Station and surrounded by lots of great localsonly restaurants The apartment itself was the perfect quiet retreat after a day of exploration On top of all this Mas was an excellent host He was there to check us in and walk us through the apartment to make sure we had everything we needed He even offered to refund our first night when our plans were derailed by an unexpected typhoon Thank you for everything

Incredibly well prepared with a lovely and precise written guide to the apartment the surroundings shopping etc Couldnt be better The apartment itself for Tokio relatively spacious bedroom and bathroom a small attached terrace in an area thats famous for French and Italian restaurants Iiidabashi with 4 helpful Metro lines 3 minutes walk away Its not cheap and price wise on the level of a 4 or 5star hotel If you prefer privacy know the city a bit and dont need a reception this is the better optionThe last 2 days WiFi crashed which in Tokyo is a bit of a drama since there are hardly any open WiFi spots for foreigners Youre literally disconnected and for me being on a business trip this was a bit of a desaster Not the hosts fault probably but still pretty unpleasant Masa himself is incredibly helpful and proactive

Mas was extremely friendly and professional He reached out a couple of days prior to my arrival and helped plan a smooth movein The place was clean and comfortable amazingly well situated The stay was a breeze Ill be back Mas Thank you

Amazing neighbourhood to stay in and experience the authentic old school Tokyo feel Having lived several years in Tokyo I must say I missed out until I stayed here Cant be replaced by a hotel Lively area with lots of gastronomical choices and night action but tucked away in a side street that allows total privacy The simple modern interior design allows an at home feel as soon as you walk in The bright room is filled with nice wooden furniture mixing European style with Japan If there are any drawbacks at all and this is total nitpicking its the few narrow stairs up which may be difficult with a lot of luggage and the fact that the toilet door is transparent not ideal for shy couples But thats rather something to know than any reason not to stay here Masa replied to any questions I had beforehand quickly and was ready when I got there He was a very pleasant hostFor the Tokyo firsttimer or connoisseur a perfect place to stay
Mass loft located in the heart of kagurazaka and surrounded by various kinds of restaurants its best place I cant find in such a wonderful location Thanks Mas
Amazing place

The apartment is architecturally stunning bright airy and modern with some traditional Japanese features It is well equipped with everything we needed for our stay including laundry facilities Kagurazaka is one of our favourite areas in Tokyo with Edo period buildings narrow interesting laneways that are packed with fine restaurants including Michelin Star The apartment is also located within walking distance to two subwaymetro stations Mas is a helpful and gracious host helping us with restaurant reservations during our stay especially considering that we required vegetarian dining  The Michelin Star vegetarian restaurant he recommended to us was one of the best experiences we had travelling throughout Japan We will definitely stay here again if available

Mas was an incredible host  with an incredible apartment He met us warmly with great directions to meet him from Narita airport gave us a tour of the place and quickly was on his way He was the perfect balance of accessible and giving us space throwing a few suggestions our way that always hit the mark and being easy to contact when we needed a thing or two He also had a great book of clear instructions for all the amenities in the apartment and nearby great restaurants The apartment itself is incredibly cozy and warm and we did indeed feel like we had a real home in Tokyo buying little breakfast things to keep in the fridge and drinks to keep cool and take with us on our travels during the day  and listening to the awesome sound system or watching great Japanese TV I would tell anyone to stay here for a short or longer term visit the neighborhood is both homey and well traveled with a mix of bustle and calm and will hopefully return myself again some day Thank you Mas Oh  just one thing on the gorgeous bathroom that is encased in almost clear glass  let me just say my boyfriend and I became even closer on this trip We found it fun and charming to be so intimate with a pretty clear view of one another while we were in the bathroom so probably best to take this place with someone you are very close to or want to be closer with as there isnt much privacy in the beautiful and well appointed space Thank you again for a great six days Mas
其实十分感谢铃木先生对我的照顾来到日本很高兴认识你家里的环境很不错我觉得适合情侣一起来东京玩然后住在这里屋子逼格很高很惬意哈哈下次来一定还去拜访您谢谢

Staying at Studio D was a superb experience for us Our Host  Suzuki San was very helpful He is great with communications and made our trip planning so much easier He gave precise instructions for our JR trip from Airport came pick us up at the Idabashi Station and showed us around the neighbourhood He also suggested great restaruants and made reservations for us During our stay he emailed to check on us every now and then making sure we are well taken care of  couldnt have asked for more The apartment is exactly as described it is located in a cute hip neighbourhood close to a lot of restaurants and convenience stores Youd feel relax and safe staying at Studio D I would definitely come back Thank you for everything Mas Really Appreciate it Take care

One of the most thoughtful places Ive stayed Not particularly large but has everything needed and then some Neighborhood was lively but we typically ended up taking the metro to other parts of the city

Large clean and modern studio in a really great neighborhood in Tokyo Very big comfortable bed some outdoor space easy keypad access to the apartment so you dont need to carry around keys and just a few minutes from the subway Note that while the bathroom is gorgeous superupdated and big the other reviews are completely right about the seethrough door You have to be comfortable with that if youre staying there with more than one person It is up a flight or two of narrow stairs so keep that in mind for anyone with difficulties walking Masaharu is also a great host in general His tips are spoton he was superresponsive and very nice in person With that said I have to admit that our trip was marred by the construction going on in the apartment directly below us While I assume this is temporary and wont affect others necessarily it was extremely disruptive starting early 800 ending very late 1100 at nightish continuing on the weekends and even occurring above the skylight in the bathroom which felt invasive Masaharu was sympathetic responded immediately to our concerns and did instruct the contractor to stop drilling first thing in the morning but it was still pretty loud and we wish we had known about it beforehand So not as relaxing of an experience in the apartment as we were hoping  All that said assuming construction is complete this was a great spot to stay in Tokyo and wed love to stay here again

Masharu was a very welcoming polite and respectful host The room was actually depicted A spacious extremely tasteful well designed and clean studio bathroom and balcony The area is a lively yet quiet non touristic area lined with cozy restaurants and a short walk from the metro station Would highly recommend to anyone appreciate of good design and wanted a comfortable authentic experience

Mas met us at the nearby train station and showed us to the apartment brThe apartment was beautifully decorated with ample facilities Its  ideally located for travelling to the various districts of Tokyo or visiting local bars and restaurants brMas was an attentive host and helped us on several occasions when booking restaurants Hisbrcommunication from start to finish helped make this a fantastic stay and I would recommend his place to anyone
Mas was a perfect host I will be staying at his place on all my business trips to Tokyo

Masas place was perfect The location was great surrounded by lots of great cafes and restaurants but very quiet as it is on a small street The apartment itself is very stylish and has everything you need We loved the roof terrace Masa was a great host and we would recommend his place to others

Lovely little penthouse studio with a sunny balcony in a charming neighbourhood  Huge bed  Super clean bathroom with a great shower  Im 63 and the shower was high up enough for me  Not a given in Japan   Nice toiletries too The neighbourhood is awesome  lots of little restaurants and bars all around a matter of steps from the apartment  Our favourite  Sen  turn right on the main road through Kagurazaka  Waseda  and its about 20 yards up on the rightbrMas is a great host  speaks perfect English and met us outside the MUFG bank across the road to take us to the apartment and reappeared in a trice when I messed up with the door code  thanks Mas my faultbrWe are pretty self sufficient but I sure Mas would help with more local eating recommendations if you need it but just venture out and point and shoot you cant go wrongbrWell definitely be back and will definitely stay here
Mas is a phenomenal host and the place will make you feel right at home Its amazing how convenient it is and how spacious Always would return
Can not be better Thanks Mas this apartment is amazing

Oh this is a really fantastic place for my family to have a vocation in Tokyo It is located in a traditional Japanese neighborhood and surrounded by good restaurants and bars so you will never feel lonely when you come back to the place after daytime tour  Compared with hotels this place make you feel more close to local people and easier to taste the Japanese culture  The host is a real gentleman and easy going He let me feel easy when my kid brought some troubles to the beddings  So thanks to Mas and hope to visit this place once more in the next trip to Tokyo

This small but perfectlyformed room is exactly what ones needs in Tokyo  Convenient stylish comfortable and in a great neighbourhood Restaurents of all descriptions within walking distance  Mas is a very considerate and efficient host  Although just above a restaurant we had no noise at all  Only thing to be aware of is cars cant drive up the small street so you need to wheel your suitcase a short distance and carry it up two flights  All round a very suitably cool Tokyo pad

You cant get a better Airbnb experience than this Nice and cozy neighbourhood spacious room  mordern and fancy design comfortable bed clean toilets  with nice shampoo and soft towels and most importantly a super nice host Mas was very responsive and a semi tour guide for our  3 nights stay in Tokyo He provided me very detailed information on dinning and restaurants he can even book restaurants for you in advance considering its actually hard to communicate in Japan because of the language Mas does it all for you If you are a foodie like me you will absolutely love the neighborhood so many nice restaurants and also easy to travel to shopping areas such as harajuku and shinjuku The only downside to the room is the stairs if you have a large suitcase like me itll take a bit strength to take it down with all the shoppings inside But I guess its not a big issue considering all the other benefits 5 stars experience overall

My 10 year old son and I had a wonderful time staying in Mas Suzukis apartment for 3 nights The description of his apartment is spot on clean well decorated and with everything one traveller needs The location of the place is perfect as to the main attractions subway restaurants and the like All within walking distance or easily reachable Mas Suziki is unbelievable friendly and a wonderful host When we arrived he explained how everything worked Furthermore he was very helpful so that we did not have any problem to getting around In addition he was very responsive both to our concerns and to requests for information He offered an extra umbrella when it rained all day  In sum we felt privileged to staying in his apartment and cannot wait to come back in the near future

We chose Japan as our honeymoon destination and opted for a cosy apartment instead of a hotel room Our stay in Tokyo has been an amazing experience largely due to Mas who has been a wonderful host and helped us plan our visit even before we got there My husband is a chef and eager to try some Michelin star restaurants which can be notoriously difficult to book Mas not only managed to get us in but also gave us a long list of additional recommendations He also answered any of our questions within minutes whilst we were in Japan and picked us up from the closest tube station The flat itself is in a beautiful quiet area surrounded by restaurants with a beautiful decor accurately depicted in the pictures Overall I cannot recommend this place highly enough Thank you Mas for making us feel at home and ensuring our honeymoon trip was a success

Im so sorry Im so late to write the commentsThe house is amazing and it is on the street of kagurazaka that fullbodied amorous feelings of Japan in TokyoThere is subway in 5 minutes and a lot of foods downstairsBut the most important is Suzuki SanHe is so nice and give us a so perfect Journeybr

Masaharu is a wonderful host and this place is so well organised and appointed  It is a wonderful experience and I would definitely stay there againThe area is excellent and whilst its not one of the obvious places to stay in Tokyo I liked it as I have visited the city many times  The area around the apartment is very good and well worth exploring

We had such a lovely stay in Mas stunning studio Everything was laid out for our comfort and we slept like babies in the large bed following long days of exploring Tokyo The studio is in a very interesting neighborhood close to both trains and subways and near tons of good restaurants and barsYou would think that with such an interesting location it would also be a noisy place but we were stunned by just how quiet it got at nightMas also helped us sort out reservations for restaurants and was so helpful overall I cant recommend this AirBnB highly enough

It is a nicely decorated flat Cozy stylish new and clean Very close to what the photos show Its space is good for two persons and is much bigger than the usual hotel room in Tokyo brIts located at Kagurazaka which is a place with lots of good restaurants It however needs change train twice when going to and from airport I suggest to take a cab to or from Tokyo station especially if you carry large luggagesbrMas is kind and he provided well organised information for transportation restaurant recommendations etc br

We really made an inspired choice with this Penthouse apartment managed by Masaharu It was presented immaculately and as pictured It has such a sophisticated interior and was such a retreat to come home to each day It was so quiet we slept peacefully each night ready for the new day Tokyo had to offer The area was well above our expectations in terms of history character level of quality venues for dining and access to transportMasaharu was a supreme host giving clear and easy direction from the airport right up to personally walking us to the apartment and getting us acquainted with the amenities We recommend staying at this location if you want value beauty comfort and style in your visit to Tokyo We intend to return at our next possible chance

One of the best AirBnb Ive visited Mas really is a super host He helped us with restaurant bookings even months before we arrived He was always prompt to reply and gave lots of helpful recommendations on attractions and eateries While the studio was a decent walk from the JR or Metro station Mas gave clear directions and even met us at the station and helped with luggages The studio was beautiful especially the bathroom you will love it  We highly recommend this place
great location great host great room We felt homeWe discovered the neighbourhood thanks to the recommendations of Mas and its full of great restaurantsWe didnt want to leave anymore

Mas is a wonderful host The appartement was very well located in a very cute neighborhood Tons of convenient stores local restaurants and shops at a walking distance Metro was very close toobrThe appartement is very well designed and furnished Bathroom was amazing All in all if we were to come back to Tokyo this will definitely be the place we would go forbr

Masaharus apartment is a superb base in Tokyo Communication was friendly easy and efficient and Mas even came to meet us at the station on arrivalbrThe apartment is stylish spacious comfortable wellequipped and clean The bed in particular is exceptionally good It was a new area for us in Tokyo and we loved it Still quite centrally located but with a local neighbourhood character and full of restaurants and grocery stores We wouldnt hesitate to recommend Mass apartment and plan to be back Thanks Mas

Wow  I cant say enough great things about this Airbnb and the host Mas Mas was the best Airbnb host I have stayed with and I have visited many locations throughout the world Beyond making sure the place was perfect he helped me locate and send back my lost iPhone I am very grateful for all of his help The actual penthouse is amazing When visiting Tokyo location is KEY Tokyo is such a big place so having a home base in such a low key and central neighborhood like Kagurazaka was spectacular You can literally walk out the door and through these amazing little alleys and find amazing coffee cocktails shopping and restaurants Not to mention a 247 711 location which is where youre going to find a no fee ATM and the small things for your trip The subway is down the street and taxis are somewhat east to find as well The penthouse is luxurious from the bed to bathroom stereo to the patio Its one of my favorite airbnbs anywhereIf youre browsing Airbnb locations in Tokyo  stop now and book this place if its available

Great apartment in a great neighborhoodbrWe stayed for five nights  Mas met us at the tube station and escorted us the short walk to the apartment It was perfect for usbrVery clean and modern with everything youd need for your stay including a washing machine  dryerbrWe opted to not stay at a hotel because we wanted to get a real feel for the city and this place fit the bill Its on a secluded street behind a busy street so you get the best of both worlds  its quiet but one block from every kind of restaurant or supermarketbrAlso  a great part of the city very easy to get anywhere within about 20 minutes on the metro

Definitely recommend The place is absolutely amazing very comfortable and super clean Located in a convenient neighborhood which has a lot of amazing restaurants local shops and very close to metro station lidabashi Our host Masaharu was very helpful gave us a lot of information and kindly offered us to check in a little bit earlier and check out later because of our flight also Mr Masaharu was checking on us everyday see if everything goes well My boyfriend and I love the decoration and furniture the balcony is amazing all the equipment are provided we feel like at home So happy to stay in this place

We had a wonderful stay in this apartment Masaharusan provided us with detailed direction from Narita a few days before arrival met us at the train station and walked us to the apartment The apartment is in Kagurazaka a lovely neighbourhood full of restaurants a few with Michelin stars and bars We had a terrific time exploring the narrow side streets lined with tiny French restaurants and cafes There are two subway stations and the JR within a five minute walk and is only 20  30 minutes to Tokyo Station Shinjuku Shibuya Ginza Roppongi etc We are looking forward to our next trip back to Tokyo and will definitely be staying here again
Top notch experience Guest was available at all time Checked on us during stay Place is super well designed Area full of great restaurants and barswill come back

Masaharus place was amazing It was the perfect apartment for our trip to Tokyo It was clean super cool and in a great area that gave us access to the whole city and a great local area when we wanted to chill To top it off Masaharu couldnt have been more helpful He gave us the best information directions and even met us at the station when we first arrived I highly recommend this place

The Apartment was absolutely excellent I would choose Mas apartment whenever I will be back in Tokyo Its conveniently located and Mas is such an incredible host Thanks again

This is a really nice place to stay if you want to experience a lively part of Tokyo be in the middle of all the buzz but still have a comfortable and quiet sleep Public transportation is also a 5min walk and takes you to all parts of the city  I must say Mas was a great host who provided A high level of service including picking us up from the station

Excellent clean and spacious apartment in a great location close to a subway station with very fast connections to everywhere The owner Masaharu was perfect he gave us very clear directions and met us outside on the street when we arrived  He also helped us to make some restaurants reservations in Tokyo which was very helpful  Highly recommended

Absolutely loved everything about this place it is so beautifully decorated and so cozy Its situated above two restaurants but it was noisy The area is so hip with plenty of restaurants Mas was so accommodating he made it very comfortable for us Mas also recommended an amazing sushi restaurant sushi kokoro which is just a two minute walk away It was so good that it may very well be one of the highlights of our trip Everything was provided in the appartment and it was also very clean Mas speaks good English and it was very easy and comfortable to talk to Especially when we needed help for directions he always offered as much help as he could which we really appreciate If i go back to Tokyo Id love to stay Innside again

We loved this apartment It was very clean and modern It was equipped with everything we needed Everything from great audio adapter guide books to washing machine microwave and a fridge brThe area was really nice Lots of exiting restaurants and bars Very calm and quit during the night Close to the subway station  brMas speaks very good english and is always very helpful His communication is excellent Always answered quickly to our questions Mas was a great host and provided a high level of service brWe would love to come back here next time we are visiting Tokyo

Mas was an excellent host He even picked us up at the railway station and gave us good advice for best ramen in town The apartement is perfectly located clean and we especially adored the available organic shampoo marks  web We enjoyed our stay in tokyo Thank you

We are grateful because this house help us found such a beautiful place神楽坂is really amazingbrWe like the room in a quiet alleyEvery street around is so beautifulThe landlord gave us a detailed map to find the roomThe logo of the room is also very cutebrThe bathtub in the room was very comfortablethe little yellow duck is very cuteWe really love the toilets skylightLight will come in and shine on the groundits so beautifulEspecially the mirrorYou can see the plants at the same time as you look in the mirrorWe really love this partbrAnd we love the plants on the balconyEvery morning I woke up and saw the sun shining on the green plants then I have a good mood all day longBy the way the bed is too softWe had good deep sleep every nightbrAnd there was a lot of beautiful things  in the roomespecially the slippersI like it and want to buy one but there is no shop in Tokyo Surprise is the landlord even helped us to bought on the webbrThe room is beautifulThe food around is so deliciousand we love the music on the street It was a wonderful experienceWe will choose this room when we come to Tokyo next timeAt last thank you again for everything youve done

perhaps the best possible location from which to explore Tokyo Kagurazaka is incredibly charming and super convenient perfectly situated not touristy at all and filled primarily with a stunning variety of amazing restaurants none of the mass retailing of downtown shinjuku and shibuya which is easily accessible via 15min taxi or 20min subway brMas is an extraordinary host helpful accommodating and thoughtful everpresent but not intrusive bri almost immediately extended my stay by two weeks for total of 15mos and would have stayed longer had it been available once Mas adds a sunshade for the terrace it will be a truly perfect tokyo apartment and i will be movingin permanently so enjoy while you still can

A beautiful room in Tokyo Located in a much quieter neighborhood but still very central and only a few stops from ShinjukuShibuya A tranquil getaway from the hustle and bustle much more luxurious then some of the more costly hotels on offer Mas our host was extremely hospitable and helped us out massively letting us have a later check when we had an evening flight Wouldnt hesitate to stay here again if we return to Tokyo
Lovely place and central to everything Lots of food joint and Mas was so helpful and polite Highly recommend

Mas studio is truly exceptional Its been created with love with every detail  materials amenities lighting local recommendations  thoughtfully provided and nothing superfluous Kagurazaka is one of the best Tokyo neighbourhoods to soak up Japanese style architecture and cuisine You couldnt find a cosier more welcoming sanctuary to adventure from and come home to a more comfortable bed nor a kinder more considerate host than Mas Although I stayed by myself his special cocoon made me feel safe warm and totally spoilt Mas youve set the bar very high Hontoo ni arigatoo gozaimasita

There is no way I can sum up exactly how great my stay was in this review The space is well decorated clean and far exceeded my expectations overall Additionally Mass hospitality is the reason why I have already booked two more future reservations with him Hes a Superhost for a reasonbrKagurazaka is perfect if you want to be close to everything but feel like your escaping to a neighborhood It is very lively and is full of bars restaurants and cute little shops brI feel so fortunate that I had this experience for my first month in Tokyo and cant wait to go back

We stayed at Masaharus place for about ten days and had an absolutely fantastic time The home was sizeable had a really nice balcony and was in a very very quiet street no cars and few people Bed was super comfortable and we had lots of light with the huge windows Mas was fantastically responsive and went out of his way to help us around Tokyo

This was my second stay at 3rd floor penthouse  heart of TKO and it was great to be back The home is very comfortable clean and full of special touches and amenities that made my visit so specialbrThanks again Mas

This was the most perfect apartment I could have chosen in Tokyo I lived here for two months The room is beautifully designed and the light is cool and soft in the mornings Its incredibly peaceful and quiet The shower is very luxurious Air conditioning always perfect The bed is very comfortable The neighborhood looks like Kyoto mixed with Paris There are endless amounts of incredible restaurants of every genre of Japanese food There are a few French restaurants too There are also many artisanal boutiques where you can buy beautiful gifts to bring back home Kagurazaka dori is the embodiment of old time elegance the canopy of trees lining the street the beautiful zenkokuji temple the winding cobblestoned paths ways behind the main road where you can find tiny zen gardens koi fish ponds and beautiful traditional restaurants Its also very well served with the subway and JR trains Theres Iidabashi 5 min walking and Toei line maybe 7 min walking It makes me feel something remembering how perfect it was by writing this review and how lucky I was to experience Tokyo in this way Thank you Suzuki san
My friend and I had such great at Masaharus place The apartment is clean stylish and well located

Great place The comfort we experienced was no different from a hotel  Masaharu even offered us to get rid of the garbage and wash the towels Highlight for us was Kaguraka a while very stylish and modern  also conveniently located

It was really good place and its pretty much everything around here so me and my husband enjoyed stay so much The place looks pretty much same as pictures The location is perfect to go to everywhere in Tokyo brHost Masaharu was really easy communication and super care whiling we were stay Definitely want to come back to stay again brThank you so much

We had a wonderful time in Mas beautiful apartment The space is very nicely decorated and is equipped with everything youll need for a short trip comfortable bed spacious bathroom or a long stay functional kitchen washing machine We enjoyed all the amenities provided  including laundry detergent and fresh ground coffee and pourover coffee makerbrWe loved the location Kagurazaka is superwalkable and has tons of restaurants bakeries and local shops  We really enjoyed the opportunity to have a more intimate Tokyo experience away from the crowd and close to local residents going about their everyday livesbrMas was a great host very responsive kind to accommodate our requests and quick to provide assistance with logistics and other practical mattersbrThanks again for a great stay We hope to visit lovely Kagurazaga again in the future

요즘 핫하다는 가구라자카에 위치해 있습니다 지하철도 도보로 5분 정도 위치해 있고 왠만한 관광지는 지하철로 2030분내에 갈 수 있습니다 br숙소 주변이 매우 깨끗하고 이뻐서 걸어서 구경하기에도 좋습니다br주변에 음식점도 많이 있고 도보로 23분 거리에 훼밀리마트와 세븐일레븐이 있습니다br숙소내에 에어컨도 잘 되고 매트리스가 엄청 크고 푹신해서 8일동안 편안하게 잤습니다br크롬캐스트와 TV를 연결해서 한국방송도 보고 전자렌지와 커피포트 전기렌지가 있어서 편의점에서 사온 음식을 편하게 먹을 수 있었습니다br마지막날 호스트의 배려로 체크아웃시간을 늘려주셔서 짐을 숙소에 두고 식사 후 여유있게 공항까지 갈 수 있었습니다br자세한 후기는 제 블로그에 포스팅 하겠습니다 너무나 소중한 시간이였습니다 감사합니다

We had an amazing time  in Mas Sans apartment in Kagurazaka The location is beautiful and quiet and the apartment is very stylish and offers a lot of amenities Kagurazaka is the perfect neighborhood to explore Tokyo If you are a couple you should have no problem with the glass door to the bathroom otherwise this feature might be a bit indiscreet All in all we had a perfect time and would absolutely recommend the apartment

Masaharus loft space is ideally located in a quieter area of TokyoThere are many excellent local restaurants and bars to enjoyShibuya Shinjuku and other ares are easily accessed by cab or the excellent Tokyo train systemThe apartment itself is stylish and comfortable with all the amenities you could ask forHighly recommended

Masaharus place is set out quite nicelybrbed is king size and comfortablebrbathroom is large with basic commoditiesbrAlthough one of the best parts was the location Youre surronded by heaps of restaurants and convenience stores many of the resturants even have Michelin stars brThe train station isnt super close compared to other places ive stayed at in tokyo before but iant horribly far away breven though the room wasnt as large as i thought it would be if you want to be extremly comfortable with 2 people or maybe just yourself and have the cash to splurge brthis place is pretty good

Had a fantastic stay at Masaharus place Huge apartment especially for Tokyo The area around the apartment is gorgeous and has a lot of great restaurants Very centrally located and very close to both the subway and JR train Would absolutely stay here again

A beautiful and stylish place in a great part of Tokyo It was great to both walk around that area and be so close to a metro station to go anywhere else Mas was very accomodating and quick to answer any questions we had during our stay
