Absolutely loved our stay at Mas apartment and would 100 stay again Extremely well equipped we even got to do some washing The location is spot on so easy to get to all the main spots in Tokyo I think the biggest plus is the size Were currently in a large hotel in Kyoto which is less than half the size of Mas apartment

This is a great location to stay in Tokyo It is only a 5 minute walk to the nearest train station where you can access just about every area of Tokyo The surrounding area has many shops and restaurants It felt very safe The apartment itself was very clean and had modern furnishings Coffee and TV were provided which was also very nice  Masaharu is very friendly and helpful in making sure you arrived safely at the apartment We had no troubles finding and entering the place The apartment is located above a restaurant but you did not hear noises from downstairs or smelled the food Overall I would highly recommend you stay here
We loved our stay in Mass place The location was great  it had a real local feel but with so much to do Mas was a great host very responsive and helpful

We had a wonderful stay at Mas penthouse Very close to the subway and easy to get around Lots of great restaurants to eat and explore in the immediate area We would highly recommend this penthouse for anyone looking to stay in a neighbourhood of Shinjuku where locals live work and playbrThank you Mas for your hospitality and amazing penthouse

I stayed at Masasans apartment for 3 nights in Dec 2018 The place is clean stylish near TONS of great food and drink and centrally located for anything you want to do in Tokyo For the location I was initially worried about street noise and the apartment being cold in the winter as some of the ones in Tokyo are but I was pleasantly surprised The place was warm quiet and very dark at night brMasasan was very responsive and thoughtful giving very easy and accurate instructions for check in and transfer from Narita  brRecommend to anybody looking for a great spot to see Tokyo

Mas was a very helpful host and checks in with us during our stay to make sure everything was okbrHe recommended a nice restaurant and booked for us even its after our booked staying period brThe apartment is very stylish well designed and clean  definitely a hidden jewel in the area We are so glad we chose this place because 神乐坂 is a very cool and nice area with lots of restaurants and shops and convenient transportations around Its really easy to get anywhere from the closest station IidabashibrThe only unfortunate thing is there are actually 2 flights of stairs to get to the room and the stairs are quite narrow imagine having to carry a baby stroller up and down the stairs like we have tobrAll the rest are great will definitely recommend

We enjoyed our stay very much The apartment is small one room but stylish and well designed and had everything we needed The bed is very comfortable and big we also liked the bathtub We didnt use the balcony because it was winter but would be nice in warmer months Its worth noting there is no view of the street from the apartment The location is great Its a quiet street with lots of restaurants to choose from and a quick walk to the train station We didnt meet the host but self checkin was very  easy The only issue and others have also pointed this out is the fact that the bathroom has a glass wall right beside the bed Its not very private but we got used to it Really it was the location we came for and it didnt disappoint We would stay here again

Massan and the Studio were both 110100brI would recommend this place to all my friendsbrLocation is superb if you love food Theres a ton of restaurants everywhere around the Studio and a family mart around the corner youll never go hungry Theres so much to see around the Studio we couldnt do it allbrThe studio it self is such a treat to stay in I honestly wanted to just stay home instead of exploring at times pbrIf anyone stays here and reads this please please check out La Kagu shopcafe AMAZING egg sandwiches and great shopping  Coffee is pretty good too

Great studio apartment that is well located in Tokyo near Iidabashi metro  Nice neighbourhood and comfortable apartment  To note that it is on the 3rd floor without an elevator but the stairs werent problematic for us  The bathroom has limited privacy if that is an issue for you however the showerbath is absolutely divine as are the soaps furnished by Masaharu  Enjoy

This place is excellent in its location to good food supermarket close to metro and JR trains The room is very clean and most important thing is the queen size bed which u seldom find in other Airbnb in Tokyo There is a washing machine  dryer which is useful if you do not want to bring so many clothes It is worth the money to me
This place was simply spectacular Every detail has been considered both in terms of comfort and style Couldnt recommend more highly

I really enjoyed my stay at Massan apartment Mas provided really easy directions from the airport right to his apartment so you will not get lostbrHis home is located in a cute little alley way which is super quiet for a good nights sleep The room is really clean and modern inside with just a bed dresser and a little sitting area Bathroom is large and the shower had a lot of water pressure Its a perfect place to sleep and relax after a long day of sightseeingbrThe neighborhood is great with tons of bars and restaurant right outside the door You will not find any tourist here but the locals are super friendly as they always are in JapanbrMas San is a great communicator and stays in touch throughout your stay He is at your disposal and really helpful He helped us by making a dinner reservation on our behalf since the restaurant did not speak very good English Thank you Mas

This apartment is fantastic Its a studio but that doesnt mean it lacks amenities cooktop washerdryer smart toilet etc Everything was impeccably clean and Mas gave us great directions to get there via both cab and train If youre new to Japan as we were this was incredibly helpful brMore importantly though the location cant be beat Dont let the Shinjuku address fool you this neighborhood is full of sophisticated restaurants bars and bakeries but lacks the insane crowds of other Shinjuku areas And even better the apt itself is on a quiet side street so you have access to nightlife but dont have to sleep in the midst of it Its within easy walking distance of 3 train lines too Dont be afraid to wander off the main dragthere are a ton of great restaurants in little alleyways and on onelane streets

Gorgeous space convenient location excellent host Stay here if you are looking for a calmer oasis away from the noise but close to it all Would stay again in a heartbeat
Nice location and great space for those who those who enjoy design and details

Perfectly clean relaxing welldesigned apartment in an amazingly quiet historic area with easy access to trains and taxis Additionally Masaharu was always available for anything we needed help with A great experience overall

This is a lovely loft space in a fun yet peaceful neighborhood Just dont bring too much heavy luggage since its all uphill from the train station and then two flights of stairs up The bed is comfortable the bathroom easy to use and the balcony a nice place to walk out on in the morning to check the weather

This was our first trip to Japan  Masapartment was the perfect base to explore Tokyo being close to Iidabashi station There are so many amazing places to eat all within walking distance  a minimartpharmacy is just around the corner Mas is a great host with very clear  prompt communication  Thanks again Mas

Mass place is really outstanding  Think of it as a very stylish and well equipped hotel room with a few extra facilities to provide more independence and homeliness  Everything about the place quality of bed linens bathroom amenities etc  were as you would expect from a very very good hotel room  And Mas left plenty of easy to understand instructions and helpful restaurant recommendations  The small balcony space is nice and the windows left in lots of natural light  brThe area itself is great Everything is literally on the doorstep  outstanding restaurants small and local to Michelin starred great coffee shops supermarkets and train stations  We loved it here  A nice change from the more central areas  But the apartment is quiet brMas was great to communicate with  Check in and and out was very easy keypad and Mas again provided some very easy to understand directions  brFully recommend

This is our second time staying at Mas place We stayed for 5 nights and absolutely loved it once again Although a little pricey we find it worth it based on the location stylish and spacious apartment and the extra touches that Mas has provided to make the experience extra special We will absolutely stay here again

Mas was a wonderful host who was extremely friendly and detailed in his communication He left us such helpful instructions from the train station complete with photos it can be tricky to navigate Tokyo even with Google maps otherwise and overall was eager to help make our stay in Tokyo as pleasant as possible brWe loved the details of his apartment that made it feel like home away from home from lovely bathroom amenities to the beautiful hardwood floors and impeccable cleanliness The bathroom has a lot of character with glass doors and skylight bring an eye mask if youre super sensitive to light in the morning since the sun comes up early We would definitely stay here again with Kagurazaka being a quaint neighborhood a bit removed but an easy subway ride away from the main points of interest in Tokyo brThank you Mas for an excellent stay
Masaharus place is wonderful and stylish Lots of natural light through the bathroom Any issues we had Mas was very quick to reply
Great space in cool neighborhood

This is a very elegant and comfortable apartment in an upscale but youthful neighborhood with the oldtemples and shrines and the new La Kagu a very trendy shopping complex all at hand  Excellent supermarket and other food shops on Kagurazakadori the main street of the district The apartment is readily accessible with the JR  and other subway lines close at hand brThe apartment itself is compact and efficiently laid out We were grateful for the washerdryer but inadvertently set the child lock and could not figure out the Japanese directions  However help was at hand as  we found directions for the brand on the internet and were able to fix the problem Masaharu would have come to help but fortunately we were able to figure it out As others have mentioned the apartment is above a restaurant and around 89 PM there was some slight noise but it stopped after that I would certainly stay at Masaharus place again
An excellent choice Brutalist meets Japanese eclectic decoration The host is gracious and very attentive  The Apartment is fully equipped and I enjoyed my stay

We really loved staying at Studio D the penthouse was lovely and very cosy  We loved  the location and the stylish space But what we loved the most was that it felt like our own home away from home  The bed was so confortable and every detail had been thought of even down to the lovely bath wash and the built in table within the cabinetry We loved  exploring the local neighbourhood including the nearby Koishikawa Korakuen Gardens and we loved the tea shop around the corner  The location is nice and quiet just behind  the main street and is easy to get around to the attractions with a short stroll to both the metro subway and JR line There is also an abundance of restaurants and eateries within walking distance Thank you again and we will definately be looking at booking this place next time we are in Tokyo and telling our freinds about the cool friends place we stayed at
Amazing place Amazing host  Highly recommend
Mas place makes for a quiet stay in central Tokyo It is well located near train station and there are lots of great restaurant options within walking distance Would recommend and stay again

Suzukisans place was truly prefect The studio is appointed in the best possible way We loved all the little touches from the tube amplifier to the outstanding mattress and linens The location in Kagurazaka is excellent Its a wonderful neighborhood that is quiet filled with great shops and restaurants and quite close to many points of interest and transport hubsbrSuzukisan was extremely helpful and the communication was first rate We will be back as soon as possible

A lovely studio apartment that is surprisingly wellequipped We were particularly impressed by the comfortable kingsized bed the spacious drawers so that we could unpack everything and put away our suitcases the big bathroom lots of power points for charging devices and the lovely walltowall windows For us the midcentury styling and furniture was a highlight that gave the apartment character Mas provided excellent clear instructions on how to find and access the apartment and was very communicative Kagurazaka was a great home base in Tokyo fun to wander its little local streets shops and restaurants but with Iidabashi station being very handy to jump on the subway to explore Tokyo

If you are looking for a spacious stylish and super comfortable space to stay in whilst in Tokyo then this apartment is perfectLocated in a small local area almost village like the area has excellent restaurants bars and all other conveniences right at your doorThe subway is very a short walk and only a few stops from Shinjuku Shibuya and other main centres of Tokyoi couldnt recommend Mas more as a thoughtful attentive and friendly hostOur second visit and we will be back
Wonderful and understanding host who went out of their way to make my stay easy and enjoyable great location and yet very peaceful room

Wow what an incredible listing brThe listing is modern hightech and has all of the amenities you would need Its also enormous compared with other listings in Tokyo and its location is amazing Its tucked away on a quiet block one street away from the main strip of Kagurazawa where all the shops  dining are located and a 45 minute walk to Iidabashi Station brYoure a short ride away from Shibuya Shinjuku Ikebukuro and Ginza  this was our first time in Japan and we were surprised at the listings central location brMasaharusan was extremely responsive and regularly checked in on us to see if we needed anything We would love to stay at his place again the next time were in Tokyo

It was a great stay in a great apartment Everything was as described by Masaharu The area is indescribably enchanting with a wide range of restaurants and small shops The exit B3 of Lidabashi Station is only a few steps away Masaharu was always available and gave answershelp to our questions It was a perfect stay with a perfect host We will be happy to come back again
Stylish space in a great location Mas is easy to communicate with and has a lot of great recommendations for the area Would definitely recommend
Location is good
An absolutely beautiful apartment in one of Tokyos most charming neighborhoods with a super helpful host to boot Perfect for 12 people

Masaharus apartment is a wonderful oasis in the middle of busy Tokyo And just outside your doorstep are a million great restaurants and shops in the Kagurazaka A perfect place to stay and a very generous host
Masaharus place was lovely  He is very helpful as well  Highly recommend
隅々まで行き届いた素晴らしいインテリア小物アメニティ日本にいるのに海外にいるような気分になれますbr天窓のついたバスは美術館のような心地よさbr周りには沢山の飲食店もあり朝食を近くのパン屋さんで買ってきたりケーキを買ってきてテラス席で食べたり真空管アンプを携帯に繋いで好みの音楽をきいたりbr自分好みの空間をつくることができます

まず写真と実際の建物の様子が違います写真だと落ち着いた綺麗な建物に見えますが実際には同じビルの１２階に飲食店が入居されてますので建物の周囲には早朝から夜遅くまで人の出入りが絶えないのと2階の飲食店や建物の外から早朝から夜遅くまで大きな人の声や物音が部屋まで聞こえてきますまた2階の飲食店からの料理の煙やタバコで度々部屋の中が臭くなりますbr水回りも建物の経年劣化に合わせてところどころ傷んでおりあまり清潔感はありませんbrシャワーも水圧が弱くbrシャワーフックの立て付けも悪くbrシャワーヘッドうまくハマりませんでしたbr真空管アンプの利用にiPhoneやiPodが必要なことも事前に知らされておらずbrそうした説明不足な点も残念でした
スムーズに滞在出来ましたありがとうございました

Wow  simply an amazing stay The apartment is thoughtfully designed and well decorated It felt so spacious which is quite rare in a Tokyo apartment The windows and king size bed were my favorite part And of course the neighborhood is charming Ill be back here when Im in Tokyo again

Super centrally located cozy apartment Bed is comfy and AC is coldbrNote that theres some noise and outdoor lights at night because its right above a yakiniku restaurant Also can be tricky to find but once you find it its easy to get to next time

Masaharus studio is great for 12 people traveling together The area is very local with tons of restaurants and cafes to explore The apartment is tucked away in a cool alley where Masaharu provides incredibly detailed instructions on how to reach  Masaharu is also super communicative and was helpful with any questions we hadbrThe apartment is easy to get to from the airport and 1520 min on the train from various sites to see in Tokyo It was definitely nice to come back to after long days of walking and sightseeing in sometimes very busy and touristy areas brIf you want to feel like a local and have a quiet sanctuary to come back to this is the place brAlso the bed was extremely comfortable and a great size
Great place and excellent location with lots of restaurants steps away brQuite some steps to the penthouse Other than that  highly recommended brWill stay again
Beautiful place so modern but cosey Would love to stay again

I cant recommend Masaharus place more highly Great location beautiful apartment and incredible host We experienced significant travel delays and missed our first night in Tokyo and he graciously allowed us to extend our stay at no additional charge We were so grateful for the amazing customer service

This was a terrific well located apartment in a quieter part of Tokyo while still feeling very central Very accessible to transit and sites a peaceful base to come home to at the end of the day with many amazing restaurants nearby Also a huge space by the citys standards with an enormous comfortable bed and great amenities brMasaharu was a fabulous communicator  very helpful welcoming and offered unexpected and muchappreciated flexibility around our check out timebrI would only note for others that the bathroom has very limited privacy a semitransparent glass wall right next the the bed  this was not a major issue for us but is definitely worth being aware of brThank you for your kind hospitality and we would happily stay again on our next visit to Tokyo

Although many restaurants around the apartment its very convenient for food but the apartment located above the two BBQ restaurants all the smoke came into the room the smoke normally end until 1am when the restaurant closed From time to time the customers smoke outside the restaurant then u can smell them too brSince the lower floor are restaurants u can hear the noise starting in the morning about 9am U can hear them clearly pulling something from downstairs brOverall the room is a bit dusty the floor is old  I would rather prefer to spend the same amount of money on hotel
Great place

Dont walk RUN to this Airbnb This place was a dream The bed was pure comfort the amenities were outstanding we loved the personal outside terrace and the bathroom was fantastic No tricky water heater to deal with as its built in We had an issue with the washer while we were here and our host was amazing with helping us The area is calm and relaxing and its very close to transport as well We did not want to leave Seriously its perfect for a couple as the bathroom is seethrough  Also it was very close to great Michelin star restaurants The place had a microwave fridge hotpot and dishes so you could enjoy food however you like The lighting coming through the huge windows is so nice both day and night Highly recommend
Great location beautiful space

My wife and I stayed here for 6 days during Sakura season and we had a blast If you stayed here for 6 months you still would not be able to visit every restaurant or bar or cute shop in that time The neighborhood was BUSTLING  I loved running every morning by the canal and there are nearby parks to visit as well The train station was close and connected with lots of other stations The balcony with plants was a beautiful space to have coffee Best of all is the GREAT shower that had good pressure and lots of hot water

This place is really great Modern clean close to public transportation and excellent restaurants Host was responsive and accommodating Short train ride and easy transfer to Yamanote line Loved our stay and would definitely recommend
This place was great Would absolutely stay again

This was our third time staying at Mass place and we absolutely love it Such a great central area to make your base in Tokyo and extremely spacious apartment with very comfortable bed Well definitely be staying here again

This was the perfect introduction to Tokyo for us The location cant be beat and some of the best dining in the city is within a 2 minute walk Every night I looked forward to coming back and roaming the back alleys of Kagurazaka  which quickly become my favorite neighborhood in all of Tokyo Our host even helped us with a last minute dinner reservation I would stay again in a heartbeat
Such a gem and very well located Also love the super late night ramen spots nearby

A lovely gem tucked away in Shinjuku My friend and I stayed here for 4 nights and we enjoyed it Lots of amazing restaurants and cafes in this area of Shinjuku After a very long day in Tokyo it was wonderful to come home and unwind in the very comfy penthouse Masaharu was super responsive and even accomodated for a later check out time because of our flight Definitely recommend this stay if you are visiting Tokyo
We loved it Great location 5 min walk to the metro Lots of restaurants in the area Veryyy spacious good for two people Well definitely book it on our next visit

This studio apartment was perfect for our 3 night stay in Tokyo Located off a really quaint alley with restaurants and other businesses but a quieter environment that was more peaceful than many of the busier main streets nearby in the district The apartment was wellappointed and had everything we needed  great design modern with some traditional elements and use of space  The apartment really is not near the main Shinjuku area different metro stop but its only a short walk to the metro and is centrally located to see Tokyo We were very pleased with our experience at this Airbnb and with this host

The room is spacious and the perfect size for two people and possibly a child David and his family are exceptionally welcoming and i cant thank them enough for the local knowledge the meal him and his wife prepared for us and the overall hospitality

The room is spacious and the perfect size for two people and possibly a childDavid and his family are exceptionally welcoming and i cant thank them enough for the local knowledge the meal him and his wife prepared for us and the overall hospitality

도쿄를 여행하면서 도쿄의 일반 가정을 볼 수 있는 것은 아주 좋은 경험이었습니다 집 구조나 일본 주택이 가지고 있는 장점을 직접 체험할 수 있어 아주 좋았습니다David Sheng의 집은 일본에 사는 중국인 가족의 집입니다 도쿄를 여행중이면서도 중국인들과 소통하는 다양한 문화적 기회를 얻은 것 같아서 좋았습니다여성으로 일본에 혼자 여행을 하면서 조금 무섭기도 했습니다 하지만  David Sheng과 그의 가족들 덕분에 안전하게 보호받고 있다는 느낌을 받을 수 있었습니다 교통이 편리합니다 메구로역을 지나가는 도쿄메트로의 남북선과 미타선이 있어서 도쿄의 어느곳이든 접근하기 쉽습니다David Sheng의 집이 있는 무사시코야마역 바로 앞에는 아주 큰 시장이 있습니다 일본 시장을 경험할 수 있고 편하게 먹을 수 있는 식당 쇼핑 거리가 많아서 좋습니다David Sheng이 자전거를 빌려줘서 유용하게 썼습니다 자전거가 없었다면 자동차만 타고 다니면서 일본의 거리를 경험하지 못했을 것 같아요 다 걸어 다닐 수도 없고 하지만 자전거를 타고 다니면서 구석구석 좋은 추억을 남길 수 있었습니다두명의 아이들이 있습니다유치원생입니다어린이들이지만 이 방이 있는 3층에서 주로 시간을 보내는 것이 아니라서 조용한 시간을 방해받지는 않았습니다 David Sheng 가족이 불꽃놀이축제나 마을 축제 등 좋은 정보를 알려주어서 좋은 시간을 보낼 수 있었습니다 방에 책상이 없어서 조금 불편했습니다 17일간의 긴 일정이었고 공부를 하러 갔는데 책상이 없어서 침대를 이용했습니다 책상이 생긴다면 참 좋겠네요햇살이 많이 들어오는 방입니다 환기도 잘됩니다

Id just like to say a big thank you to David his wife Amanda and their two lovely children for making my stay in Tokyo so rewarding I was only in Japan for three weeks and was out of Tokyo for a couple of weekends but David and Amandas hospitality advice and guidance made my stay feel much more homely than just a string of tourist trips Amandas cooking is also very good which was a real bonus I have some allergies and David and Amanda were very understanding about these which made my life a lot easier as did Amandas help in finding places for me to buy some of the British foods I usually eat on a regular basis though I ate Japanese most of the timeMusashiKoyama is a nice place to stay in itself but just as importantly for me it was quick and easy to get into central Tokyo by train  Meguro station is just a few minutes up the line and getting around the Yamanote line to places like Shibuya Shinjuku and Akihabara was no problem at all and really cheap Just as quick was Shinagawa for the Shinkansen lines down to the south of Japan which I used a couple of timesAll in all Im very happy to recommend a stay with David Amanda and their two children  theyre a lovely family helpful welcoming and friendly

David and his family are some of the most kindest and generous people I have ever met They made us feel so welcome and apart of his family We cannot ask for a better host as David and his family reached our expectations above and beyond what we could ever imagine I now feel apart of their family and will stay in contact as much as possible when I go back home Whenever I am back in Tokyo David and Amandas home will be the one and only place I will wish to stay Amanda is also an amazing cook and can sing many songs so well which made our stay fun my partner and I both got to experience some ChineseJapanese food which was amazing David has a lot of knowledge for site seeing and getting around and was so welcoming and polite to me and my partner The kids are too much fun and always are smiling and playing with us and we loved every single second of being with there familybrSo be smart and stay with David and Amanda because they are the best

Great place Dvid and his family were hosipitable to offer me dinner after i arrived I had a lot of fun chatting with amanda and learning abt the family David was great to send me back my belongings to singapore Thanks again both will visit japan and your place again
David is a nice guy His room is very comfortable

It was a great Tokyo treat The room is clean and cozy friendly David and Amanda welcomed us and offer bicycles for us to travel around the city giving us little tips and tricks We had good times chatting with Amanda and it felt like we were long lost friend Staying with David and family for 4 nights in their down to earth and warm crib made our trip a happy and easy one Best wishes to the family

It was my first airbnb booking and first time in Japan everything was great David and Amanda helped me with all info about how to get easily around in Tokyo and the stay with them was very pleasant thank you David and Amanda hope to see you again

Thank you for for sharing your lovely home with us david and amanda We thoroughly enjoyed the bicycle tour with you around your neighbourhood You both have been very helpful and generous during our stay and the children are very entertaining and wellbehaved The room is both spacious and comfortable Domo arigato lukeweiming

We had a good time with David family during our stay at his cozy place  A quick access from the station but yet in a quiet neighborhood  David replied as rapid for any of our concerns and put extra works and response from the reservation  His wife made us a very special meal with reasonable price and it was like a house warming  They also have a beautiful children but kept our privacy as wellWe would love to come back again and call our home  We look forward to see you soon
Great family Great WelcomeThe bedroom is spacious and the house is close to the center This is perfect to discover TokyoI will come back

David and Amanda are warm and friendly and go out of their way to make sure you are happy They speak great English   Their children are adorable even though we could only really communicate in sign language  The kichen is small but they made room for me to cook lent me a bike and rain poncho and personally took  me to all the food stores I needed Theres a flight of stairs up to the house and another in the house up to the bedroom good to know if you have a heavy suitcase  I hope the room with them will be available when I come back to Tokyo

We had a great time at Daves flat in Meguro Its located close to party places Ebisu Roppongi and Shibuya approx 30 mins by public transportation Meguro is a residential area with various restaurants and a beautiful park around Dave and Amanda were both extremely helpful and we were really grateful for all their support and for sharing their life with the kids with us for one week They also offered us breakfats and dinner which came really handy during the first daysFrom a costvalue perspective this apartment is unbeatable highly recommended to anyone who just want a shelter to sleep at while exploring Tokyo

David and Amanda were amazing hosts The location was very convenient for getting around the city and was extremely safe Excellent food and shops just a 5 minute walk away Plenty of space and very clean as well I fell ill upon arrival and David and Amanda went out of their way to call doctors and hospitals for me They even went as far as to lend me a phone with Google Maps so I could find my way to the clinic while they were at work Wonderful people I highly recommend
The host is friendly  the room is clean The room rate very reasonable walking distance to train station retails and food stores

David  Amanda are lovely hosts and really make you feel at home They helped us with directions and posting items to my friend in Himeji The house is very convenient for travelling in and out of Tokyo Harajuku Shinjuku  Shibuya as well as being within an hours train ride to Disneyland The room was clean and the sheets were very fresh and cosy Amanda  David were always willing to help us find a good restaurant near the house and we frequented the Ramen shop within a 5 minute walk We look forward to staying there again in the future

Staying here was a warm welcome to japan The place is quaint but has everything you need It is a short walk to the station which has all sorts of amazing food and little things to do and then only two stops to the yamanote line which will get you anywhere you could want to go Also David had made an infinite number of photographic instructions to help you use everything around the house ie washing machine and hot water David Amanda and their two kids were lovely and friendly hosts we would definitely stay there again next time
We stayed with David twice during our visit to Japan and each time was a pleasure see my previous review

We really enjoyed the stay at the place of David Amanda and their childrenTheir kids were just a little older than our son and it was so nice to see them playing together Schan and Ykun were very kind and shared their toys and books with our son   they played had some fight about some toys saw TV together etcWe had an unique opportunity to spend the New Year together The two families were gathered around a big table and invited each other for some food and had a very good time David and Amanda are very easy cheerful and friendly people and this is a definitely a place wed like to come back to again They are very understanding about how a couple traveling with kids thinkbehave which made it so easy for usThe location is very good if for experiencing everyday life of Japan but close to many places for a city life If you are not afraid of long walks Shubuya and Jiyugaoka are can be reached within 1 hour of walking we didIf you wish to cook its good to exchange some words with AmandaDavid in advance so the kitchen slot and the use of utensils such as use of rice cooker wont collide
My family and I had a great time with David in Tokyo Him and his family were great hosts and were very accommodating in helping us to navigate the city I would definitely recommend a stay with him

We stay in Davids house for two days a simple feedback cozy easy to locate near the station apprx 10 minutes  there also a very helpfull police station just across the station to make it even easier to find the area and have a quite complete environment for stay even in the midnightbrHave couples of convenient store that open until midnight near the house and there is vending machine exactly at the front of Davids house so you could buy bottled drink anytimebrDavid and Amanda were very welcome to us and their children were a lil bit shy and cute brWe arrived around midnight at Davids house yet He still waiting for us with his warm welcome Sorry and thank you David _brKinda starving since we just arrived from a long trip and havent eat anything almost for the last 12 hours and David offer us to show around to buy some food and we decided to have bento dinner and by the love of god it is soooo gooodbrWhile enjoying our meal we have chit chat and David give us some advise on our itinerary for the next day and also show us around his house after we finish the meal how to use hot tub microwave water dispenser etcbrStay here for two days is completing our First Journey in Japan  Sure well comebackbrAnd if David  his family tend to visit Jakarta please do not hesitate to contact us I insist _

Davids house is great to stay especially when you want a quiet neighborhood in the hustle and bustle Tokyo Its not far from the downtown Tokyo though There is a gorgeous park nearby You can take a walk and jog You can also enjoy the trees sunshine and your leisure time there The more important is that David and Amanda are so warmhearted They will give you whatever information you want about Tokyo and Japan They will also help you with everything to the tiniest detail At this place you can feel the warmth of a family and play with the two lovely kids Im happy to meet them and be friends with them I will definitely come back again

Davids house is great the room has everything that you need the house is clean and quiet David also gave us a really helpful guide for using the bathroom the appliances and a lot of other things from his house David and Amanda are excellent host theyre very kind and easy going we felt very comfortable with them David and Amanda were very helpful and they went above and beyond to make us feel like we were at home also they were very nice and caring with our little girl and with us For us the location is perfect the streets around are very calm and quiet the train station is just a few blocks away and the Palm pedestrian shopping street which is located next to the Musashikoyama train station is a great place to find almost everything the area has a lot of restaurants and convenience stores Were extremely happy with David and his family well always have great memories from our stay at Davids house and his Family Well definitely make a reservation again with David for our next visit to TokyoAlonso Noy and Aoi

I am writing here to recommend David to all of the airbnb user  I just spent 6 nights with David and his family  I felt  That  I am not alone when I traveling in Tokyo  they made me like old friends They help me lot   offer me pocket wifi for explor city  And I should say thank you to  Mei  here  thank you for spend your weekend time shopping with me  hope we can each other in Tokyo or Shanghai again

David has a beautiful family His wife Amanda cooks very delicious their children are friendly and very quiet David helped us a lot in various things and even took us shopping aroundThe room is very comfortable and the location of the house is excellent there is everything nearbyin general they are excellent hosts we shared great moments with themWe hope to keep in touch and meet again1000 Recommended
We love so much Davids family and place that we decided to come back

David and his family are great The kids are so fun and they are very gracious hostsThe rooms is clan and very comfortable beds There is a great heater in the room for winter Very comfortable all round Good privacy if needed alsoThe train station is in such a good location Two quick trains to Shibuya Its PerfectWe had a great time staying with David and you should too

David and Amanda are excellent host they are very friendly and helpful and made us feel like home my partner and I had a pleasant stay and that made our trip even better Their house is only 5 mins walk from the nearest metro station and easy access to other lines and close to the center of Tokyo One thing I appreciate the most is I was sick while I was staying in Tokyo and needed to find a nearest English speaking hospital luckily Amanda was really helpful and assisted me to communicate in Japanese and connected me with the right people so that I could get diagnosed at the same morning I am truly grateful about the care and effort thanks a lot  Staying with David  Amanda is highly recommended and hope to see you both soon maybe later this year Koni  Joao

We stayed at Davids place for 2 nights its location is convenient There is a community shopping street which we enjoy so much of shopping  We spent a great time with Davids family and his friends for a dinner really happy to meet with them  We are highly recommend Davids place

David and his family are very nice peoplebrThe instructions to get to their house are really acurate it was simple to find itbrThe room was very clean you can adjust the heat at your convenience The bathroom is cleanbrYou can get a pocket wifi as long as you stay at Davids house its really convenientbrIt was a really nice experience

We stayed with David for 5 days in early March The house is located not to far away from all the places we wanted to visit in Tokyo with a good connection from the local toei station We traveled over meguro to other places most of the timeDavid and Amanda are very welcoming and friendly helping us get reservations for a fugu restaurant thanks for that giving advice on which places to visit and how to get there as well as inviting us to have cake which was hand made by Amanda with themDavid and Amanda speak English Chinese and JapaneseThe house is near a toei line station as well as a shopping streetHighly recommend to stay here when visiting Tokyo
Très bon accueil chez David et Amanda  Merci pour cette semaine à Tokyo brSée you soon

David and Amanda were very friendly and accommodating Their house is nice and in a good location There are lots of restaurants and shops nearby and its easy to get a train to anywhere you need to go in Tokyo I had a great time staying there and I wish I would have stayed longer

David  his family were a complete joy to stay with My boyfriend and I stayed with him at his home in Meguro for 2 weeks We spent a lot of time away from the home and were always happy to return to our lovely quiet room with 2 comfortable single beds The pocket wifi that David provides is incredibly helpful to anyone journeying around Tokyo he even let us bring it with us to Kyoto He had a lot of insights to share and assisted us whenever we needed a local perspective His home is near to a train station so no need to take any bus We consider David and his family to be friends of ours now and hope to see them again on our next trip to Tokyo

My husband and I stayed 6 nights in David and Amandas home It was our second time in Tokyo and first time to use Airbnb We felt very welcome and comfortable with them like we were staying with good friends Both David and Amanda are very friendly knowledgeable and helpful and they recommended lots of different places for us to visit and assisted us with making bookings Having their pocket wifi for our whole stay was extremely handy David and Amanda have two very sweet kids and one of the highlights of our trip was a bike ride with their family on a Sunday morning around Meguro area We had so much fun and felt like locals The next time we visit Japan we wouldnt hesitate to stay at David and Amandaa home again

The time in Davids house was incredible David is a excellent host very helpfulAmanda is also very helpful the kids are very lovely and well educatedMy stay was perfect and ill sure come back someday if possible

Its a very comfortable to live in Davids home David is very friendly and enthusiastic to answer any questionsMore importantly David helped me buy a  Ghibli Museum ticket from the  auction websiteMeet cherry blossom again next year

Ive stayed in Davids apartment for 3 nights The room was clean and its easy to access to the station Musashiyama and Meguro line5 mins If you want to go to Shinagawa or just transfer to the other main station its not so difficult In Tokyo it usually takes 1020 mins to walk from your house to get the closest station so its really located in a good area This is a very quiet area so if you dont like noise I highly recommend to stay hereDavid and his wife are nice and helpful especially when we could talk in Japanese and Chinese I felt like that I just stay my home When I travel alone sometimes I need a place just like home to make me relax Im happy to choose  to stay here and spent 3 nights with their lovely children Their are shy but they will be curious about where youre from and draw something as a welcome gift for you Dont worry theyre good children

It was a nice experience staying at Davids house and getting to meet his familyThe neighbourhoor isnt exactly at a hotspot though only away some stations from Meguro and Shibuya It was nice for us to first arrive in a more quiet place as we had a trip of 3 weeks in Japan The house is kind of small at least for european standarts If youre 2 people and need the other bed only one will be able to open up their suitcase at one time it was like this with our big ones Also the house isnt that soundproofed as most japanese houses so you should be ok with being quiet if the family is asleep and using ear plugs if you want to sleep in as for example the kids are around and playing if they are not in schoolSpeaking of the family they were absolutely nice and tried to help us with everthing coming up we wanted to visit a sumo tournament and David got me all the information I needed We even had a great chinese dinner with the whole family Amanda and David make you feel like a part of their family while the stay  The kids are used to travellers and even though they are too young to understand English that well they will want to play with you and normally wont be shy at all It was a great opportunity to meet this gorgeous chinese family in Tokyo and to get to know about two different asian cultures at the same timeThanks again for having us

We stayed at David and his lovely familys place for 4 nights with our 19 month old daughter David and Amanda were the perfect hosts they gave us so much advice directions research etc it was truly fantastic for us and helped us make the most of our time in Tokyo We even borrowed their bikes w child seat and set off on a trip along the river one of our highlights The location was fantastic their house super cosy the beds comfortable and our daughter made two new best friends and was very sad to leave as were we Thank you David and Amanda for making our holiday so special We miss you

David and Amanda are very nice and open and we felt really welcome the whole time of our stay The children are really lovely and open too and we had a lot of fun when the whole family joined us at the climbing gym It really feels like having made new friends and we hope to see them again in Vienna some time soon

We had a very nice stay with David and his family They were very welcoming and accommodating One morning they let us watch a world cup game in the living room while they were getting ready for work and school The pocket WiFi and bikes were also very nice perks Meguro is a pretty quiet residential neighborhood
Very nive staying Much bigger room than average Japanese hotel room size
une famille genial  avec un papa super

It was a really nice stay there David were not there but he let me his house He is really friendly and I got a warm welcome from him and his wifeperfect indications to go to his house situated in a quiet neighborhood of Tokyo

We enjoyed our stay at Davids home in Meguro David was prompt in all communications and the pdfs he sent on how to get to his home and how to use the appliances were all very clear and helpful He was very accommodating We were the only ones in his home at the time of our stay but we wished he and his family had been there as he was so friendly and we would have loved to meet them all

I stayed in Davids house for three nights which were my very first nights in Japan Although I arrived late David waited for me and everything since then was as described that is comfortable friendly and pleasant The room is practical and large enough and the house is in a quiet neighbourhood 5 minutes from the metro station restaurants and shops David and his wife speak English and know the city also from a nonJapanese perspective which was interesting and useful To sum up I highly recommend the Davids place
我和孩子在David家度过了愉快的5天David和夫人的热情友好的接待和关照让我们在东京的旅行变得温馨和快乐下次去东京旅行我还是希望能住在这里期待着我们再次相聚br
David and Amanda made me a great welcome feeling like homebrThe place is quiet and nice the house really convenient and the bed perfect to sleepbrI warmly recommand to pass by their house
Hi David我們平安回來台灣了這幾天我們都很晚回去希望沒吵到你和Amanda兩個可愛的小孩與你的父母親每天都很晚回去沒能好好的與你們聊天有些可惜頭一次生日在國外度過很感謝你們特地準備的東西謝謝你們準備的生日蛋糕與免費Pocket WiFi這幾天真的很謝謝你和Amanda希望短時間能有機會再去東京再與你們聊聊謝謝你們義晏  家莉 20140904

The room was clean an comfortable I slept very well  David was a good host and very friendly  He invited me to join other guests for a meal unfortunately I had to leave early that dayThe pocket WiFi was great Internet access for foreigners seems to be a pain in Japan eg there isnt a culture of cafés with free WiFiDavid sent great instructions for walking to the apartment from the train station pictures at every turn with landmarks pointed outNote that the shower and sink are shared and are one floor below this room  But theres a toilet and a small place to wash your hands on the same floor as this room  Also you will be climbing two flights of stairs to get from ground level to the apartmentI would definitely stay here again because the location is convenient and the room was comfortable

David and his family were very welcoming and I had the pleasure of joining them and some of their extended family and friends for dinner one night David was really easy to talk to his wife was very kind and stayed up until 1am to greet me after my flight was delayed They took great care to see that I was ok and as for the children well theyre certainly full of beans brThe room was simple but had all the things you need brHouse is in great location too Dont be put off by the way the map looks  its so easy to get to Shibuya Shinjuku and other hot spots yet you are in a really cool little suburb with some very atmospheric streets and an absolutely wonderful authentic Onsen nearbybrA truly great stay

It was such a nice stay at davids place The room is clean and spacious David and Amanda is very nice and helpful I feel safe and relax staying here for 16 days The house is very closely to the station its very convenient and i love the neighborhood
Nice hosts and cute family Small room but clean and tidy Mobile Wifi available and useful David could be reached easily
David和Amanda的家人都很友好每次发信都很快回复还耐心解答了各种问题房间的地点离地铁站也比较近是很安静的居民区比较可惜的是没时间再在附近的街道逛逛了有些商铺和商业街看着还挺不错的呢

David is very hospitable and kind We stayed here for our last night in Japan before flying back home And we reached Tokyo from Kyoto quite late and he stayed up to wait Thank you David for your generosity and hospitality

We enjoyed our stay in Davids home  we loved to eat together with the family  japanese and chinese food The house is close to a subway station and not too far from a JR line so it was rather convenient for us to visit Tokyo Moreover we had very nice chat with David and Amanda

This is a good experience to stay with a stranger in which eventually turn to be your friend David and Amanda are wonderful host  We spent the whole Sunday to cycle around the area The park closed to the house is a good place for kids My sons want to go there everyday we were there

A lovely home in a quiet neighbourhood We felt very welcome as soon as we arrived David and Amanda were really helpful with local recommendations Theres so much to do within a short walk of the house but its also very peaceful at night so we slept very well We had breakfast with the family and they always served very tasty food and new things for us to try The pocket wifi was also a must for us to get around Tokyo Everything we needed for our stay

Davids place gets my five starsWhile the room is small and certainly not luxurious it clean cozy and definitely worth the price He and his wife Amanda helped us feel at home and were able to answer all of our questions as newcomers to Japan Davids English is quite good and chatting with him at night sometimes was very pleasant The kitchen was small but wellequipped which let us easily cook some of our own mealsThe single bed is too small for two to sleep in comfortably so the place is not quite ideal for couples For a single person or for two friends though who dont mind the small space it would be perfectThe only big downside is that with a small house and thin walls you dont get much privacy You always have to be careful of how much noise youre making especially with Davids young children in the houseThe location is really great with a metro station just a five minute walk away With a PasmoSuica card you can get on and off easily and cheaply wherever you want in Tokyo There is a great mall next to the metro station called Palm Street nearby with lots of good cheap restaurants and food markets The neighbourhood is quiet clean very pretty and has almost no other tourists giving you an authentic feel for Japanese life in TokyoThanks David
住户是在一片很安静的居民区距离日比谷线中目黑站大约10分钟脚程总体来说干净整洁地段好最后一晚david还特地过来看望我们和我们进行沟通还告诉我们去机场的路线和帮忙预定计程车感觉很温馨
David and Amanda are very friendly and helpful people their place is cosy and location wise is awesome I would absolutely recommend their place to others who are planning to visit Tokyo

David was very welcoming to our family The Ramen near his home was so delicious It took a bit of time to figure out how to get to his house but once you find it the location is superb It is near many local eateries which made it feel like we were able to experience community life in Japan you will see lots of bikers children and people greeting each other in the street This place is good for families to stay  My baby appreciated the heater and sound system in the bathroom too
David and Amanda were so nice The room is cozy We will definitely come again

This was our first Airbnb stay  David Amanda and their kids made us feel very welcome We arrived late at night and David was still awake showing us around the house The room we stayed in was very comfortable and all the information provided prior to arriving was handy The room is conveniently located near the station with shops nearby David guided us around the neighbourhood and lent us their bikes We had a lovely lunch with them and their children were very friendly Highly recommend for anyone to stay with them

The place at Davids home was great it was easy to get to I carried a larger than necessary luggage and really appreciated it when David helped me with it Both David and his wife Amanda made the stay very welcome and warm Amanda was really concerned when she realized that I had a cold and I really appreciated it
房东人很好住得很舒服交通便利附近有条街可以吃饭买药妆非常棒
房子所在的街区非常安静舒适走在这样的小道上心情舒畅房东的房间也非常干净住宿体验很不错另外房东人超好提供了很多很多有用的信息给我

David is the best He accepts instant booking which was a real benefit to me because I needed a place fast Hell send you very detailed instructions to get to his place which is only a 5 minute walk from the subwayDavid lives in a charming very walkable neighborhood Its full of narrow charming streets and Tokyo citizens going about their day on foot and bike There are great cafes and restaurants nearby including Jazz Cafe which is a must visit Ask them to put on your fave jazz artist and sit back and enjoy the giant speakers and good coffeeBack to David Hell provide you pocket wifi and a bicycle to use Theres an amazing park 5 minutes North of Davids place and I spent an afternoon riding around it on Davids bicycleOn my last night there David invited me to join him and his family for a traditional Osaka dinner It was delicious and a nice chance to talk to David and his wife and to play with his young childrenIf you need absolute quiet this wont be the place for you as David has loud kids and kids make noise I found it nice to be around the sounds of a young family again but you should know this beforehandId definitely stay with David again

I loved everything about the house I loved Davids family His son was so welcoming He has a daughter who doesnt talk much but shes so cute that it makes me want to have a baby girl His wife was outstanding She took care of me all the time as David had to work all day long She even asked me to take an umbrella as it was pouring the day I was leaving I had some great time chatting with David as well The neighborhood is safe and has the best noodles in Tokyo Overall it was a 5star experience I cant wait to get back there

This is the second time we visit DavidAmandas house Like the last time we felt welcomed and enjoyed the stay   the area the house and the time together This year I got lecture in making of Chinese dumplings and our son went to park togather with their kids 　The Sheng family are warm and friendly and I would especially recommend families with children to stay here Well be back

Staying at Davids place was a real pleasure Our room was  very comfortable and the heater and thick blankets got us through the cold Tokyo winter David is a very friendly guy who responded quickly on my messages The instructions to get to the house a very clear and David made sure that we arrived fine since he was not home himself brAlso I can recommend to have breakfast at home David cooks a wonderful meal so you start your sightseeing day full of energy brThe pocket wifi that is provided although you pay separately for it is a very handy tool thatll help you find your way in the city brMeguro the area around the house is a very friendly and quiet neighborhood There should be a nice onsen nearby unfortunately we didnt have the time to try it brAll in all a lovely stay with David and his family
David and his wife were extremely accommodating to me They greeted me with a home cooked meal and were very warm Though I could not stay for my entire trip I would love to return and stay here again

David and his wife are amazing  they are really friendly and helpful We really enjoyed our stay at their place and totally recommend itThey provided detailed instructions before arriving as well as towels and a hair dryer The option to rent pocket wifi was very helpful as well During the cold winter days the room was warm

David and his family are simply awesome We stayed in his room for a night and I felt that we belong Thanks for making us feel loved The listing is very close to a park with a lot of sakura trees dont miss it out Definitely recommend

La chambre est très bien les lits sont confortables il y a tout ce quil faut David et Amanda sont très accueillants et disponibles toujours prêts à répondre à nos questions ou nous conseiller sur des adresses  La maison est dans une rue très calme dans être trop loin du métro même sil y a un peu de marche
David和他的太太是非常好的房東對於我的在東京的任何問題提供的非常大的幫助兩個孩子超可愛的我好喜歡他們 房子的位置相當方便附近還有許多日本人才知道的賞櫻景點謝謝你們讓我在東京有一個很難忘的假期  如果有來台灣請一定要讓我知道我再帶你們去吃喝玩樂

Davids place is near the metro where there are many food options The room in Davids house is also very tidy and he and wife tried their best to make our stay an enjoyable one by being very helpful and accommodating David also ensured that we arrived safely at his place even though it was quite late at night brThanks for the stay Itll definitely be one of the top few places on my list when Im back in Tokyo Cheers

Es importante recalcar que todo lo que David indica en su anuncio es lo que recibesLa habitación está en un tercer piso fue un poco complicado subir mi equipaje pero el espacio que tiene uno a su disposición es amplio limpio y fresco Hay aire acondicionado y calefacción no obstante no lo usé La cama era lo suficientemente caliente y cómoda para dormir bienEs fácil llegar a su casa desde la estación de tren Musashi Koyama Hay una amplia variedad de restaurantes muy cerca de su casa y un increíble mercado muy cerca de la estaciónPuedes explorar la zona la cual es sumamente segura en bicicleta  experiencia única  Tokio es muy seguro es algo importante a mencionarEn cuanto a mi experiencia dentro de la casa David y Amanda fueron increíblesComo unos segundos padres para mi Algo que deben probar es la comida de Amanda sencillamente deliciosaConsidero enriquecedor el haber compartido mi tiempo para dialogar con ellos  sobre la vida en Japón y China así como sus recomendaciones de qué lugares visitar dónde es rico comer qué rutas o trenes tomar para ir a un lugar realmente valió la pena  Fui sola a vacacionar a Japón y esta hermosa familia realmente hizo mi viaje

Thanks for all again  I had a great stay in Tokyo The house is fine and well placed its easy to get the Subway and the neighborhood is very calm Davids familly is really gentleI have really enjoyed to use your bicycle

David y Amanda son muy atentos y buenos Con las indicaciones de la guía de David para llegar a su casa llegamos perfectamente y el Wifi portátil es un plus El barrio es tranquilo el metro está a 5 minutos andando de la casa y está bien comunicado para ir a cualquier zona importante de TokioEso sí las fotos no se corresponden con la habitación todo está bastante desordenado en la casa en general no demasiado limpio Además solo hay un baño completo que hay que compartir con toda la familia y era fácil coincidir lo que lo hace un poco incómodo

DavidAmanda and their kids are very nice and friendly which make my gf and i feel like staying at homebrSadly we have a tight travel program and cant spend more time togetherbrWe love to play with their kids and have a chance to take them to school which is a nice experiencebrThe location is very nice for whom who try to avoid busy streets in Tokyo like us Just a few minutes to nice location such as Nakameguro  Daikanyama  Jiyugaoka Its a new perspective of the busy Tokyo lifebrFor us here is the great place to stay in TokyobrThank you to you guys again
데이비드와 아마다는 무척 친절한 사람들이었습니다방도 무척 밝았으며 위치또한 좋아서 여행하는데 편했습니다불편한 점이 없는지 계속 체크를 해주는 부분들도 고마웠습니다샤워실을 같이 쓴다는점이 다소 불편하긴 했지만 많은 배려를 받았기 때문에 그 부분은 장점에 비하면 무척 사소한 부분이었습니다나중에 여행을 하게 되면 다시 찾고 싶을정도도 괜찮은 사람들이었습니다
房子位子很方便房間很舒適David夫妻人很好還有一對可愛的兒女這幾天很照顧我們有困難也很熱心的幫忙讓我們這次旅程更順利了謝謝你們
在出發前已經收到David圖文並茂的路線圖一開始就有種很體貼的感覺 這是一次很舒適的旅程 不單是因為位置十分方便也是因為就算我們晚了回去屋主夫婦都還是會跟我們聊一下當天的體驗和為我們第二天的行程給一點兒的建議豐富了旅遊的感受

David and Amanda are the most helpful and generous hosts you could ask for David  always answered our emails straight away and his directions for the train station transfers and to his house were really easy to follow He helped us with all our adventures like Disneyland and getting to Tokyo which was really appreciated The neighborhood was amazing with fascinating quiet streets and a really fun shopping strip that takes a whole day to fully appreciate There are plenty of restaurants to choose from all within 5 minutes walk of Davids placeWe had a wonderful diner with them and their beautiful children who we will miss dearly and our entire Japan holiday started off in the best possible way with David and Amanda We will definitely be back one day
David非常的熱心和友善在還沒出發前就已經收到他寄來的路線指南還幫我們買到吉卜力美術館的門票他的太太也非常親切總是笑臉迎接我們房子位在住宅區所以非常的安靜房間很大床鋪也很舒適附近的商店街很熱鬧也很好逛生活機能非常棒很棒的一次住宿體驗

We were welcomed very warmly and David and his family were very kind and helpful Its a very convenient and easy to find place and in the area are tons of places to eat and drink We enjoyed are stay very much and hope to come again
很開心及難忘的住宿體驗屋主夫婦很親切孩子們超可愛房間大而舒適地點方便車站旁的商店街很好逛有我最受愛既燒肉放題同超市感謝屋企一家人帶我們到公園放花火很好玩很想念兩個可愛的小朋友期待下次再來住宿誠信推薦給大家

David est charmant et sympathique Ambiance familialebrLogement pas tres loin de la station de train accès facile grâce aux instructions de David avant larrivée Nous avons apprécié la machine à laver qui permet de réduire les bagages

屋子位於一個十分安靜舒適的小區出行便利離涉谷新宿品川等熱門區僅十來分鐘車程附近有一個日本為數不多的天然溫泉一天暴走後晚上可以泡個地道的熱水澡然後去居酒屋小酌兩杯體驗一下日本人的下班後的生活  屋子裡面有一切生活設備房東熱情好客推薦了我們去看煙火大會真是個令人難忘的夜晚The house is located in a quiet comfortable district It is convenient to travel to different places It only takes a few minutes to get to various tourist spots like Shibuya Shinjuku and Shinagawa Station A natural hotspring can be found there which is exceptionally rare to see in Japan Taking a Japanese authentic hot bath after a long day of sightseeing is definitely a treat for the body By getting a little booze we can experience the afterwork lives of the localsAll the daily life essentials are provided by the passionate host He also recommended us to join the River Fireworks Festival leaving us an unforgettable memory

Davids place was great A very nice small room in a quiet neighborhood with EXCELLENT air conditioning David was great and very accommodating from directions to helping me out when I forgot some medicine Meguro is lovely and the pocket wifi was super helpful Cant recommend more

David is THE BEST host I have ever experienced over airbnb He is very considerate accommodate friendly and resourceful We were also so lucky to meet his cousin and his another friend They also made our trip enjoyable and full of fun memories David was so kind to offer us a free trip to Fuji mountain since his cousin is going there too and we had so much fun during that trip Moreover his friend drove us to Tsukijishijo to see the famous fish auction around 3 am And he also brought us the see the firework show and generously offered us drinks and snacks Davids room is very comfortable and you can request anything you want Thank you so much David It was such an incredible trip in Tokyo and I am looking forward to coming back to this lovely city

David and his family were all excellent hosts very welcoming and made me feel at home from the start Also thanks to David and Eric for showing me the area and taking me to authentic places that I would never have found myself

Had a great stay at Davids place It was really nice coming back to quiet Meguro after a day in central Tokyo His place within a 5 minute walk from the subway and it has a lot of great places to eat nearby David and his family were really nice and helping anytime we had a questionWould definitely recommend

We just had a very pleasant stay at Davids house We arrived late and have to catch the last train David was very helpful to guided us so we didnt get lost He even pick us up at the train station and help us carried our luggage to his home brThe room was clean and well equiped Davin even put hairdry machine and universal socket so we can charge our gadgets at the same time since we only bring one socketbrThe neighbohood was so perfect Not crowded but still interesting If you stay here dont forget to check the shopping alley near musashi koyama station so many cool store and restaurant Come on saturday and it will drain your purse i tell ya brWere so happy to stay at David house and hanging with his family His wife is so warm and friendly lady My son easily befriended with davids son If we have a chance to go back to Japan we will definetely stay at his place again Thank you so much David

Davy and Amandas place was in a nice and quiet neighbourhood It was easy to get around with pretty close public transit The hosts were available for help with planning your trip and answering your questions The room was clean had 2 twin beds and even contained a mini fridge which was quiet useful If youre interested there is a beautiful park nearby for morning walksruns as well It is a family home so if youre looking for privacy this might not be the home for you It was a pleasure meeting you guys and hope to see you again in our travels
We had a nice stay at davids place and Amanda helped us a lot during our stayAmanda sorry for the  trouble that i made that night

We enjoyed our stay at Davids house Davids family is very friendly His fluency in 3 languagesEnglish Chinese and Japanese makes it easy for anyone to ask any questions when staying over The neighbourhood is very quiet and getting to train station is very easy approx 510mins walk  There is a food street near MusashiKoyama station Be sure to visit The area is pretty central so we are able to get to most places quickly Renting us the mobile router at a cheap fee is a mega plus Davids friend Eric also helped us by sharing his experience and howto when we told him we are going to Tsukiji fish market  Thanks to him that we are able to get to the right queue for the first time I will definitely recommend this place to friends who are going to Tokyo

I had a great time staying at Davids home He is an amazing host Thanks David and Amanda for all the advices and nice moments that really made my life there much easier and I felt at home The weekend trip with your friends was really nice and allowed me to be closer to Japanese and Chinese cultureAbout the house it is located in a nice and quiet neighborhood and it is close to the train station The room is clean and comfortable However the rest of the house could be cleanerIn conclusion I would really recommend his place
Davids families are very caringThanks alotIt was also an unforgettable experience in Japan Not like traveling more like living in Japanese culture when staying in Davids place
David and his family were great Very easy going  helpful and great to talk to The neighborhood is quiet Perfect place to retreat to after a busy day in Tokyo

The description is very accurate In addition David and Amanda are excellent hosts The area is a quiet residential one but very well connected by train to the rest of TokyoWould recommend highly to any single travellers

It was really great to have stayed with David and his family it felt like home and I just love the cosy corner at their place About the neighborhood it was fantastic as it provides a break from the hustle and bustle of the city quiet neighborhood is more to what I prefer in Tokyo 7 mins walk from the nearest metro station and you can hop into some local restaurants but with nice foods nearby Thank you David and the family for the host and useful info and thanks for the homemade strawberry fruit cake during your daughters birthday That piece of cake and the sincerity behind it really warmed a lot during winter season thank you that you guys are so friendly and love seeing you again during our next trip to Tokyo

I truly had a wonderful time staying with David and his family I really enjoyed getting to know them during my short stay They were very helpful and welcoming and made my time in Tokyo so much more memorable The location is very convenient to get into central Tokyo but the neighborhood has so much to offer you might find it hard to leave If you are looking to enjoy a taste of how it would be to live in a  real neighborhood in Tokyo then I cant think of a better place to stay Unless of course Im back in Tokyo in which case youre likely to find that the room in Davids house is booked

David is a great host that he not only ensured our stay is comfortable but also provided us with useful sightseeing information The neighborhood is quiet safe and convenient to subway it also has the vibe that we can enjoy hanging around all day without getting into the city I would recommend this place for other travelers

We had a great experience staying with David and family They were very helpful in all ways and even invited us for dinner and temple visit with their friends on New Years Eve It was an awesome stay home away from home Love their children too

David and his family were very welcome to me and he kindly provided all the instruction for use of the facilities in his house Everything about the house was accurateI felt I am at home The house is very close to train I will recommend this place and I will book Davids house if I want to go to Tokyo again

David and Amanda were the nicest hosts  I wish we had stayed longer  Dinner with them was delicious and we had great conversations It was wonderful to stay with a family it really felt likes home  It was a little tricky to find so make sure you print the guide David sends you

From Taipei to Tokyo journey David family from the end of the stay on the show full of sincerity to help communication planning transportation travel planning as well as with the whole team who have always demonstrated a bed and breakfast business professional model I think I went to Japan I want to stay in their teams room in this practical too good
Amanda and David were very accommodating and helpful during and even after my stay They allowed me to store my luggage for a few days I enjoyed my stay
房东很好因为我们的房间在三楼行李箱都帮我们搬上去而且还提前给我们寄存行李在他们家还有就是床很舒服下次有机会还会入住的

David and Amenda are very friendly and very warmed welcome We checkedin very late around 12pm but they still stayed to welcome us Their room is tiny like most of Japanese house but you will surprise it is very comfortable and very clean The bathroom and shower are also the good one here And dont be surprised if you meet their very cute kids since you can see their drawing picture by their children D  Worry about raining they have umbrella ready for you in that casebrThanks David and Amenda for our perfect stay in Tokyo this times We hope to stay at your house again D

Thanks to David and Amanda everything was fine for us They were very helpful We had a short but great time in Tokyo Musashi Koyama is perfect to start sight seeing in Tokyo there is a great Ramen Restaurant in the near If we go next time to Tokyo we would stay there again Bye

All I want to say is this is the one of the best experience I had in Tokyo The families are soooooo sweet and we talked with Amandathe host every morning The kids are lovely and David was always taken care of us Location is good and their big window in the room makes you feel free  I will definitely come back Thanks so much

David et sa famille étaient très agréables et bienveillant Nous navons pas eu beaucoup de temps pour parler car nous avions un programme chargé pour visiter Tokyo Le quartier était très sympa Meguro est bien desservi au niveau des transports mais pas par une ligne JR pour les utilisateurs du Japan Rail PassNous avons passé un agréable séjour

David和她太太还有两个可爱的小朋友给我们一段超有feel的本土体验之旅房子所在的目黑区是一个安静且东京充满本地气息的区域房间一个人住会比较宽敞两个人也能装的下不过稍微充实些br距离最近的地铁站是私铁东急电鉄武藏小山站步行大约710分钟家附近有24小时便利店小型食品超市拉面店一间风格派咖啡店通常是晚上回家路上路过里面多是西方人brReally a fantastic local experience on Tokyo discovery a totally different quiet life at this huge metropolitan brif you want to find a place not like shinjuku shibuya or ginza  Meguro will be One of better solution

It was the best memories with Davids family and this house the room is clean and cozy almost same as these pictures and I could feel safe during home even when I was alone David and Amanda are really nice and easygoing They tried to make me feel free and comfortableTheir kids Dingding and DangDang are so cute and lovely even tho I can just speak a little jpnese i enjoyed communicating with them I hope they grow up wellThanks for making a good memories Ill keep in touch with you

David and his family had kindly and warmly welcomed us on our arrirvalThe appartment is positioned outside of Tokyo subway system therefore any kind of prolonged pass tickets would need to be extended to reach Tokyos subway circle For those seeking a place to lay down their head and sightsee Tokyo all day I would recommend this private room David will share his insights and provide good tips regarding your desires

Nice place good location the owner is so friendly clean and neat room close to train station
방의 호스트 데이비드와 아만다는 무척 친절했고 방이 아늑하고 정말 일본 도쿄의 일반가정을 체험 할 수 있어서 좋았습니다그리고 걸어서 10분 정도면 지하철역을 이용할 수 있고 그 역은 어느곳이든 접근하기 쉬웠습니다 도쿄에 또 온다면 이용하고 싶습니다

We had a wonderful week in Tokyo staying with David and his family They were very friendly and generous showing us a local izekaya and even taking us out on a magical night of summer festival fireworks We really felt like locals brThe Meguro neighbourhood where they live is full of great places to explore And its only two quick  cheap stops on the subway with your PasmoSuica card before youre on the JR Yamanote line and using your JR Rail Pass if you have onebrThe bedroom has perfect air con thank goodness and you have your own toilet the main bathroom is downstairs and shared with the family brWe are so grateful to David  Amanda for welcoming us to Tokyo and we had a fantastic time  highly recommend

We had a great stay with David and his lovely family  They are such nice people  The room is basic but has everything you need including airconditioning important in August  Its clean and comfy David is very knowledgeable and had some really good tips We went to a nearby local street festival on his advice that was full of wonderful traditional dancing and music It was one of the highlights of our trip  and one that our lonely planet book could never have alerted us to Thank you David
davy和amanda夫妇人都很好民宿离地铁站走路大概七分钟到各个地方都还是比较方便的地铁站旁边有条商店街药妆超市muji饭店应有尽有是一次很愉快的入住体验

love stay here clean and big

the best place ever the house is clean near the station convenient theres a lot of stores and groceries nearby having a free parking saves me a lot specially in Tokyo thats why i recommend this place

駅から比較的近くコンビニもすぐそばにあるので場所の利便性はとてもいいですアメニティも揃っているのでタオルやシャンプーボディソープといった準備も特に必要なく宿泊できます4家族子ども連れ７歳６歳３歳２歳０歳で宿泊しましたがお部屋も広くとても綺麗で快適に過ごせましたまたチェックアウトからチェックインまでタイムリーかつ丁寧に説明していただけるのでとても安心して利用することができましたチェックアウト時にこちらの不手際でご迷惑をおかけしたのにも関わらず気持ちの良いご対応をしていただき本当に素晴らしいホストさんです久しぶりに出会う友人とのお泊まり会だったのですが記念に残る日にすることができましたどうもありがとうございます

We had an amazing stay at Davids house  With 7 of us including two young kids my parents and sister the house was able to accommodate all of us comfortably It was a luxury to have several bathrooms and the kitchen was wellstocked  The house is easily walkable to the subway station which is only a few stops away from Shinjuku Shibuya etc  It was very easy to get around and visit places all over TokyobrWe also really appreciated Davids hospitality  He met us on the first day and introduced us to an amazing food market right around the corner from the house with literally the best Fuji apples weve ever had and very reasonably priced  He also showed us Palm Ave and recommended a delicious hot pot restaurant  David was very responsive whenever we had any questions  We also appreciate that he had a more flexible cancellation policy as compared to other AirBnb hosts  That was a big reason for us including the other great reviews here for booking with him    We would highly recommend his place and stay there again in a heartbeat
Great house i can cook near sevel n coffee shop we love it

Love the neighborhood Spacious bedrooms Love the balcony and there are more than enough toilets for everyone Short walking distance to the train station Theres a vending maching right infront the house and a block away from the nearest convenience store local market and restaurants David as a host was superb

Everybody in our group enjoyed staying at Davids place which everthing we needed and much more The location is fantastic and we were able to make couple of friends in the area I for one enjoy walking so on my free time away from my group I would walk far distances from the apartment and while walking around I discovered a couple of hidden gems as far as shops and restaurants goes David made everything go smoothly you couldnt ask for a better host than him I am looking forward to staying at this location again if David would host us again on our future Japan trip

ホストのDavidさんのお人柄もホスピタリティもよくはじめてAirbnbを利用した私にとってはとても安心できましたbr立地は庶民の味方の平和通り商店街まで徒歩１分でセブンイレブンもあり飲食物の買い出しはとても便利ですbr昔ながらの商店街で東京の便利な一等地にこんな商店街があるのかと昭和時代へタイムスリップができるとおもいますbr今回はあんきも魚の鮟鱇のキモと生カキなどの鍋を作りました食材もとても安く買えるのでコストパフォーマンスがbrとてもよかったですなおこの商店街は月曜から土曜は１８時くらいで終わるので注意しください日曜は基本的にお休みbrですなおテーブルコンロや土鍋包丁などすべて揃っておりますので食材だけ買えば料理も可能です調味料や油もbrありましたbr
A house with great amenities and located in a quiet neighborhood

Davids house is situated in a quiet neighborhood which is just a short walk from the train station Theres a vending machine right in front of the house and a nearby grocery Convenience stores and restaurants are also within walking distancebrThe house is cozy and has everything you need The ground floor is a garage On the second floor theres the toilet and bath laundry area kitchen small living room and the Japanese style bedroom On the third floor are two toilets one shower room and one big Lshaped room with two doors separated by a screen divider creating two bedrooms Theres also a balcony adjacent to the longer side of the room where you can dry your laundrybrDavid is a good host and answers queries right away I would definitely recommend his place

This house is a good choice for big group Quite big than normal Japanese house and convenient to transport to public train I really impressed with a lot of toilets and shower rooms Such a great one highly recommended
东京行第一站来到DAVID家能在大东京有一所小房子实在过隐我们一行4大3小刚刚好二楼是我们的超大厨房连日式客厅三楼两个房间还有相连小朋友玩得很开心离地铁站很近几站就到涩谷和新宿了旁边有餐厅和超市想要体验当地人生活是首选我们此行在地铁站丢失了背包DAVID帮我们做了很多工作虽然没找着但每次须要帮助都会得到帮忙谢谢DAVID希望下次在去日本有机会也可以再次感谢您

I heard a lot of groans from our group as we walked up to Davids house for the first time Its different from what we normally get in an AirBnB but it turned out to be a great place to say while exploring Tokyo It is super convenient to the subway line 2 stops to a circle line around Tokyo that took us wherever we wanted to go  There is an arcade at the subway stop only a 5 minute walk away and a big grocery store in the arcade and another one over the subway terminal Lots and lots a funky places to eat out at Staying here gets you away from the tourist and all the craziness of Tokyo Its a real neighborhood place where all you see are locals Glad we found it

Highly recommended for family with children as this house has a fully equipped kitchen enough places and equipment to hang all the clothes after each wash and two baths which is not available in some other houses The walk from the closest train station is about 7 minutes

Loved the house and David was an outstanding host Responsive and clear I fully recommend this place to stay
