Easy communication Convenient location  quiet neighborhood with local restaurants at nearby market street Also nice park in 5min for morning walk and jogging

I was travelling with my family of 7 so knew we would need a place big enough such that we werent stepping all over each other and had enough bathrooms Davids place was absolutely perfect and suited all our needs It had multiple toilets living room for us to have meals and a fully stocked kitchen The flat is just a short walk from the train station with lots of shops and great restaurants around It does take a little longer to get to main tourist spots but it was definitely worth it David was extremely responsive and helping us with recommendations and reservations to restaurants as well Highly recommended for large groups travelling to Tokyo

David place is better than I expected Clean spacious a Japanese house in a typical neighbourhood We loved it Thank you for hosting us The place is big for a japanese house And we like to live in as a local Everything works And it has strong japanese feeling 6 minutes walk to the nearest Tokyo subway and only 1 stop to Megura which is 2 stops from Shibuya

Davids home was extremely neat and clean with all the amenities we needed for our trip He was also very prompt with responding to any comments or questions we had before during and after our stay which really helped to make our trip flow smoother than expected He also provided thorough instructions on how to use his home which also was much more helpful than expected I would highly recommend staying at Davids place for the ease and peace of mind which staying in TokyobrThanks David for making our stay in Japan a great one
房子周边很方便超市市场药妆店车站都很方便房子很温馨我们五大五小住起来刚刚好很宽敞厨房很大距离房子不到200米的地方就有个菜市场我们自己买菜做饭很棒随便说一句菜场价格很公道要比超市实惠很多房主人很好我们在东京时间比较长后面还住了房主在涩谷附近的房子房主还帮助我们运了行李非常感谢

Great apartment with all the facilities youll need Clean and neat Close to the train station and a nice and quiet neighbourhood

Cool location if youre looking for a typical Tokyo neighbourhood and still pretty handy to central areas  We cycled in to the centre quite a bit Naka meguro in about 10 minutes David was a really responsive host

This is what Airbnb is all about Davids house is in a local area that is wonderful to come back to each day or even just spend a day looking around Davids tips about the area the local park etc were great We were a group of 3 adults and two very tall teenagers and the house was perfectly comfortable for us with plenty of room to collapse on the floor after walking the Tokyo streets all day David was very easy to communicate with and extremely helpful arranging our transfers to and from the airport Just cant say enough about this Airbnb experience  it was a highlight and really enriched our visit to Tokyo
広さが十分にあり良かったですbr床のホコリやゴミが気になりました掃除機が置いてあったので自分たちで掃除できます

The place is on a nice quiet street The kitchen was a good size and had everything we needed to cook Grocery and convenient stores were very near by Really cute shops bakery and coffee shops around
静かな住宅街で仲間と素敵な時間を過ごせました和室であんな形で団欒ができたこと忘れられない思い出になりました私の連絡が遅れてしまったのに親切に対応していただきDavidさんには本当に感謝していますまたぜひ利用させていただきたいです

Davids home is clean and spacious Its an older home but in an established neighborhood where we found good food and is an 8 minute walk to the train station and small mall FYI the 2 upstairs bedrooms are actually one Lshaped bedroom separated by a shoji screen and not a wall It worked out fine for us because the large room turned into a great sleepover room for the kids and having 2 showers and 4 bathrooms in the home worked out well for the 8 of us
交通很方便目黑整个区域很安静人不算多我们住的很舒服一楼是车库二楼三楼都是我们的独栋呦老爸有时憋不住想吸br烟下楼就可以这个我爸特别满意房子内部设施齐全中途房东还来补了洗衣液和晾衣架武藏小山站出口有一个大超市我们一家早饭都在那里购买回来制作周边还有很多吃饭的地方药妆什么的也是很方便的主要人少如果下次再来东京目黑是不错的选择

The house is pretty much as described in other reviews About 7 minutes walk from MusashiKoyama station and in a quiet location When we were there the Wifi only reached the lower floor The house manual is a bit out of date and mentions two Wifi routers one for each floor so perhaps this is temporary This is good for a large group but the sleeping area is really a large lshaped room with a screen between two sections We loved our visit to Pizzeria la Rossa which is few minutes away Id advise booking the day before

Great location quiet area Great bars restaurants and coffee shops Great apartment for a group Highly recommend the area great introduction  to Tokyo David was very easy to work with and very helpful

The house is excellent and is as described 2 separate showers 4 toilets and all the rest David is very responsive and helpful What surprised us the most was the amazing location  5 minute walk to 711 about 5 restaurants public sauna vegetable market medical massage and more At the train station which is also very close is the most amazing shopping street  where you can seegettaste everything

This place is great very spacious good for groups big kitchen A lot of bathrooms and toilets makes things super easy in the mornings with big groups The washerdryer combo is always a super plus And has a good location about 5 min walk to MusashiKoyama Station Tokyu Meguro Line just 2 stops to the Main JR Yamanote Lines Meguro Station Would definitely stay here again And finally great communication with host Thanks for everything David
Great option for Tokyo

Davids place whilst not as perfect as the pictures look is immensely convenient for most travelers in Tokyo I loved the location of the house and David is a great host with prompt communication Hes helped us to arrange transport to the airport at a much more reasonable rate than most companies would offer brOn the house it was a little tight for 6 adults and 4 children The place do not have a lot of free room to roam around but it was sufficient Also the configuration of the rooms make it a little hard to arrange our familys bedding arrangements with an odd 532 on arrival We reconfigured it to 442 and David was great help in helping us with better bedding for those sleeping on the futons as the initial provided futons were a little thin and a little hard on the back especially for the older folks in my partybrThe amenities were as expected and we had no issues using the dryer washing machine sink heater air conditioning The house had a lot of modifications done generally the adding in of what seem like either light or motion sensors which makes it feel a little unsafe Also we experienced power cuts a couple of times when two showers plus the washing machine was in use or when the kettle washing machine and shower was in usebrThe general cleanliness of the place is also not as expected but still servicable We experienced a toilet clog which we cleaned up ourselves after removing a drain net full of hair and a waste disposal cupboard that emitted a foul smell whenever we opened it up The waste disposal cupboard whilst a good idea had food waste liquids seeped into the woodbrThe rooms were for the most part clean with dust in the corners but not that badbrLastly the pots and pans whilst looking servicable were of dubious cleanliness and we opted not to cook primarily because of that

The house is spacious and good for big groups There are 4 toilets and 2 bathrooms which was good brLocation is a few mins walk to the station there is a nearby convenience store and a local coffee shopbrOur 2 yrold son enjoyed the toys Duplo in the house brOur host David was very responsive

Davids place is exactly as described  Everything is there just as should be  For those of us that are over 6 feet tall and there were 3 of us the upstairs restroom and bath is a bit tight Tall people problems
とても広くて快適に過ごせました

Plenty of restaurants close by Coffee shop also close by for morning coffee brShort walk to the station br2 stops from JR line so if buying a JR pass you need to pay for the other line each time brHouse is well equipped with efficient heating
The house was clean comfortable and spacious with very clear instructions to enter and a good location near the train station

We stayed at Davids place for a month and it was a fantastic experience First of all David is a wonderful host he communicates instantly and helped us in many ways The house is extremely well equipped we did a lot of cooking and you can even use a bycicle We stayed during a very hot summer and had no problem with the ACs they worked perfectly well Location is also great around 600m to a beautiful park and 700m to the nearest train station Musashi Koyama It is a very quiet friendly neighborhood and we truy enjoyed our stay Thanks David

場所は武蔵小山から近く便利でした玄関は二階なので荷物が多い方は注意されたほうが良いと思いますbrキッチンはディッシュウォッシャーはじめなんでも揃っていてお料理をする方にはとても良いですbrただ経年のせいか畳やソファーなどの汚れが目立ち写真よりも古い印象でしたまたリネン類がホテルで使われるような白いものではなく模様入りのものでしたので清潔感を感じられませんでしたbrとはいえこの立地で駐車場付きで広さがある物件はとても貴重だと思います部屋寝具トイレとも数が多く大人数のグループ家族に向いていますあまり細かいことを気にせず大人数でワイワイと使われる方におススメします

駐車場は乗り降りに苦労しますが2m5mのサイズの車でもギリギリ入りますインターネット環境は快適です光エアコンや一部のトイレも新しくていい感じですbr清掃は行き届いていません部屋について最初の1時間少々は床ガラス棚等々を拭いたり掃除機をかけたりすることになりました水回りは他に比べるときれいです和室の畳はそれなりに使用期間が長いようで直接座るとズボンや服に畳表のカスがつきますbr全ての部屋に赤外線センサーらしきものが設置されておりちょっと落ち着きませんでしたがこれはAirBだから仕方ないのかとも思いますbrそれなりに古かったりいろいろなものがあって雑多な感じなので細かいことは気にせずに過ごせるのも事実ですきれい好きの方は覚悟を持ってそうじゃない方は遠慮なく泊まれる部屋ですbr清掃面でのマイナスを考慮してもこの場所広さで駐車場があってこの価格は良心的です

We are a small family and we stayed at Davids AirBnb for over 2 weeks We had a wonderful time and highly recommend staying herebrThe AirBnb itself was clean comfortable and had many excellent features that we appreciated including wifi with great performance for working from home There was so much space too It could have easily fit a few families We didnt realize how much we would love the MusashiKoyama area but the proximity to konbinis pharmacies local restaurants mall shopping street and Rishi no Mori park was perfect for us and our baby We also regularly walked to the Gakugeidaigaku area for the variety of shops and Kanno Coffee gorgeous cafe brThe location and stay was great but the hosts were even better David was extremely friendly responsive and accomodating Easily the best AirBnb host weve had This was the perfect place for us to stay while we started our new jobs and searched for apartments in the areabrIf you are a young family this is a great stay Just know that the elevator you need to transfer strollers baby cars between the Meguro line and the JR line at Meguro station is in the Meguro Central Square building not the atre buildings
商店街の近くにある素敵な一軒家設備は充実買い物は至便よいところでした

His response is so quick polite and easy to understand He is the greatest host ever

David was a generous host kindly accommodating our requests even at the last minute This made our stay doubly enjoyablebr brAlso having free parking space in central Tokyo is rare and appreciatedbrHighly recommend especially if you enjoy strolling down lively streets with small shops 商店街 or you have small kids who would enjoy the toys David kindly provided and the park nearby brWe came in middle of summer but the plentiful windows AC and spaciousness endured comfortbrForeigners would enjoy the local lively vibe and quiet location brWe would recommend for all but especially for young families

Davids home in MusashiKoyama is the biggest place weve ever stayed in Tokyo There was so much space compared to the other studio apartments that are listed on Airbnb There were more bathrooms and toilets than we a party of 2 needed Everything was clean and the location and well stocked with all the amenities that we needed MusashiKoyama itself was very laid back with families commuting to and from workschool The location was convenient for transportation shopping and food brDavid as a host was very communicative and stayed in contact with us throughout our trip to make sure everything was going wellbrWe would stay again Its hard to go back to staying in studio apartments when houses like Davids are available
Very suitable for 5 personsbrGood bathroom capacity Very good location for us Thank you for the stay
Very very spacious accom very responsive host free parking available was very useful
The house is well equipped and very conveniently located with good access to get to many places brThank you so much for your hospitality David

very spacious and comfy place great neighborhood
David is very friendly and accommodating A very cozy house and the bed are super comfortable Very convenient too Overall a very pleasant stay

We enjoyed our stay in Davids house Its very comfortable an easy walk to the local station and this neighbourhood of  low rise housing is a pleasant contrast to the tower blocks which dominate some areas of the city David himself is a very good host prompt to respond to any question

Great place Plenty of space for a Tokyo apartment Great great great location on a lovely side street in lovely Meguru A short and nice walk to the train and to restaurants and anything else you could want brThe place does have an odd layout even for a Tokyo apartment It looks like it was once two offices that were combined into a single residence which would explain the three total bathrooms two of which are labeled men and women There are only really whole living areas where people can sleep upstairs and downstairs so while there is room for plenty of people to sleep on the floor on futons note that there is no privacy within each area brFor ultralight sleepers like me I would point out that the walls are thin so you can hear outside noise Even though this is a very very quiet neighborhood I did get woken up by the brief surge of traffic each weekday at 6AM My kids are normal sleepers and did not even notice
날씨가 너무 추워서 온풍기를 가동했는데 처음에 26도로 모든 온풍기를 다 가동시키면 전체 전원이 꺼짐 2122도 정도로 가동시키면 전원 꺼지지않고 잘 수 있음 방바닥이 따뜻한 곳은 거실 한 곳 br화장실 깨끗 br위치 좋고 조용하고 가까운 곳에 편의점도 있음

Our group was pretty big with 8 adults and 1 child but Davids place fit us perfectly Plus side was there was 3 toilets and 2 baths which made it easier for pur group to get ready Davids place was clean and having a projector was cool David as our host was very responsive with all my questions If you have a big group going to tokyo i will definitely recommend Davids place Cheers

We spent 2 days and 2 nights at Davids warm and inviting home while visiting our son in Tokyo   His instructions for finding the house as well as the homeguide manual was detailed and easy to follow  It was a short walk to the bus station and we dined out both nights at restaurants in short walking distances from the house   brOur children are grown but there were plenty of toys and lots of space for families with young children  brShould we find ourselves in Tokyo again I would love to stay at Davids place a second time
Davids apartment is located is a quiet residential neighborhood in Tokyo which offers an authentic experience of the city The place is spacious clean and easy to get to Would recommend staying here
住宿非常舒適很適合家庭朋友一起來玩br有入住問題房東也是能很快的給予幫助br不過樓梯有點陡搬29吋的行李箱有些不方便br但整體來說很棒推薦大家來住br附近的商店也很多完全不用擔心吃的問題也有超市可以逛

Our group of 9 had a comfortable stay st Davids place in Meguro We needed to drop off our luggage early and David was helpful in getting that arranged The livingroom was perfect for just sitting aorund chatting after a long day and the many bathrooms were great for our big group
Cozy apartment in a great quiet neighborhood in Meguro Really nice if you want a break from the hustle and bustle of Tokyo David was very helpful during our stay

David is a great host and provided great instructions Good communication between us and David A
Great place and host Will return again in the future

I love Davids place Its a short walk from the station and theres a konbini just 23 mins away The nearest train station has a mall complex that has a lot food places and places to buy supplies from  brThe place is clean a spacious
整體感受都不錯幾個小地方需注意進民宿路的馬路較小整體約3米較難會車三樓兩個房間之間的隔間是小屏風洗衣機沒有烘的功能三樓洗手台在大房間裡較不方便裝潢較舊但整齊乾淨塌榻米房間很適合有小孩的家庭跟吸頂燈一體的投影機很酷

This house is great as are the hosts It is on a private rail line so figuring out how to get there was a bit tricky at first but once we did it was a breeze and definitely a good price for Tokyo There are several roommates living in this house and they were all incredibly friendly and Koji  Nami went out of their way to be helpful and accommodating We fell in love with Tokyo in large part due to their hospitality

The Curry House was awesommmmeee It is in an area of Tokyo that had very much a smalltown feel to it If youre looking for a place that is central is super easy to get to you might not want to stay here but if you want a place that feels like home and you dont mind a small commute into the citydown town area and want to meet awesome people then this place is great Kojis directions to the Curry House were phenomenal as well as fantastic directions to get to all kinds of good siteseeing places were also provided in our room The area around the Curry House felt like a friendly neighborhood there are lots of little restaurants and shopsbasically anything you really need is within walking distance We enjoyed exploring downtown Tokyo during the day and experiencing the community around the Curry House at night Koji and Nami are suuuper friendly and energetic we loved them  The other residents of the house were wonderful and friendly people as well and we felt like we made some new friends Koji even took us out drinking with some friends which was a wonderful experience Lots of laughs Also Koji and pretty much everyone else we met at the Curry House spoke fantastic English so for any english speaking guests language barriers were not an issue

My Stay at thee CurryHouse was really awesomeI love the quiet neighbourhood and how easy it its to go to from the train station to the CurryHouseAS Tokyo can be pretty intimidating due to the language barrier and the  fastpaced lifestyle Koji  Namisan are fantastic hosts and they provide immediate replies to your queries and questions Ask them for tip and suggestions an they will give you whats convenient and easyDirection given to the location via email is very detailed and you CANNOT go wrong such details are crucial in navigating in a new cityRoom was ready clean and cosy house is in great shape and other housemates are friendly and very approachableI will definately come back and stay here as its pretty awesome to stay in a house as compared to my previous trips in hostels LOVE THIS EXPERIENCE I wish Koji  Namisan all the best and may you host other awesome travellers Cheers

Wow  what a great stayI went to Tokyo for a few days of exploring and was very very very happy with the airbnb stay here The house is located on the outside edge of Tokyo and is much more mellow than downtown However its a simple train ride to get into the city center which I did for two days The room was beautiful and the others in the house were friendly even though I only saw them quickly One of the best parts was the excellent detailed notes for getting to the house from the airport and all the recommendations in the neighborhood Honest what a great stay and I hope to make it back some day Thanks for everything

I really like the Curry House The house is clean and tidy The hosts are friendly too They had helped me a lot before I travel and provided me with a lot of information that helped me to travel around Tokyo They were always ready to assist me if I need help The neighborhood is AWESOME Lots of stores and shops selling great food The people there are welcoming and polite too I will definitely go back to the Curry House if I go Tokyo again

1stly  the placeCurry house is located near the KeiseiTateishi station which is only a few minutes stroll Safe  quiet and beautiful small town with 24hr minimarts  wet market  supermarket  pharmacy and restaurants Everything you need is only a few minutes walk The railway needs a bit of time to get accustomed to if you are used to Metro and Jr yamanote lines but after a while  it is actually pretty easy My room is on the 2nd level The room is spacious even for 2 persons Room and toilets are clean Everything you need are included  Bathtubshower2 x toiletswashing machineclothes dryerstovemicrowavetoastertv in living roomwifimobile wifiI even used the nice set of speakers in the livingroom and play some music while I was cooking  fridge  airconheater There is also a file containing information regarding how to use the washing machine  dryer  shower  instructionsguide to locations like what train to takealight and which platform and time needed 2ndly the hostsKoji  MrT  his gf  Gon chan and Nami san are very friendly and helpful I had a great time during my stay at curry house and we had okonomiya party  Of course  it wouldnt be called curry house without curry P  house mate Ambar cooked curry for us and I enjoyed the dinner chatting wth Koji and the other house guests I would definitely recommend Curryhouse to others
so so so nicenext  timeI will stay againThank you

The hosts were really pleasent and the house was absolutely clean brIm looking forward to meeting all of them again when i come back to tokyo on a more relaxed schedulebrThe place is only 5 minutes away from the train station The keisei line will take u straight to shinbashi which was very convienient for mebr

Curry House is a great place to stay in Tokyo It is based in a quiet and nice old style neighbourhood very close to the train station The rooms are in a cozy old Japanese style and have everything you need even with translations in English Koji  his wife were great hosts  friendly and respectful always ready to help Although we stayed only a couple of nights we had the chance to enjoy a few beers with their friendly company which was really one of the highlights of our stay in Tokyo

We had a great time at Curry House Our housemates were really friendly and helpful and we enjoyed socialising with Koji and Mr T Theyre a lot of fun The portable wifi was incredibly helpful when we were out exploring Tokyo Tateishi is a cute and interesting area and Curry House is only a few minutes walk from Tateishi station so it made travelling around Tokyo really easy Thanks for a great time Koji

My brother and I had an absolutely lovely stay with them and would be super happy to return to stay with them again I highly recommend Their room was clean spacious and convenientWe stayed here just for 2 nights so we didnt spend too much time with Koji Nami  MrT but they were extremely helpful with travel tips and advice Also it was conveniently located in a nice quiet area close to the station and food stores Thank you for a wonderful experience in Tokyo

We stayed 4 nights and had a great stay the accommodations location is great 2mins walk to the rail network and for travelers like us who rely on public transport this is key it was really easy getting to all tourist spots we wanted to see also links to airports were simple and easy Additional directions and maps supplied by the guys were super helpful Went out one night with them and had good fun wish our schedule allowed us other nights out with them Nothing bad to say about our stay other than we wish we could have stayed longer If we come back to Tokyo we will stay here

I stayed for three nights at the Curry house together with my girlfriend Koji Nami and Mr T were very friendly We arrived pretty early but was no problem to leave our luggage Mr T provided some watermelon the couch in their living room and turned on the tv while we were waiting for the room being prepared When leaving Koji brought us to the nearest JR station by car and Nomi did our laundry The room itself was small the ceiling low I bumped my head several times but tidy and clean The Curry house is situated in a loving area and is quiet during the night The rail station is only two minutes away and is connected to the Tokyo subway All by all I would definitely recommend the Curry house

We stayed with Koji Nami and Gon Chan for 2 nights and it was our favorite air bnb in the whole of Japan The room itself on top of the roof of the factory was beautiful comfortable clean and so convenient They really thought of all details for you electrical adapters dehumidifier folder with info etc We also got the chance to spend a little time over beer on the roof top and one of the best things about this place is for sure the people who live in it We highly recommend anyone who is travelling to Tokyo to stay at the factory and even though it might seem a little far from the touristic sights when you look at a map then it is surprisingly convenient because there are direct train lines connecting Keisei Tateishi the station close to the house to both center and west tokyo
This was a nice place and Mr T was very friendly and helpful Location is a bit far from the center of Tokyo but it is very convenient to get to Narita from here which worked out great for us

I couldnt have asked for more My friend and I stayed in the Plum house essentially a small house made for two The wooden floors sliding doors and fully equipped kitchen really felt like we were staying in a traditional home The bed mattresses are on the floor but theyre very comfy brThe location is in a quiet residential area only five minutes from the station and ten minutes from a grocery store Very convenient and relaxingbrKoji is a star We had lots of questions but he was so friendly in answering them for us and even making a few calls to confirm anything he didnt know We really had a great time

KojiNamiMrT were amazing hosts brI hate to be boring and say that everything at the place was fantasticbut everything at the place was fantastic We had a lot of fun over the first few nights in Tokyo and although we only shared a few beers and some heated Mario Kart at the local arcade we felt instantly at home when visiting brFor travellers theyve thought of everything maps food recommendations travel tips train timetablesit was all there The house is shared with a few permanent residents who were quiet and courteous brThe room was quiet and clean and although its located far away from the action in downtown Tokyo the neighbourhood is amazing and still quite busy at night brWe recommend the place without question though if youre tall like me its a good idea to duck as the ceiling is low in places

Kojisan is a very kind person and Tateishi is a very cute town We visited here twice because we really like here Its very convenient for people coming from Narita airport and also easy to go Tokyo Disneyland We went here in Mar and Nov it was cold outside but every time we checkin the place theres the turnon heaterlights welcome us its very warm and comfortable

Kojisan is a very kind person and Tateishi is a very cute town We visited here twice because we really like here Its very convenient for people coming from Narita airport and also easy to go Tokyo Disneyland We went here in Mar and Nov it was cold outside but every time we checkin the place theres the turnon heaterlights welcome us its very warm and comfortable
很感謝Koji  Nami  MrT 提供如此溫馨的房間房間裡面的設備很齊全離地鐵站很近居住環境安靜安全很推薦想感受當地生活人超級棒的房子

The hosts NamiKoji and MrT were all very friendly and showed us around the area They suggested a great place to eat lunch one day and even accompanied me to the train station by car when I was worried I would be late for my flight Outstanding hospitality and great attention to every detail to make our first Airbnb an very enjoyable one Thank you Kawanos family for an awesome stay in your beautiful Bamboo apartment

The Kawano family were great hosts and provided us with exceptional hospitality They were extremely helpful and the apartment they provided us was beautiful They are by far the nicest hosts Ive ever met and I would recommend  them to anyone in a heartbeat They exemplify what the ideal Airbnb experience should be and will make your experience in Japan a delightful one

It was great place with great hosting The host was so kind and helpful Its near from Asakusa and Ueno and there are many shops around the apt as well as restaurants We are all 5 of us as family and there wasnt problem to stay all together Besides we could have our own place with balcony kitchen bathroom rooms and toilet so it was cosy and comfortable for us Thanks for the great hosting

This was my first experience booking on Airbnb Both me and my partner were very impressed with Kawanos familys the prompt replies of queries as well as confirmation Even before our arrival they had been very helpful The location of the apartment is easily located with the help of the Kawanos Instruction Conveniently it took us only 5 mins  walking distance from the train station Tateshi Along the way you could see a lots of food and convenient stores  family mart Lawson 100 yen stores 247 seafood place supermarkets street alley ramen store hidden takoyaki stall arcade etc As soon as we arrived Koji made a personal trip on our first day to make sure we settle in well The hospitality he showed us was warm and friendly Koji whom can speak fluent English showed us around the house and gave us a travel guide book with map food recommendations interesting travel tips of what to see and where to go everything filed and allowing us to use it as and when He made us feel very welcome in their amazing apartment It was more like visiting a friends friend than staying at some stranger place The most amazing part we heard from Mr T that the whole apartment was built from scratch by Kawanos familyThe Wahuu Style Apt is exactly as shown as pictures its clean cozy and spacious The kitchen has everything stated  kettle microwave pans and pots including Mayo cooking oil Tomato sauce etc for easy usage Fresh Towels ShampooBody Wash and even Washing Powder were provided Washing Machine and Dryer on the ground floor are usable at our convenient There is even a balcony for smokers In additional the Free Portable WiFi  Charger are rentalfree which you could bring it around when traveling in the City The location is relatively near to Ueno and Asakusa On the other hand it is quite a distance from the major towns  Ginza Shinkuju Shibuya Shimbashi Roppongi Tokyo Central etc it would take about 30min  45mins each way For the adventurous ones along with the travel guide book you can easily map your route Tateshi Station is connected to Asakusa A Line so its really convenient to find your way from there or you may communicate with the friendly train attendants and get to your destination    All in all we love our stay in Tateshi really amazing neighbourhood and very much in Kawanos familys apartment  Wahuu Style Apartment We highly recommend their apartments ALL equally amazing Its actually a building with 3 apartments  Js Wahuu and Cedar Apartment for those who dont mind traveling on Trains adventurous ones who love outskirt and amazing neighbourhood this is it We really want to thanks Kawanos Family for the outstanding hospitality and leaving us such wonderful first airbnb experience Till the next trip

We were really happy to stay at this house it has everything you need there is so much space it was awesome  The owners came to show us all we needed to know in the appartment they were very kind and fun  They had written a lot of informations and instructions about everything which was really useful Even if its on a metro local line its easy to reach the center of Tokyo and so easy to go to the airports If i have the chance to come back to Tokyo im sure Ill contact them again

Super cleanconvenientcomfortableFantastic and fabulousbr思えないほど綺麗だった部屋で必要なもの揃っていて駅からも五分ほどですもっとも重要なのは川野さんは責任感を持つ方であることです請求があったらすぐに答えるってことは素晴らしいですbr房子非常干净整洁没有想象中那么大但是五人左右刚好合适五分钟以内就能步行到立石站只是东京交通比较混乱且车费比较高总之很满意价格合适条件舒适

房東的房子就如照片ㄧ樣乾淨整潔很棒的和式房間房東也準備很多旅遊資訊當你提出疑問與需求也非常快速回覆並幫你解決讓我們四人都有非常好的住宿經驗_雖然住宿離市區較遠但交通我認為非常方便且離成田機場近車站出來還有一些店家松屋藥妝店LawsonFamily mart不需擔心太晚沒得吃最後ㄧ天房東還特別貼心幫我們扛行李並載我們到Aoto車站真的非常感動下次去東京還想住這brThe room is awesome beautiful and clean We 4 people all had good memories here and wish to have chance to stay next time Kawano san is nice and response immediately when I had questions he also drive us to Aoto station and we really appreciate that There are some restaurants and convenient stores nearby so no worries at late night Finally I would like to thank Kawano family again for everything

This is a fantastic place to stay We found that the facilities are great the cafés and restaurants nearby have fantastic food and readily available home and portable wifi kept us connected the whole time Access from the airports and Tokyo was easy The Kawanos family have really gone out of their way to make this place accommodating with little details like a universal travel adapter and USB charger for the apartment

The apartment was very tidy and had everything that we needed furthermore it was close to the train station and was very convenient The host was very helpful as well and responded quickly to our needs All in all it was a great stay

tremendously neat spacious and good looking house location is very near the train station and the staff was happy to help out with the luggage and whatever is needed The free portable wifi is really helpful for visiting tourists br

The wahuu apartment was amazing Koji and Mr T welcomed us early in the day and helped us settle in The apartment was really clean and comfortable Mr T would come on a daily basis to even replace our towels Located in Tateishi its really easy to get around Tokyo You just take the Asakusa line and can be in downtown in 15 minutes There are lots of restaurants and markets around if you need to go shoppingKoji would even help us find interesting places to see in Tokyo and help a friend that got a cold during the trip The hosts are extremely friendlyI would highly recommend this apartment

Kawano s place is really surprisingly good Still spacious though 5 of us stayed in it The instructions given were clear All the utensils were labelled in english brThe cleaner will come to clean the house everyday Location is near to the private subway line brThe house is clean and tidy and new Good price Kawano allows us to put luggage despite the check in and check out time The surrounding is quiet during night and happening during day No need to worry bout food when stay here The best place we stay while in Japan brFacilities were all complete and in good condition We have a very enjoy stay at this place brThe host has fluent english and response rate 100 and efficient

Staying at the Wahuu style apartment was an overall great experience Although it is a bit out of the city about on hour or so from city center if you hop on the correct lines the size convenience and charm of the apartment made it worth it The check in instructions were easy to follow everything in the apartment was labeled in english and they were accommodating with an later checkoutIt was pleasantly unexpected that we were met upon check out and given a ride to the metro and written instructions to get all the way to KyotoI would like to stay again on my return to Tokyo in the fall
While the place is a little far away from Tokyos city centre the place is beautiful and comfortable The house was spotlessly clean and its located near to Tateishi station

Your house is very clean and neat We love that location that have too many shop restaurant easily to buy By conclusion  this house is perfect for stay in tokyo if you dont serious about transportation

This was my husband and Is first Airbnb and Kawano did not disappointbrWe came for our honeymoon and the apartment was perfect  clean beautiful and felt like homebrKawano had everything labelled in English so it made everything easy to use and find as first time travellers to Japan There were also guidebooks left in our apartment about Tateishi as well as Tokyo in general These came in handy as we planned our trips and mealsbrThe portable WiFi was an amazing tool to have for Tokyo but our biggest help getting around was the directions page that was made by Kawano  a list of popular attractions and how to get there by trainbrTateishi is a little out of the way but its a beautiful charming area We didnt find the  distance a problem as the train station is close and trains run frequently I found myself excited to get back home after sightseeingbrI highly recommend staying here if you are looking for somewhere nice and affordable in TokyobrWe hope to stay here next time we are in Japanbr

Was staying in the same house but had to move below because we only booked one night Great house the futon was so comfortable Cool friendly and accommodating host I love the neighborhood Ill definitely find you guys again when I visit Japan See you soon

My family of 4 enjoyed very much for our stay in Kawanos apartment The apartment is very clean and well maintained We felt so welcome because everything we need to know was well prepared and ready before our arrival Emails queries were responded swiftly The 2 separated rooms gave us privacy we have 2 couples and the balcony was great for a relax morning teabrMr Koji specially took time to welcome us upon our arrival and explained everything clearly to ensure that we have a comfortable stay All information was also consolidated in a file for our referencebrEverything in the home come with English instructions Thumbs up for the portable wifi which was really very convenient for us to Google while we were out sightseeing and shopping brThe meals prepared by the recommended restaurant was really yummy and we received special discount with coupons given by Mr Koji D brA special thanks also to Mr Koji for sending us to Aoto station so we could take the direct train to Narita airport We were also able to careoff our luggage while we travel to Hokkaido which we appreciated very muchbrWe will surely come back to this apartment for our next visit and will not hesitate to recommend this apartment to all our friendsbrThank you once again for the great hospitality and for giving us a wonderful time in Tokyo

Perfect Great host very prepared and through Room was awesome and super clean

Kawanos family is a super awesome couple They attended to all our needs in Tokyo and always quick to response via the messaging system During my stay I had the chance to meet both of them they were so kind and funny The apartment is exactly the same as it is on the photos very spacious and clean If youre looking for an experience of staying in a Japanese Zen house this got to be the one Love the neighbourhood too just 2mins walk from the subway and if youre looking for a quick fix for your hunger theres awesome beef bowl rice soba tempura curry rice just around the subway area For my next trip to Japan Tokyo I will definitely stay here again Thank you once again to the Kawanos Family D

First we thought maybe this location is too far away from the main tourist spots but its connection to public transport is very convenient and was an advantage because we easily got seats in the train The apartment is located in a quiet street and close to the train station On the way to it there are many shops that offer everything for a reasonable price We enjoyed to take home readymade food for a late night dinner after we returned from our exploration The apartment is perfectly and thoughtfully organized in every detail and very clean We enjoyed the feeling to live like the local people Our hosts were very nice and gave us very helpful information for shopping sightseeing and events Especially the English descriptions of everything and the helpful information booklet shows that our hosts know what is necessary for tourists On our next trip to Tokyo we will definitely book again one of KawanoS apartments

Great place to stay and easily accessible to the Tateishi Kesei Line  The apartment itself is wonderful and provides a great experience sleeping on tatamis and futons  I would recommend this to all travelers

These people are real professionnals They provide everything you need  A tidy tasteful modern and traditional flat Quiet neighborhood Close to a train station easily reachable on foot A little hint however that can darkens the blackboard for those to come there soon  the location 3040 min by train from Tokyo railway station Moreover watch out about fares they vary from a station to another and depend on which railway your travellingA one way ticket to Shimbashi the closest station to change for the Yamanote Line costs 380 yen
Very clean very confortable very convenient Too perfect

The Kawanos and their traditional style apartment were a huge factor in what made our Tokyo experience absolutely fantastic They were very gracious and welcoming Their apartment is beautiful clean and conveniently located to the subwayrestarauntsshops The futons and pillows were very comfortable and the shower had terrific water pressure Bath and kitchen facilities were excellent The Kawanos were very prompt with their replies and very helpful with all my questions I highly recommend staying at the Kawanos apartment  it truly is a Zen experience

We had a fantastic memory here The apartment was very clean tidy and beautiful All the facilities like kitchen shower bath pillows were excellent It is a little far from the center of Tokyo but there are subway restaraunts shops around so still very convenient The Kawanos were very nice and helpful We highly recommend this apartment

We stayed at Kawanosans place and it was our warm home in Tokyo They always answered our queries in a timely manner and our needs were taken care of We loved the place so much that leaving it made us a bit sad If we decide to visit Japan again well surely let you know Until next time Thank you very much Kawanosan

Lappartement est favorablement situé sur une rue tranquille et à moins de cinq minutes de marche de la gare de train ce qui en fait un point de départ idéal pour visiter les quartiers les plus à louest de Tokyo comme le temple Sensoji le parc Ueno ou le marché de poissons Il contient tout ce qui peut rendre notre séjour agréable et facile tant dans la cusine que dans la salle de bains La décoration traditionnelle favorise limmersion totale Merci Kawano

I and my friends really had a wonderful time here We will definitely book this room if we had a chance to visit Tokyo once again brIts so big so comfortable and has everything that you are looking for Only 57 mins from the train station There are so many convenient stores and restaurants around here too The host is so nice and kind Anyway the portable wifi only last for 15 mins I dont know what i did wrong Anyway i give 5 stars to this place

Kawanos Family were great They went to great lengths to ensure that our room was clean and that even our towels were changed regularly Everything is working perfectly and we were truly pleased with the apartment If you are worried that there might be a language barrier Kawanosan speaks great English too So there is no need for worry at all The rooms are all equipped with both airconditioning and heaters as well so you will feel really comfortable no matter the weather We really loved the apartment and the warm hospitality by Kawanos family Thank you

Wahuu apt is amazingI really recommend staying here just a few minutes walk to train station surrounding by many shop and good restuarantsKawanos family is very kind and helpfulthe house is super clean decorated in japanese style with cozy futonnext time to tokyo im sure will come back here again

We really enjoyed our stay The neighborhood is away from busy tourist center  The trade off is an extra train ride to connect to the major subway but we get the quiet and authentic local living Everyone is so helpful  The cleaning staff was so kind She goes out her way to help me The unit is comfortable as described We would be happy to return
My family enjoyed our stay in Kawanos traditional house especially my kids who would prefer to spend more time in the house than to go sightseeing Will definitely recommend to friends

도쿄 내 한적한 곳에 위치해 숙소에서 편히 쉴 수 있었네요그렇다고해서 교통이 불편한 것도 아니고 도보로 5분이면 바로지하철과 연결되어 있기때문에 도쿄 내 어딜 가든 편했습니다근처에 파칭코 세가 게임 센터 먹거리 게임 매장 등 나름 한적한 곳에 있어도 근처에 볼게 많았습니다인상 깊었던 점은 호스트분이 문앞에 종이로 제 이름을 적고 환영한다고 기재하셨 더군요또한 매일매일 수건을 갈아주시고 쓰레기통 또한 비워주셔서 청결 유지에 좋았습니다이 숙소의 특징으로는 최신식이면서 일본 전통 집의 분위기를 느낄 수 있다는 점이네요또 하나의 강점으로는 베란다가 있어서 좋았습니다도쿄에 처음 여행가시는 거라면 여기 숙소를 강력히 추천합니다
very good place to stay in tokyo the apt is very big but a bit far from downtown tokyo

部屋もトイレも布団もテラスも台所もすべてが本当に良かったですbr住み続けたいんでしたbr結局離れなければならないのでbrとても残念でしたbr何より問題があった時にすぐ解決してくれてありがとうございましたbr次にまた東京へ行くようになったらbr無条件Kawanoの家予約しますbr방도 화장실도 이불도 테라스도 부엌도 모든게 정말로 좋았어요br계속 머무르고 싶었는데br결국 떠나야해서 엄청 아쉬웠어요br무엇보다 문제가 생겼을 때 바로 해결해줘서 고마웠어요br다음에 또 동경에 가게되면br무조건 카와노 집 예약할거에요

The experience at this apartment was a really memorable one I loved everything about the apartment and how following the instructions he sent made finding our apartment so easy we also loved Kojis hospitality He invited us to his Xmas party as we were there during the festive period As such we made a few new friends and got to explore Tateishi through the eyes of a local Thank you Koji we had a really wonderful experience that we left with a really heavy heart The apartment is just nice for 4 pax with all the amenities you need Even the toilet heater works like magic during winter He also changes our towel every day that we were really surprised when we came back after a long day to clean towels again His hospitality is really superb that we have no complaints Also the walk from the subway station to the apartment is only about 5 mins Super convenient

I loved staying at the Wahuu apartment It was very comfortable and overall just a great place The pictures show the style of the house its a very beautiful place but its also very clean and well maintained The Kawano family always did their best to make sure we had whatever we needed and they made a lot of effort to let us know interesting and fun places to go nearby I loved that they had a little booklet of things to do in the area because when we were tired we didnt want to go out too far to grab a bite to eat or anything On New Years Eve they invited us out to see the Sensoji temple in Asakusa something that Japanese families do on New Years It was very kind of them They always prepared fresh clean towels for us every day Overall I really enjoyed my experience staying with them
Very good and convenient location  Easy access to the apartment and always get timely response to our questions and asks for help

My friends and I had a great stay with Kawano The house atmosphere and design is very warm and cozy just like what we think traditional Japanese home is Kawano is always being helpful to assist us and helped us to change the towels daily The location is also just few minutes walk away from the train station Overall we had a good experience with this host
房间非常的干净离车站很近房东人也非常好非常传统的日式风格的房子榻榻米很好的体验br在东边离新宿较远

This is my second time staying at KawanoS And this time with my family of 12 Adults on behalf I rented all 3 Apartments  Cedar Wahuu and Js 4 Adults to each apartment in the same building during our February 2016  7 days 6 nights trip in TokyoHighly recommended for travelers who wants to stay away from the busy city area Tateishi is a good neighborhood with plenty of good food local shops local market to explore The best part is that the apartments are of walking distance to the train station which make it really convenient to travel into the city The subway however can be a little tricky With the english guide book which can be picked up at the airport and the free portable wifi provided by Koji  Nami which were really useful journey and communication in such big group are made simplerEach apartments are really clean and pretty We really enjoyed our stay at the apartments It was as though returning home despite being away from home Each apartments are exactly as shown in the pictures posted For Cedar and Wahuu are huge enough to stay up to 56 people comfortably with bed  tatamis Both apartments have huge kitchen and dining space As for Js not as huge as Cedar and Wahuu recommended to stay up to 34 comfortably Small kitchen space with spacious living area They even have washing machine and dryer at travelers conveniences Koji and Nami are really cute  fun couple Despite being my second stay with them they are humble friendly helpful mostly everything you expect  wish from a Super Host of Airbnb On top of everything they respond rather promptly So if you thinking of staying with them but do have queries do drop them an email Im sure they are more than happy to assist you One of our best experiences during our stay in Tokyo was to hang out with Koji We got a chance  as we didnt on our last trip to hang out with Koji and Friends and we really enjoyed ourselves They even brought us to local hidden bars in the neighborhoodThey have a total of 9 different apartments for renting We will definitely rent other apartments from Kawanos on our next trip to experience different homely vibe As we all agreed Tateishi has a really great neighborhood and Koji and Nami have been nothing but awesome hosts Till the next stay lt3

This place is so awesome The 1st day that we arrived the host come to pick me up and he is so nice I really love this apartment Its look the same like the photos they posted They come to clean the room and change the towels for us every day So quiet and good for sleep Lawson is not far from the place and also the local shop brThe train station is not far for us and so easy to go to asakusa and sky tree brI love it My 1st time in Tokyo was so perfect because of this place 3

It was a very enjoyable experience living in Kawanos place We were travelling with a 18 months old baby for 10 days and theres no obstacles it explains a lot The description is pretty accurate its a quite and friendly community and you can find everything you need within 5 minutes walk some stores open for 24hrlate nights too Its a bit far from Shinjuku area but you need only one transfer to most of the major spots and the time estimates are accurate We recommend it for everyone especially for family trips folks

This is the first time we came to Tokyo and we enjoyed our stay in kawanos house br  The location is very convenient much closer to the train station than we thought We chose selfcheckin The instructions is very clear and we can easily find the place brThe house is traditional Japanese stylevery clean and cozy And believe meyou will sleep very well if you choose to stay therebr  AlsoKawano is really a nice guy Always available when you need any help We truly thanked him for the box he gave us which we used for packing thingsbr  So if you are looking for a good house with a perfect landlord this is definitely the best choice

My stay in Kawano sans house was incredible The house is beautifully designed with Japanese style which made my stay one of the best ever The apartment is cosy new and is well prepared for accomodating tourists Kawano san also replies to messages quickly and is very helpful I will definitely choose this again if I come to Tokyo in the future
nice traditional style house cozy  in a cool area

The room is very clean and comfortable brThe location is not in the heart of Tokyo But it only take 5 minutes to the station Very easybrLandlord is nice and quick response Although we made mistake of the floor landlord solved it well
Close to the station Clean and tidy room Nice Host Thanks for the delicious apple juice

The apartment fit the four of us quite comfortably Everything was very clean The directions provided from the train station to the apartment were very clear The host responded quickly to all our questions and even came by to introduce himself and gave us some delicious apple juice The apartment has labels everywhere which helped us a lot when we were trying to figure out how to use the microwave and other appliances There was also a binder that had some suggestions of places to go nearby which we though was pretty cool The apartment is roughly between Narita and Haneda which was perfect for us because we flew into Narita and flew out of Haneda We truly felt like locals when we stayed at this apartment Also we came during cherry blossom season and theres a really nice street a few blocks away from the apartment that is lined with cherry blossoms

Met the hosts dad coming to the place very friendly and welcoming man The location is nicely furnished and value for money  really loved the whole japanese tatami feel Location is also close to subway and all the available amenities I would recommend staying here Very good responsive host and location
We enjoyed to stay in Kawanos house convenient place and kindly hostbrThe house clean and tidybrWe will be back

I dont know where to start because everything was so perfect First of all the K family was really nice and welcoming They gave us very detailed direction for finding guesthouse their factory to drop off our luggage umbrellas when it was raining drove us to Aoto station on the day of checkout let us know the timetable of train and where to take it When we went to a local restaurant to have dinner and drinks we bumped into one of hosts He recommended the best dishes so we could have really nice time brAbout the house its a bit far from west side of Tokyos touristic spotsShibuya Shinjuku etc but it didnt matter because the neighborhood Tateishi was great itself Cherry blossoms small local bars and restaurants marketsbrAnd the house was spacious clean well equipped beautiful  K family changed towels everyday for us We had nothing to ask more because everything was already there brEvery evening when we got to the Keisei Tateishi station  3minutes away from the guesthouse we felt relieved like at our own home brHighly recommend

First of all we enjoyed to stay here because this places so cozycleanalso close to the supermarketlocal restaurantsand train station The host and his family were hospitality and kindness I highly recommend this place and Ill be back here again  Thanks for making our trip in Tokyo so amazing

The best Airbnb in Tokyo I have stayed thus far The unit is beautiful clean and full of traditional vibe Not to mention the host is extremely helpful and friendly they did extra miles to make us feel as comfortable as possible Strongly recommend this unit to all others you are not going to regret on this

我们从京都去的东京到达民宿已经很晚了一楼很贴心的写了我的名字太有爱了房间跟图片一样很舒服设施很齐全特别是浴室的花洒淋浴头洗澡太舒服了房子对面就是一个幼稚园每天起床就可以看到家长送孩子上学好可爱br地理位置很好找地铁站叫京成立石虽然不是市中心每天来回换乘地铁费用有点多但是附近吃饭的很便宜一路上很多吃的有家烤肉店非常好吃而且便宜br房主第二天还送了我们2瓶果汁 味道非常好喝还告诉我们押上有购物的去了才知道那边就是晴空塔每天也送干净毛巾br只是我们每天早出晚归很晚才能回复消息真的是不好意思啦br以后有机会来东京还会来住的br噢还有最后一天还给我们延长了退房时间对我们很大帮助呢在这里再次感谢ヾ

So happy to have stayed here for three nights Id say the place is even better than in the pictures Convenient stores restaurants and shops are just a couple of minutes away Koji has been extremely helpful and let me leave my suitcase with them for a few days Made the rest of the trip so much easier for me And I got to taste the delicious apple juice everyones talking about
Very nice host The apartment was big and clean with everything we needed I would choose here next time when I visit Tokyo

The Wahuu appt was exactly like pictures It gave a real traditional Japanese feel and was great experience for us On top of that the Host were in constant touch very helpful and friendly The pad has everything you need with clear instructions in English The host also provided guides for the area and neighbouring tourist spots such as the Skytree and Akihabara to the extend the cost of Train ticketsThey were so helpful that they organised a drop off to Aoto station for us to go to the airport Really enjoyed our time there and great hosts
房东大人很热情 在门口等我们入住 还送了我们好喝的
公寓虽然不在繁华区域但是周围环境好交通十分便利去之前房东给我们发了详细的机场到公寓的路线非常有用我们有问题的时候房东直接上门解答很热心公寓干净整洁配套设施齐全住的非常舒服

Our family of 5 only stayed one night on our way to fly out of Narita so it was important that the place was easy to check in and check out   When we arrived Koji was there to show us the apartment and recommend a place to eat  We had booked an early morning taxi to the airport and werent sure if we set the address correctly so Koji helped us confirm the reservation on the phone for us which eased our minds quite a lot  He was also so kind to bring us two large bottles of yummy apple juice later  We slept well in the apartment  it had everything we needed and was very neat  We hope to be able to stay there longer the next time we are in Tokyo

Very comfortable  spacious stay  The apartment was very clean and they cleaned  changed towels everyday  It was near a train station so it was very convenient  There were many eateries around so we never got hungry  It was quiet and I slept really well  They even gave us a bottle of fresh apple juice  Would recommend it for Tokyo stay

The Kfamily is a amazing apartments they have 3 floors every floor has one individual flat every flat is nice they are all Japanese style apartment you can live like Japanese We are a 4 person family I go with my husband and 2 kids the host welcome the family with kids also give them juice I chooses Zenn house because it fit my family too much the apartment is very clean and bright with natural light it has a big balcony you can wash cloth and dry it downstairs It is close to the subway and there are many delicious restaurant nearby it is a very convenient place The Kfamily are all very kind they will help you to change the towels and handle your requirements every day the last day when we leaving it is raining we have big suitcase with 2 kids the host even sent us to the subway they are so sweet If we go back we will choose this place again

The KFamily were very accommodating of us The description was incredibly accurate and find the apartment was no hassle at all as a resultThe Apartment was simply amazing plenty of room for 3 people Everything has instructions to use and very detailed information about the areasecurity was great with a pin code to get into the building and the portable wifi was incredibly useful during our travels around TokyoI would use this apartment again and highly recommend it to anyone

我太爱这个地方和这所房子了没有缺点br首先我要夸赞一下房东非常热情非常贴心门上还很萌的画上叮当猫写上了我的名字每天都有新鲜的果汁送发生了个小插曲是第二天没有浴巾大概是收走忘记留新的了我马上给房东消息告诉他结果大晚上收到我的消息房东哥哥就骑着洋气的小摩托马上赶来了还不停的抱歉真是非常感动虽然我英语不好沟通起来很吃力但是完全不影响br他说请当成自己家br房子很大位置很好附近住的都是很友善很好的当地人离车站很近没两步就有便利店夜晚宁静平和白天下楼能看到对面热闹的幼稚园br房子不小在日本属于非常了不起的面积有天晚上我和弟弟冒着雨回到这个木头房子被莫名而来归属感感动到有非常亲切踏实的感觉br所以没什么特别想说的这么好的房子我很自私不想推荐给很多人但是这么好的体验又希望能被更多人知会br去过那么多国家住过那么多风格囧异的民宿每一间屋子都有房东微小的情怀br想对后来将要住进这间房子的客人说请爱护它br谢谢我一定会再来

One of the best AirBnb that we stayed in Loved the appartment and the hosts are amazing very accurate It is a bit out of the way though and not really recommended for seeing attractions but really nice neighbourhood

My friends and me are stayed at Kfamilys apartment for 3 nights and it was my friends first time visiting Japan When we arrive host was so welcoming and his apartment made us feel right at home It was perfect apartment which was beautiful comfortable clean and so convenient You can feel traditional Japanese room and theres nothing I can say except for it was just perfect I guarantee you cant find any place better than Kfamilys place Personally i think its price is undervalued I strongly recommend you to experience Kfamilys awesome place and their kindess

Glad to stay with you and we did have a pleasant trip My kids love yr home very much  they said we can really experience the lifestyle of Japanese people  like their favorite cartoon Atashinchi As a mum with 2 kids I have a lot of considerations such as cleanness of room location providing with washing machines trust me very useful  as we could bring fewer clothes Almost every night we stayed in the apartment for dinner as the kids wanted to spend more time in house instead of dining out We tried our best to keep place clean as we want our next user can enjoy the stay I think this experience did change our way of travelling We want to have contact with people and community instead of just  shopping even we did a lot but we still want to stay close with local people Thanks for AirBNB to provide such good platform for us and we are lucky to have such good pick Thanks for everything and hope to see you soonAnd I agree with other user  next time Tokyo visit  hotel will not be our list and yr home will be the one for us Hope the next traveler can enjoy as well
房东非常非常细心和认真的沟通对于地址的描述很准确很容易的就找到了公寓比想象中的还要好很多公寓是典型的日式和风非常清新雅致另外实在是太干净了地点虽然没有在市中心但是离京成立石站很近步行5分钟左右到浅草寺银座台场这些都很方便总之是很愉快的入住体验我和旅伴们都非常满意
民宿乾淨整齊實景跟照片上的差不多房東親切第一天還親自送來鮮果汁房內設傋先進齊全帶着孩子也沒問題民宿週圍的環境清靜且有充足的食肆便利店及大型超級市場值得一讚的是當我們遇到交通的問題他們也樂意並主動協助且很快便有回覆惡劣天氣當天親自送上雨傘感謝房東親切的款待再來東京遊玩的話我必定再選擇此間民宿

Very nice apartment for experiencing Japan Our host was very responsive to questions and they went out of their way to drive us to the station at the end of our visit Everything in the apartment was labeled in English for those of us who struggle with reading kanji I was sad I couldnt stay longer

The apartment is situated in convenient locations and is easily accessible by public transport Can go to Haneda and Narita Airport by railway directly Also the apartment has fully equipped that make a lot of convenience to me and my friendsThe owner is very nice and eager to answer my questions and always deliver delicious fruit juice to us We have an amazing trip in Tokyo when living in this apartment

I had a wonderful stay at Kfamilys apartment The room is as clean and tidy as described on the photos It is very comfortable to stay at this home The host is friendly and nice too I would definitely stay at this place again next time when I visit Tokyo
这是一次很棒的住宿体验房东提供的所有信息都十分准确详细公寓的交通较为便利根据房东给的方位图能够很快地找到公寓的设施十分齐备能够满足我们的所有需求房东很热情当知道我们想去镰仓时帮我们推荐了一条较为便捷的路线使是我们有了十分完美的镰仓之行对了我们还得到了房东的小礼物
十分完美的居住区域十分完美的房子十分完美的服务
교통편의점마트 가까워서 편했고br테라스가 있어서 매우 좋았습니다br청결도는 최고입니다

We had a great stay at ks family apartment The apartment is clean and spotless Everything looks exactly like the photo The bed is very comfortable and it feels like home The host is very friendly and helpful He even offered to send us to the train station on our last day
非常棒的一次入住体验离车站很近公寓旁边应有尽有药妆店超市居酒屋饭店感觉只要在周边活动就可以了房东人也非常好味道一级棒的果汁最后一天还开车送我们去了地铁站推荐

此次东京之行是带着老公和孩子的一次很随性的休假而最值得庆幸的事情就是能够预定到KFamily的房子坐落在东京葛饰区立石的这套房子真的让我无法用言语形容因为太喜欢这套房子所以专门在行程结束回到国内才很郑重的写下评论用动静兼宜来形容这套房子很适合房子所处位置和东京市区的日本桥银座比相对较偏一点但周边生活设施极为完善便利店商店街美食店一应俱全同时房子周边500米内既有本地居民的休闲公园亦有极为适合早晚散步闲逛的河边步道更有大大小小的神社遍布民房中间或路边桥头如果你想要享受一个恬静舒适的纯日式假期选择这套房子绝对没错交通方面房子离立石站非常近走路不超过8分钟去往东京市区的银座筑地市场秋枼原东京塔浅草寺以及迪士尼等地也极方便坐地铁用时最远的也不超四十分钟如果你想要购物以及体验东京都市的快节奏慢享受的生活方式选择住在这里也很便利哦说说房子情况我们住在二楼从玄关脱鞋进入房子开始就赞叹房主的用心木质的楼梯地板以及你所见的一切设施都擦拭的极为干净二楼的卧室宽敞放置五个榻榻米睡铺完全没问题且有独立阳台卫生间厨房在这住的几天常常恍惚特别是早上起床后给孩子和老公热牛奶准备早餐仿佛是在自己家里的感觉似得晚上还可买些小菜日本清酒回来坐在阳台上和爱的人一起慢语清酌真的很惬意提下老公和孩子对房子的评价孩子是极喜欢啦每天我们出去在立石周边转悠他都嚷嚷着要回住的酒店回去后在房间里上蹦下跳极为欢快看着他都觉得开心老公嘛不善言语但后来我们离开房子入住东京市中心的酒店后老公不无遗憾的表示唉还是住在立石的时候舒服很惬意很享受哈哈这应该是他的最高评价了吧最后当然要提下房子的主人了典型的日本小伙子因语言不太通没有很深的沟通但从房子的设施和维护上能感觉到房主的用心和负责我们到立石的当天因语言不通方向感不强都快走到房子旁边了也没找到房子呵呵说起来挺不好意思的庆幸刚好有同胞帮忙给房东电话后两分钟不到房东就亲自来接并带我们入住近在咫尺的房子入住哈哈哈 入住的第二天赶上下雨一早房东还亲自送果汁过来很让我们家宝宝开心因他最喜欢喝果汁 洋洋洒洒写了这么多只想表达对这套房子的喜爱下次如果再过去我想我一定还会选择这里入住的
체크인 시간 전에 입실 하도록 도와주셔서 감사했습니다처음에 웰컴 주스도 가져다 주시고 수건도 더 요청드렸을 때 흔쾌히 가져다 주셔서 고마웠습니다 집은 보이는 그대로이고 욕실과 화장실이 분리되어 있어서 좋았습니다 다만 겨울에는 조금 추울 수 있을 거 같아요 숙소는 매우 깨끗하고 좋았습니다 휴대용 와이파이도 매우 편리했구요

Clean Fantastic appointments toilet bath kitchen Comfortable futons sprung floor Great porch Super neighborhood Close to the Keisei Line Pasmo in to town But we loved being out in this out of the way neighborhood Mr T saw to all our needs great book of local restaurants on kitchen table when we arrived And the portable WIFI was taken everywhere we went so convenient Thanks KFamily

This place is as good as it looks on the website The hosts are awesome and helpful if you ask them questions are where to visit The host came by to give us apple juice too on the second day brThe location is a bit far from places like shinjuku about 1 hour train  which was totally fine for me If you want to experience good local life  I think this is one of the places you want to be There are cosmetic stores food and some toy stores to keep it fresh brTokyo Skytree is about 20 minutes away by train  Google maps will certainly guide you around if you tell it to go fromto KeiseiTateishi station brOverall this is an awesome place You get out from the loud and hectic parts of Tokyo br
太完美了 屋子和照片上一摸一样 房东很热情 送的果汁很好喝 最后还送我们去机场的火车站 非常贴心 日式榻榻米简直是完美 下次还要再来
Clean and helpful host is very nicebr離車站近且附近機能不錯超市跟餐廳房子簡單乾淨很舒服
快適に過ごせましたbr畳ながら敷布団は厚いタイプなので硬さを感じることはなくwifi等の設備も十分です唯一不満だったのはお風呂に座椅子がないこと子供たちを洗うのに不自由を感じましたしかしそんな大きな問題ではなく多人数家族で東京に泊まるにはコストを考えると最高の場所でしたありがとうございました

My family of 4 stayed at the Wahuu house for 4 days 3 nights and loved it From the time we stepped into the apartment we felt right at home Photos posted in the Airbnb website all accurately showed the condition and size of the apartment The apartment was also very clean and fully equipped We did not have any problems getting to the apartment from the train station Its less than 5 mins walk from the KeiseiTateishi train station with lots of local shops and convenience stores along the way Very convenient The apartment is located away from the city area and requires a bit of train travel to get to the local attractions Though abit tedious with 2 young kids in tow but we personally felt that it was worth the effort of travelling because the apartment is just so inviting and the host is so very accomodating We also loved the apple juice which the host personally delivered on our first day and they also made it a point to drop by on the day of our arrival just to check in on us to make sure all was ok This is definitely a recommended place to stay when in TokyoIf we are ever back in Tokyo we will be here again Thank you KFamily for the wonderful accommodation See you soon

Really great places to stay in Tokyo Just 5 minutes walk from the Tateishi station  A little bit away from the central of city But its not complex to transfer Therere a lot of kinds of restaurants cheap traditional and delicious The hosts is quite nice and sent clean towels everyday Wanna to live here again when we back to Tokyo one day  彩蛋部分这里竟然是大空翼的故乡有大空翼他们的铜像ʃƪ
很日式房屋很干净交通方便房东很nice

Apartment looks exactly like the photo Very clean and very easy to find Our family stayed here for 4 nights And we love fully equipped kitchen brIts a bit far from downtown Tokyo but its in a lovely neighborhood with a shopping zone nearby which you could find drug store and japanese style fastfood restaurants Its less than 5 min walk to Keisei line subway And its only 4 stops from here to Tokyosky tree  Host provides a very clear map and local information for shopping and dining We definitely will recommend this place to all of our friends and family Stop considering you will love this simple but warm place 5 stars

The house is really beautiful and Japanstyle we can get the food near the house and also can cook the food by ourself The host give us the gifts apple juice If you want to find the best house in Tokyo  this one is your best choice Warm  convinceclean

这家民宿是我看了图片和大家的评论最后订下的到了发现图片和评价都没骗人真的是一次完美的体验一整层房间都是我们自己的房间够大住三四人完全没问题还有个小阳台每天都有人给换干净毛巾屋子总是干干净净的孩子对睡榻榻米简直兴奋极了周边的社区非常安静便捷走路几分钟就是一条可爱的商业街餐馆居酒屋药妆店便利店一应俱全散步几分钟就是河边还有当地人的街心公园根本不用去旅游景点人挤人在这里呆几天都不会觉得闷对了屋子对面就是一家小幼儿园早上在阳台上边晒太阳边看当地人送孩子上幼儿园很有意思br店主邮件回复非常及时还送我们好喝的果汁总之是一次完美的住宿体验

The host was very friendly and welcoming The place was a lovely size and fit 4 people The location is convenient for travel to intercity and our day trips It is also a short work from the train station The surrounding neighbourhood had a 24hr convenience store as well as many resturants to eat at I highly recommend staying here

Our stay here was phenomenal KFamilys place is immaculate close to grocery stores and the train station brAs hosts they were kind helpful and understanding My son forgot one of his souvenirs at the apartment after we had already checked out Koji was kind enough to bring it to us at the train station I am very grateful for his kindness I recommend Kfamilys place to anyone who plans on staying in Tokyo

We loved our four night stay at the Wahuu apartment Mr T was very welcoming and helpful checking us in early and driving us to the apartment and driving us to Aoto Station upon departure He also supplied fresh towels daily and was on hand to answer any questions Tateishi is a delightful neighborhood and very convenient both for transit and for small shops and restaurants We were especially glad that there are several 24hour establishments within a few minutes walk Also the tatami style rooms are perfect for family travel and the kitchen is handy although not stocked for serious cooking Incredible value for the price and truly a great place to stay with great hosts We would stay here again very happily

The Kfamily are incredibly lovely hosts We got helpful clear instructions a friendly hello upon arrival apple juice and fresh towels both days a late checkout and an offer to be dropped at the train station closer to the airport on the final day The apartment is very large with 2 great bedrooms and a wellmarked kitchen Nice balcony We liked the residential location but still just a short walk to the train station and lots of places to eat I would definitely recommend staying with them
