br일본여행 때 늘 호텔만 이용하다가 처음으로 에어비엔비를 통해 숙소를 이용해봤습니다br전통 다다미식이라 숙소내부가 너무이쁘고 욕실 및 거실은 현대식으로 되어있어 사용하기 편리했습니다br집 주인 부부가 너무 친절해서br편히 지내다 올수있었습니다br특히 동네가 번화하지않고 한적하여br동네산책하는 즐거움이 있었습니다br주변에 교통시설 및 편의시설도 가까워서 좋았습니다
It was an amazing experience The host was fantastic and so helpful I would choose this place again for my Tokyo trips in the future
离地铁挺近的房子整洁舒适推荐
房子和图片一样非常的漂亮符合我们的预期位置离天空树很近周围是居民区很安静地铁站下来还有居酒屋和便利店每天晚上回来我们都会去吃夜宵房东人真的超级热情送了两次果汁都非常好喝最后一天还送我们到地铁站房间会每天打扫换新的浴巾很干净
nicest host in the world Definitely worth staying

我們一行8人附近很近車站京成立石但我們是自駕遊附近亦有很多停車埸供選擇毎天最大收1500 我們一共訂了2F 及3F共住了四晚業主很窝心未到前已不斷問我們何時chech in有什麽需要幫忙我們於晚上8時才到達進入房間冷氣已全開等待我們房間整㓗及厨房設備齊全我們每朝在一起煑早餐吃十分開心更窩心是業主毎朝都會来問有什麽需要及幫忙而且毎天都会派人来清理房間好似酒店服務附近雖然環境清静但有超市Lawson薬房 晚上11點才關門100 店而且亦有很多食店供選擇我們非常享受此四晚住宿
日本之行最好的一次住宿体验周围有吉丸水产药妆店天妇罗店全家最主要是房间太棒了住两天太短了下次会只住这里
K family was amazing host Very kind and they know how to make guest comfortable brThe house was clean and cozy

I came to tokyo for the first time with my mother and we really enjoyed our stay Its easy to get to the popular tourist sites yet the neighbourhood is peaceful and friendly and it was so quiet at night The Kawanos were so helpful and friendly We got apple juice as a welcoming gift and we had a lift to aoto station when it was time to leave We highly recommend the Kawanos as hosts and this apartment for a convient yet peaceful place to stay

I loved my experience at this apartment  The host is very welcoming and kind For instance our toaster was broken the first day we told him and in the next 5 minutes he replaced it He is very helpful  brConcerning the appartement its a lovely typical Japanese home comfortable and the house is well equipped We had also a pocket wifi which is very helpful when traveling I recommend this place
房屋整洁静谧很适合休息离地铁站大概七八分钟路程路上有几家简餐房东热情和善对提的问题回答得很详尽满意
房子干净卫生是基础时尚温馨是主调简约方便是实用洗手间采用智能感应系统 节约环保而贴心洗浴间干湿分区配有干燥干衣暖温功能照顾到您的所有需要房东是个暖男每天晚上当我们拖着疲惫的身躯回到街道的转角处总能看到从露台射出来的桔红色灯光打开房门发现整个屋子的灯都亮了它们是为了等待我们回家而亮的谢谢未曾谋面的帅哥房东

位置还不错 坐地铁到浅草就20分钟 房子离地铁站很近 路过一个市场 竟然还有叽丸水产房东很热心的准备了中文的周边介绍和东京介绍去了他推荐的温泉性价比很高本来还想去他推荐的日本料理店就在住所旁边结果那天没开门留个念想下次再去啦走的时候房东还帮我们把行李搬下楼送到了车站来的时候还送了瓶日本畅销饮品确实很好喝我们自己又买了好几次房子是榻榻米的孩子超爱住了四天都觉得不够总是非常推荐去房东很多细节很到位很贴心
非常好的入住体验房子的位置很好附近是居民区对于游客来说比住在市中心更能感受到日本的氛围附近有很多便利店餐馆和药妆店房东人非常好最后一天送了我们果汁还送我们到Aoto站搭机场快线下次如果来东京还会住这边
everything is perfectIf I come again I will book this house to live in

일본 전통 다다미 방에서 지낼 수 있으며 숙소는 깨끗합니다한 아파트에 층별로 집이 1개씩 있는 형태이며 저희는 2층에 묶었습니다 숙소 자체에 대해서는 굉장히 만족도가 높습니다 그리고 호스트도 도움을 요청할 일이 생기면 바로바로 친절하게 대응을 해주셔서 좋았습니다 마지막 날은 근처 환승역까지 차로 태워주시는 호의도 베풀어주셔서 너무 감사했습니다단지 한 가지 아쉬웠던 점은 신주쿠 하라주쿠 등 시내와 조금 먼 위치였지만 5분 거리에 지하철이 있어서 이동이 어렵지는 않았습니다 도쿄에 다시 간다면 재방문할 생각이 있을 정도로 만족했습니다
服务非常贴心入住还准备了果汁非常好喝回来那天还特意送我们去车站下次去首推
体验日式住宅很不错的体验整个房子的装修都很简洁实用推荐
非常不错的房子房子与照片一致充满日式的风味而且附近有便利店幾丸水产七轮烤肉离地铁大概就几分钟的步行距离另外房屋主人很热心旅途方面的问题都可以问他而且还送了我们美味的果汁最后一天还送我们去了青砥站省却了我们背着大堆行李转车的麻烦
The hosts are very friendly and willing to come help when called The location is a bit far from some of the highlights of Tokyo but it easy to get too since its located near the train station
Good
非常滿意

1民宿在居民区中离地铁站相当近距离浅草柴又出门20分钟左右就能到住在民宿可以感受得到当地人的生活气息对面是个幼儿园出地铁去房间的必经路上有个市场矶丸水产七轮烤肉拉面罗森药妆店等吃饭和购买生活用品非常方便并且选择很多2房主热情友善房间里面留了旅行指南和周边的推荐有免费的随身WiFi给房客使用第一天送给了我们饮料最后一天还帮助搬行李送到地铁站3房间非常干净并且面积比想象要大卫生间干湿分离洗澡上厕所互不打扰厨房冰箱微波炉锅碗瓢盆也都有提供br房间高于预期非常适合白天感受东京后想找个安静的地方休息的家庭希望以后还可以入住
非常日本当地的住宿环境榻榻米很棒

My friends and I loved our stay at the Wahuu apartment It is a huge place super clean and with a flexible layout that worked well for the three adults in my group  We only wished the weather had been better on our trip to enjoy the awesome front balcony The Kawanos were gracious hosts communicated well before we arrived and provided useful instructions and a guide to the neighborhood Mr T was incredibly nice and stopped by just to say hello and offer us rides to Aoto station on our last day The location is a little out of the way but very wellconnected to transit Its easy to explore any parts of the city located off of the Asakusa Line and very easy to get to either Haneda or Narita Airports
Très bel appartement dans un quartier agréable proche de la gare et pratique pour rejoindre laéroport de Narita
Prompt response and very helpfulA lot of good restaurant and very peaceful room facility is great for all kind of groupreally nice to stay here

We had an amazing time at zen house The place is very close to the station and is quite central Its a rather large space too and very comfortable The host family were very accommodating and helpful when it came to finding your way around They provide so much information on arrival it was amazing
第一次住的民宿很好的房间很好的房东大爱
空间超大位置离地铁站也近楼下就是商业街买东西吃饭也很方便住的超级满意

어느 집에 가야 할지 고민 중이 신가요 br여기 이때까지 유럽동남아일본중국대만 등 에어비앤비 이용 했을때br여기가 BEST OF BEST 였습니다br발매트 세척부터 시작해서 환풍기까지 먼지가 없는 놀랄정도의 청결도br전통 일본 집이라 혹시나 냄새가 날까 했는데 삼나무향만 가득하고br내부 부대시설은 현대식이라 정말 좋았습니다br신주쿠나 교토 같은 번화가 중심보단 여긴 어떤 느낌이였냐면br일단 외제차도 많았고 서울로 치면 청담동  부산으로 치면 센텀시티br느낌 이었습니다 br주인분께서 소통도 굉장히 잘 해 주셔서 정말 좋았습니다br위치도 긴자나 신주쿠까지 지하철로 바로 가기 때문에 그렇게br멀게 느껴지지도 않았습니다 지하철 역사까지 5분 이기때문에 br많이 걷지도 않았구요  br여길 한마디로 평가하자면 도쿄 숙소의 TOP 티 오 피 다  입니다br좋은 숙소에서 좋은 여행 보내길 바랍니다
Thank you for being excellent hosts We appreciate your attentiveness and constant offer to help us navigate We especially thank you for helping us catch the express train at the last day
nice trip in tokyo房东超级热情每一晚回去空调净化器都已经打开还送来了好喝的饮料走的时候还开车送到最方便的车站以后再来东京的首选

말이 필요없습니다 부족한 부분이 하나도 없을만큼 완벽한 숙소였습니다br호스트분의 친절하고 신속한 응답과 대처 가끔씩 오셔서 궁금한 부분을 질문하면 이해하기 쉽게 해결하여 주셨고 특수한 이벤트가 있는 날에는 핫 스팟까지 알려주셨습니다 둘째 날에 웰컴주스까지 굉장히 친절하셨습니다br숙소는 굉장히 청결하며 분위기도 아주 좋았으며 다양한 기능이 있지만 특히 빠른 인터넷과 TV이용이 너무 좋았습니다 다만 한가지 아쉬운 점은 전철이 게이세이선이라 JR선에 비해서 주요 관광지는 교통비가 좀 들긴합니다br흠잡을데 없는 완벽한 숙소입니다 어디에서 묵을까 고민하고 계신분은 여기로 정하셔도 후회없이 만족하실겁니다ㅎㅎ
A truly great spot for visiting Tokyo You get a residential feel while being within walking distance of the train station and lots of good places to eat

최고의 숙소였습니다br중심가에서 약간 떨어져 있어서 교통비가 약간 드는 단점이 있지만 그 단점을 커버할 무수히 많은 장점이 있습니다 안내가 자세히 나와있어서 집을 찾기도 매우 쉽고 놀랄만큼 깨끗하고 조용해서 쉬기엔 최적의 장소였습니다 우리가 여행하는 동안 도쿄가 엄청 추웠는데 하루종일 밖에 있을거라 아침에 난방을 다 끄고 나왔는데 저녁에 집에 도착하니 난방도 불도 모두 켜져 있어서 감동이었습니다 그리고 집 옆에 추천해준 음식점 완전 감동이었습니다 여행전에 도쿄 맛집을 미리 검색해서 일부러 찾아간 맛집보다 더 맛있는 집이었습니다 다음번에br도쿄를 또 가게 되면 또 여기에 머물고 싶습니다
체크인 시간보다 일찍가서 잘 모르고 바로 방으로 들어갔어요 괜찮다고 해주셔서 너무 감사했고 사진과 똑같이 방 분위기가 너무 좋았습니다 마지막에 선물까지 챙겨주셔서 너무 감사했습니다 다음에 또 기회가 되면 머무를 의사 100프로 입니다
房子很好能真实的体验日本生活周围也有很多美食应该说应有尽有房间里的浴缸真的大爱每天拖着疲惫的身躯回到房间泡澡是最佳的选择房东还会送来好喝的果汁总之一切都很棒

非常非常棒的住宿体验日本第一站的公寓离东京立石地铁站很近步行几分钟就可以到附近便利店餐馆也很多非常方便房间虽然不大但四个人四个行李箱足够而且每个细节都设计的非常人性化使用起来很方便关键房东非常热情贴心入住指南和地图很清晰我们到房间已经是晚上灯和暖气早已经打开了很温暖有家的感觉当问房东怎么垃圾分类的时候房东直接就过来公寓告诉我们还送了一大瓶果汁给我们然后热心的问我们行程安排告诉我们怎么坐车最后退房那天还开车送我们去了地铁站另一个大点的地铁站非常感谢下次来东京还住这里强烈推荐

Kawa is an very kind landlord who picks us up from the subwaysends us to his homedelivers us juiceand comes to clean room everydaybrHis house is decorated with Japanese styleIts large and has complete functionshighly recommended
这是一家让你身心舒适的绝佳住处无处不在的人性化设计在美感与使用舒适间拿捏得精准到位房东的热心让出门在外的你不再孤立悄无声息地安排好一切在你需要的时候随时在身边我想这就是服务的最高境界吧
除了位置稍微有一点偏以外其他一切都很好交通方便周围很多小店可以满足一切需要还有一家伊藤房间面积也比较大不会像有些日本的房间基本转不开身性价比很高

중심지와 거리가 멀다는 단점을 몽땅 상쇄할 만큼 좋은 숙소였어요 묵는 동안 매일 오전 수건 교체 간단한 청소를 해주셔서 일정 끝내고 깔끔하게 정돈된 숙소에서 쉴 수 있다는 게 좋았습니다 신주쿠 롯폰기 등 시내에서 지하철로 1시간 정도 걸려서 조금 늦은 시간에 돌아오는 경우가 많았는데 타테이시역과 정말 가깝기도 하고 동네가 전혀 무섭지 않은 분위기여서 안심하고 놀 수 있었어요 ㅎㅎ
根据房东给的checkin information很顺利入住每天都会送好喝的饮料贴心的询问当天我们的行程给出方便的建议楼下就可以吃到超好吃的居酒屋总之一切都很棒
公寓離京成立石站較近交通上面算相當便利從車站到公寓也會經過一段商店街要購入食物商品很方便br公寓裡也相當乾淨整齊跟照片一模一樣房東人真的很好耐心的回覆訊息入住期間還送上一大瓶蘋果汁給我們享用得知我們要前往迪士尼還開車載我們前往公車站等車最後一天回程也載我們到青砥站轉車省去拖著行李走來走去的不便br是相當不錯的公寓讓我們在東京擁有美好的回憶

This place is truly one of a kind The attention to detail on Mr Ts home captures the essence of the character of Tokyo The location of this Airbnb is conveniently located near the subway to set off to explore This home also have the proper amenities to be able to eat at home and wash laundry for those that plan to stay in Tokyo for an extended period of time I would highly recommend to those considering on staying here during your stay here
Fantastic place and fantastic hosts There is only one single drawback to this place and thats the distance to Tokyo center Everything else is just great
房间非常好一家四口入住正合适父母也满意房间设施一应俱全设计感好房东也很热情找不到地方跑了一大圈出来接虽然离市中心有点远但是离立石地铁站非常近在居民区可以感受到当地的古朴一切很方便也很满意推荐入住

This was a great base for our time in Tokyo The apartment was beautiful clean and comfortable  even nicer than in the pictures We loved walking through the residential neighborhood and appreciated the hosts tips on local events happening while we were in town Thanks for the great stay
很安静很干净离中心稍微远一点

Have a pleasant stay over here the owner is helpful enough they allowed us to check in even though we arrived early The location is surround with restaurants and convenient stores the owner somehow will recommend you for the best restaurant and places to hang around They also bring us some fresh milk and eggs in the early morning as our refreshment twice during our stay At the last day at Tokyo they even suggest to send us to the nearest train station which will direct us to the airport without pulling bulky luggage to change to another station Appreciate all the effort they made and we definitely will revisit this place again
Its a very convenient and confortable place for visit And Mr K gave us a warm welcome Will visit again
必须5星评价强烈推荐br民宿比照片和文字描述还要好房主是个日本帅哥入住时送来果汁临走时清晨不到6点就等在楼下送我们去能够直达羽田机场的地铁站每天下午清扫房间我们晚上归来总是亮着一盏灯在迎接我们br民宿周边非常安静一出地铁有一条小街全是好吃的非常地道比城里知名的商业化的日餐餐厅要好吃的多以至于我们有3个晚上逛完街后特意饿着肚子回来吃饭br总之一切都比想象中的好很多强烈强烈强烈推荐
离市中心远到市中心需要转地铁一天来回地铁要100多人民币 居住环境比较好房东非常热情天天早上都会来关心并且带些土特产

Its my first time to book a room on AirbnbLuckily I meet a very kind hostHe gave us delicious juice to drink and cleaned the room everydayIn additionhe offered to drive us to the nearest metro station and carried luggages for us Five stars recommendation第一次在爱彼迎上订房间就碰到这么好的房东非常善良和热情入住的第二天就给我们送来了好喝的果汁走得时候还主动送我们到了直达羽田机场最近的地铁站说说民宿的位置在押上线的京成立石站附近地铁站牌上只写了立石站走路过去5分钟根据房东提供的地图很容易就能找到过去的路上是一条商店街有便利店和很多家吃饭的地方还有百元店和药妆店很方便吃的推荐商店街对面马路斜对面的一家烤肉店有近江牛可以吃价格也不贵1400多日元一份我们点了好几份吃满足民宿坐落于居民区晚上很安静房间整洁干净而且空间蛮大没有转不过身的感觉五星好评下次来东京还会入住
Très bel appartement élégant et propre Laccueil a été également très agréable et nous avons même été accompagnés jusquà la gare pour notre départ Parfait  Je recommande vivement
너무 깨끗하고 편안하고 아름다웠습니다

The Airbnb was very traditional and unique The place was very clean and looked even better than in the pictures The location was quiet and close to the subway station We met Mr T on our second day and he bought us a huge bottle of apple juice He was super friendly and gave a lot of tips on where to visit around Tokyo On our last day Mr T also gave us a ride to the train station so that we could catch the express train to the airport Next time I come to Tokyo I will definitely stay here again
特别适合一家人来住宿体验非常好br我和妈妈都非常喜欢这种传统日式的榻榻米房间且房间非常深非常大老爸看中了阳台住宿区很安静阳台上可以抽烟早上观看小学生上学的情景真的分外惬意br另外帅哥房东有经常来送橘子水哦还推荐了附近的地道小吃特别感谢你这样的房东让我觉得下次也一定要继续选择你家呢嘻嘻br非常棒的体验感谢K Family

Didnt expect such Huge size of the room since Tokyo is famous of the hotel room size anyway me and my 2 kids loved the house and it was lovely of Mr T being helpful of taking us to the station to catch up with the train

Mr T took his time off to pick us and drop off at Aoto station We werent expecting this but it was a great value added service that we deeply appreciate given that we had to handle our luggages and two young toddlers Room was clean and surrounding was quiet Love the feel of experiencing the quiet outskirt of the busy city centre Can truly see how the locals lived their lives here Thank you for the hospitality Mr T

We really loved this place and it was my BEST bnb experience Our host was so kind and the services were just like hotels His recommendations were also helpful Ryokan style room also made our trip unforgettable We were worried about the location at first but tateishi was such a perfect choice compared to city area We will choose our hosts bnb again next time

Laccoglienza di Mister T è stata ottima La casa è molto carina in stile orientale comoda e ben attrezzata vicina ai market e alla stazione della metro Noi siamo in cinque in famiglia e siamo stati benebrMister T è passato ogni giorno per cambiare gli asciugamani e fare un po di pulizia Alla partenza ci ha accompagnato alla stazione comoda x prendere un unico treno x raggiungere laereoporto Raccomanderei questo posto a tutti

My stay at the Wahuu apt has been a fantastic experience brMy family very much enjoy the hospitality the place looks very nice filled with amenities very comfortable and cleanbrKsan is very helpful  easy to communicate with and Mr T is a friendly  awesome guy who gave us a bottle of amazing apple juice he also drove us to the station when we checked outbrI gotta say our stay at Ks place is one of our highlights when we were in JapanbrDefinitely will come back when I visit Tokyo again greetings from Indonesia
동네 주변 조용하고 편의점도 멀지 않고 지하철도 가까웠습니다 숙소는 사진에서 보는것과 같이 똑같았어요 똑같이 이쁘고 넓고 일본스러웠어요 중심가에서 조금 떨어져 있다 싶지만 그 모든게 이해 될만큼 멋진 집이었습니다 호스트분도 굉장히 친절하셨고 재밌으셨어요 다음에 도쿄여행도 꼭 이곳에 머물고 싶습니다 정말 즐거운 여행이 된 것 같아요 감사합니다
房屋设施齐全周边配套都是当地居民的住宅和小店房主一家很热心提供了很实用的旅游建议BTW房东一家在东京有多处民宿可以有很多选择
家人都很满意房子空间够大楼下不远就是商店街只是我们一直在市中心逛周边都没怎么玩房东小哥哥很亲切最后给我们送到车站还帮我们查了最近一般的电车时间
我们住在二楼榻榻米的风格和屋内的设施都让我们特别满意但是由于每天回来太晚阳台我们并没有很好的利用起来先说下房东热情好客办理退房后我们将行李暂时寄存在房东那儿但是包内有巧克力房东不厌其烦的将箱子搬至另一个hotel细致周到的服务让我印象深刻还有要是让房东到Auto接你需要到青邸站哦羽田机场有直达车很方便哦
房子真的超级棒  住家也人超好 住家也非常开心我会日语交流没有问题 所以也得到了更多的帮助 房子也真的超级喜欢 很干净应有尽有 每天回家空调都会开好 房间也会打扫干净 第一天也给我们带了果汁  我们和住家说想吃烤肉也会送我们去最近的烤肉店 到最后一天也会送我们去青砥站  非常贴心 以后来东京还会住这里br
We have a great time here Everything is very good MrT and the team help us a lots Recommended for everyone We will come back again
交通在京成线上机场过去很方便直接乘京成线电车去浅草和天空树可以直接到很方便去其他新宿秋叶原之类的相比住市中心就要多一次换乘了房间很好很和式很舒服附近有商店街里面有吃得药妆小超市甚至还有电玩房东很热情如果事先和他说好在入住和离开的时候他可以来青砥站接送
位置方便距离铁路站点几分钟路程附近居住区有不少本地美食选择房间干净卫生房主热情好客专门车站迎接并给予很多旅游建议
房主特别热情亲自开车送我们去车站主动介绍周边的美食

Muy atento y amigable Nos visitó prácticamente cada día y nos trajo zumo natural de manzana buenísimo  brNos aclaró muchas dudas y nos dijo como llegar a muchos de los sitios a los que queriamos ir así q ahorramos tiempo en buscar conexiones de metro brMuy recomendable
屋子非常棒干净而且设施齐全装饰也都很有特色我们全家都很喜欢而且每天在我们外出游玩的时候房间都会被打扫整理干净br周边设施也很丰富超市饭店应有尽有brK先生每天的路线建议也很贴心最后他热情地用车把我们送到车站感谢

We had a great tome at the apartment and particularly appreciated clean towels every day and  help when some of our luggage got lost I can see why this family ate superhosts and would really recommend thiem for anyone coming to Tokyo for the first tome

The apartment was sparkling clean and had everything we needed for a short stay Mr T stopped by a couple times unannounced which was a bit of a surprise but he was very kind and helpful Would definitely recommend this home for anyone looking to get off the beaten path and experience local Tokyo
離立石車站很近br房間大小能夠容納 45個人2F 有獨立陽台br房內有提供旅遊資訊讓大家參考可以去哪裡逛逛走走br設施及設備都非常完善老闆和他的團隊也都非常NICE和熱情br對於團體或想放鬆的人來說是個很棒的推薦br下次如果還有到東京還會繼續選擇光臨這裡

Great Host the place was exactly like he pictures We are a family of 3 and we enjoyed our stay very much Mr T even picked us up from the local train station Only issue we had was the portable wifi connection wasnt stable would recommend you to get your own data simcard Everything else about the place is just perfect Close to convince store train was literally around the corner Recommended for people who want to live like a local for their stay in Japan This is our third time in Tokyo and the experience this time is much better compared to living in a modern hotel back then

The hosts provided daily housekeeping good coffee and a ride to the train station the neighborhood is quiet will all the amenities you could want After busy days in Tokyo its a nice place to come home to Mr T is a great host

1房子和图片一样是日式风格的民宿br2附近都是居民区公寓对比是幼儿园每天早上可以坐在阳台看着小朋友上学也可以体验到当地的生活和文化br3附近有便利店市场超市药妆店居酒屋而且也不贵br4离地铁站不远大概35分钟步行就到了br5遇到超级棒的房东MrT推荐了我们的饭店都是好吃而不贵的也会推荐我们去那些地方游玩每天早上都会过来看我们有什么需要和更换毛巾每晚会帮我们开好灯及空调还带我们去吃了好赞的烧烤在最后一天我们赶飞机时遇上了京成线故障停运房东特意赶来车站载着我们去找的士不然还真赶不上飞机非常感谢他的帮忙br下次来东京也会首选这公寓的
很好的住宿体验安静的街区干净的公寓齐全的设施适合家庭入住公寓周边有便利店和饭店很方便房东人很好而且英语很不错交流没有问题还送了我们一大瓶果汁会推荐朋友来入住

El apartamento está decorado con mucha clase todo muy zen Futones cómodos Wifi pocket funcionaba bien Ellos son simpatiquísimos además de forma natural sin ser forzado Hablan bastante bien el español así que eso fue de gran ayuda inglés muy bienbrCambian las toallas cada día tienen muchísimos detalles y nos han ayudado en todo y másbrLo único es que al apartamento se llega en metro y no se puede solo con rail pass Aunque eso hace que la zona sea auténtica nada turística y tranquilabrUn superapartamento y ellos un 10brRecomemdable

Staying at K Familys Zen house was a great experience It is very spacious and set in a traditional Japanese style with beds kept on Tatami mats sliding wooden doors etc with all modern amenities  Mr T was amazing and he was kind to pick us and drop from Aoto station which was very helpful as we had luggage etc He also spent some time with us to give various local tips which were very helpful and he was also very prompt in responding to various queries regarding travel directionsbrThe house is located close 5 minute walk to Keisei Tateishi station There are various shopping options available closeby and the greater Tokyo is easily accessible via the Keisei line as well as from JR Nippori line which is 2 short hops away on Keisei line 1015 minutes

炒鸡好的房东入住的四晚感觉每天都有非常棒的体感感觉把这间民宿当成了自己的家一样我们住的是二楼进入玄关就要拖鞋赤脚上楼每天都会打扫的非常干净进入房间也是一样没有拖鞋的如果入住的宝贝不适应日本习惯的话自己行李里面备双拖鞋哦厨房用品也是一应俱全还有磨好的咖啡粉等着你哦浴室和马桶是分开的两个房间每天都有人打扫的超级干净我妈很洁癖的人都称赞不止宝贝们可以事先Email联系房东到青袛站接回程也可以送到青袛站离房子两百米就是商业街炒鸡多的便利店还有京成立石地铁站也在这其实交通很方便的下次东京行还是继续会入住

Mr T was extremely accommodating and made my family of 5 feel very at home in the Wahuu house Everything was very clean and Mr T even provided a new towel per guest each day He even picked us up from the train station and held our luggage in his car and brought it back to the station for us on our last day as we had an evening flight Mr Ts guidebook of local restaurantsshops and things to do around the area was also very helpful I recommend the yakitori restaurant a 2 min walk from the house Although this house was about 50 mins from The main ShinjukuShibuya area it was a nice change from the hustle and bustle Very calm and more localtraditional Japanese neighborhood Best Airbnb we stayed at in Tokyo as it was very spacious and decorated nicely The floor beds were also comfortable Would recommend staying here

Tateishi is full of Japanese traditional flavor The streets are clean and tidy There are many shops with special features in the quiet city MrTs house  is very cosy and comfortable The location is pretty good It is very near the Tateishi station just for five minutes walk On this walking you can find 100yen shop  Japanese yakiniku Matsuya and supermarket Mr T ever offered pick up and drop off services to us at Aoto Station to make our  journey more convenient Mr T was very helpful and considerate which made us feel very warm I have only a suggestion which it had better to put more wall hooks  for hanging  We hope to live in his house again when we come to Tokyo again Thank you

Thank you K Famil for everything we have in order the place is very clean the service is very careful my friends and I are very satisfied Mr K sent the apple is very good after returning to Hong Kong will promote friends they will live again Mr Ks house

This place is absolutely amazing K Family are by far the best Airbnb hosts Ive ever met Fresh towels everyday amazing suggestions for local spots welcome gifts Japanese apple juice and some pastries The place is very close 5min walk to the nearest station its a little far from the main part of Tokyo but its very easy to travel there Katsushika is such a quaint and historical area of Tokyo that offers lots of delicious food brTakayuki was amazing to us the whole time we stayed at their Airbnb He picked us up from the station and dropped us off when we left He even gave us little goodbye gifts brTakayuki even took us out for dinner and for drinkskaraoke It was such a fun evening getting to know some locals and going to some popular local spots brThe place itself looks exactly like the photos Everything is so beautiful and comfortable The Japanese toilets and heatedcooling showers were the highlights It made our stay that much more comfortable brEverything was sparkling clean and easy to use They also provide a portable wifi that was so convenient The connection breaks once ever 1 hour or so but it was still very reliable to use on our day to day travels Just make sure to bring the charging chord with you brI can go on and on but like I said by far the best Airbnb Ive stayed in K Family are thoughtful kind hosts Next time I come to Tokyo I will definitely find them again Dont think twice you wont regret staying with them

We were really fortunate to spend time in 2 of K Families houses in Katsushika while we were in Japan  K was very helpful collecting us and taking us to the local station and both houses had great facilities and are very quiet  We would strongly recommend staying at Wahuu  a lovely Japanese style flat with lots of room and a great balcony to sit and relax  Highly recommended
房子很好交通方便走几分钟就有地铁站房东非常热情带我们熟悉住宿附近环境也接送我们去坐地铁去机场下次再来的话也会选择这里
非常好房东很热情 告诉我们附近的景点 房间也很漂亮

Book this now If you are worried about it being expensive dontbrWhat you pay is way less than what you are getting in terms of service cleanliness well maintained apartment rooms with a nice theme and hospitality brThe Kawano family go above and beyond if you are stuck in a situation where you may need a ride to the station or if you need some extra time before checkout as long as you tell them in advance brMy group of 4 friends would highly recommend this place and all agree this is the best airbnb experience weve had We are extremely grateful to them and would book their place again with no hesitation brThank you Kawano Family
The house is amazing and clean MrT was kind and support us for many information The picture shows in Air bnb is correct

We had a great time as a family in this apartment We stayed with a baby and a 3yearold They both enjoyed the place The host is very communicative with lots of advice and help The pickup from Aoto train station was very helpful because we arrived late after a long haul flight Other than that walking from KiseiTatsei train station is super easy even with tired children The neighborhood is fantastic We enjoyed take aways restaurants and the nearby playground Awesome place for a trip to Tokyo
Asking if staying at K familys Wahuu style apt would be the best decision is like asking is the sky blue Or is water wet Best decision ever 10 stars for us

위치가 도쿄의 번화가에서 조금 떨어져있다는 것만 빼면 다 좋았어요 br숙소 바로 앞에 게이세이 본선이 지나가서 지하철 타기도 좋고 아사쿠사선을 타면 그대로 자동환승으로 숙소 앞 역까지 올 수 있어서 편합니다br단 도쿄 서브웨이 패스가 사용 불가능한 곳이니 파스모나 스이카 카드가 있으면 좋으며 게이세이 본선이 로컬과 급행이 있어서 처음 갈 때는 잘못 탈 수도 있으니 주의하세요 급행 타면 숙소 앞 역에 안 멈추고 다음 역까지 그대로 감br숙소 자체는 정말 역대급으로 좋았고 매일 늦은 아침마다 호스트가 방문해서 불편한 점은 없는지와 맛집 볼만한 곳을 추천해줘서 좋았어요 호스트와 자주 마주치는 걸 안좋아하는 분이라면 미리 말하면 됩니다br그리고 포켓 와이파이를 공짜로 대여해주니 참고하세요 전 도쿄에 다시 오면 100 다시 머물 거 같네요 ㅎㅎ

The apartment is very clean and well maintained The hosts were very helpful and offered to take us to and from the train station when we arrived and left I would recommend staying at this Airbnb and would be happy to stay again Close to train station with food and groceries nearby
京成立石站很方便青砥站就远一些但是房主会在青砥接送因为去成田机场很方便一切的一切都很喜欢都很美好难忘的东京之行如果时间再长一些就好了下次一定多住几天谢谢

The apartment was very spacious and clean and every day Mr T came to deliver new towels and prepare for our return by leaving on a few lights It was a great touch and made the space feel nice and cozy each day we came back after our travels around the country My husband and I stayed for 2 weeks and felt the space was very nice for an extended stay but could certainly work for anyone staying for a shorter time The toilet and shower were luxurious the kitchen was very well stocked even though we ate out most evenings and the living spaces were large and clean for the 2 of us There is a tv for viewing and good WiFi throughout the apartment The pocket WiFi was very convenient as we traveled thru the country The next time we come back to Japan we would absolutely consider staying in this area again because of the kindness of Mr T and family

Beautiful traditionalstyled apartment in a charming neighborhood with welcoming very helpful hosts Very clean great layout and great bathroom Many thoughtful English labels and guides to enhance our visit Comfortable serene setting for our family including child to enjoy the ambience of June weather Convenient easytofigureout transport to the rest of Tokyo really appreciated having a quiet neighborhood with affordable delicious meal options on the return walk from the station after busy days out brWe couldnt have asked for a better introduction to Tokyo Thank you again
非常感谢房东夫妇的热情款待 苹果汁很好喝 房子比描述的还好 住的非常安静舒服 还有个阳台坐着吹吹风很不错哦 每天换新毛巾 打扫的很干净 地铁很方便 三分钟走到地铁 到哪里都很方便  房东很热情的到地铁接和送我们 很好的一次住宿体验 下次来东京还住这里

We were very enjoy our stay Clean and lovely room passionate owner close to the station many restaurants around here everything was perfect we will stay here again when we back Tokyo next time Hundred percent to recommend
Youll never expect a whirlpool bath in their house but there have cool
A FANTASTIC place to stay very welcoming  made it very easy for foreign travelers The place is huge VERY clean and felt like home I would stay again

This place is very recommended to stay in suburb tokyo and quite place for resting after sightseeing in Tokyo Closed to the train station and many restaurants So dont worry when you get hungry there is also restaurant that open 24 hours
房源離車站很近房東很熱情接待從車站直接幫我們載行李到民宿還讓我們提早check in 也會提供當地的詳細攻略吃的逛的都會講解的很詳細br房東英文很好住宿的地方物品也齊全離車站也很近生活機能便利如果有機會一定會再入住
首先房东很热情在我们到达东京以后也和我们积极保持联系当我们到达玉石站以后房东十分钟内赶到介绍了住房附近的便利店和药妆店br对了附近有一家甜品店也很精致好吃br还有那家叫牛繁的烤肉店我们每天晚上都去吃br我们住的是二层楼很干净早上要自己煮东西之类的都很方便br最后感谢房东最后一天早上五点送我们去车站
房东会到方便的地铁站接送 对拉着大行李箱的我们来说很便捷

Great appartment for family of 4 everything you need Super clean and great traditional touches in the appartment Mr Kawano was of great help picked us up informed us all along and the neighborhood is very quiet and authentic we loved our stay in Katsushika would definitely recommend

At K Familys place youll be sure to get what you want Its an incredible host joyful and willing to help you at any time Youll be comfortable and happy to stay there We were 5 and we had no complaint at all during our stay If we come back we will surely contact them again
這個房子的日式設計很漂亮和典雅空間很足夠而且設備也相當的齊全此外房東一家人人很好親自到附近的車站接送我們而且還送了一大瓶很好喝的蘋果汁給我們喝十分好客每天也有人幫忙打掃房間回到民宿時都總是一塵不染整體來說我們都很滿意這次的住宿經驗
这次的住宿体验非常好各方面设施都很完善房东也非常热情并且房子是在一个充满了市井气息的区域我们也因此深入日本本地人生活生活也十分便利房子附近无论是超市药妆居酒屋都一应俱全如果下次有机会的话一定还会入住

If you want an authentic experience in Japan this is the place to stay It was absolutely beautiful with old world Japanese charm The apartment was immaculate they greeted us with apple juice on arrival and provided bottles of water in the fridge which helped us get through a scorching Tokyo summer They provided fresh towels every day and picked us up and dropped us off at the airport The location was great very close to a train station and in the heart of a beautiful older style district It was a bit far from the centre of the action in Tokyo but we appreciated being able to get away from the hustle and bustle
房东很热情入住和退房时都可以接送到青砥站去机场无需换乘位置不是很中心但东京的电车非常方便而且附近的立石站出来就是一条小商业街便利店餐馆什么的都很齐全屋子很整洁我们只有两个人住可以说是相当宽敞了回程班次比较晚退房时把行李暂存到房东那并约好时间下午直接帮忙送到青砥非常感谢
Very friendly host clean and functional appartment kept in traditional style relaxing balcony very nice area There was nothing to complain about we had a great stay
I cannot say enough how amazing it was to stay at this Airbnb They are warm kind amazing place to stay
离京成立石站非常近步行约3分钟中间要穿过一条商业街br地址不在东京市区如果要去新宿银座比较潮流的地方都需要转车因为靠近立石站所以转车也还好br返程直达成田行李可以寄存房东的车上和房东约好几点送到青邸站即可br总体来说挺好的
非常棒的入住体验房东会开车在青砥站接送省去了自己找地方的麻烦房东人非常好沟通无障碍入住时还赠送了好喝的饮料房间跟图片完全一致干净整洁我们一家三口入住孩子非常喜欢地理位置优越离京成立石站走路三分钟附近有非常多吃饭的地方便利店药妆店都近在咫尺出了电车站就有一个比较大的超市简直太方便了距离东京市中心坐电车二十分钟左右也不算偏下次有机会还会选择入住
The accommodation is clean and very comfortablebrStaff are very attentive

Superior in every way The apartment was brilliant clean and very comfortable The best part of the Airbnb experience was meeting Mr T who took great care to make sure that everything is always clean and to provide better local tips than any other source Check out K Familys website zenTokyocom to see whats recommended near this apartment

This home is in a great location with shops and restaurants and near the subway station Space is very quiet and spotless Great hospitality with little extras like pickup and drop off with our luggage to and from the subway station Highly recommend
One of the best hosts Ive ever stayed with on Airbnb the entire family is super friendly and they always have some tips and advice about where to go in Tokyo and how to get there Highly recommended
Its a great apartment I would recommend this apartment to all people visiting Tokyo
Smooth and easy

Stay here  you wont regret it brWe have previously stayed at both the Park Hyatt and Hilton in Tokyo and honestly  we loved our K family stay more brThe apartment is extremely cosy and probably the cleanest place we have ever stayed  absolutely immaculate It was perfect for our family 2 adults and 1 child It feels instantly like home  returning there after a busy day in Tokyo was like coming back to a havenbrIt is a 2 bedroom apartment  the two rooms have Tatami flooring and one doubles as a lounge room There is a balcony a kitchen with a table a bathroom with small but deep bathtub and bubble jets and separate toilet with heated seat  delightful in winter It is modern but has been done in a Japanese style which gives it a real character brIts not in central Tokyo but we loved the area it was in  a real Tokyo suburb full of narrow streets with tiny restaurants lanterns glowing families cycling home from work and school miniature perfectly kept gardens on balconies brThe K family were delightful and incredibly helpful  the pick up and drop off to Aoto station on arrival and departure were invaluable brA few tipsbr Get the Pasmo card as recommended  its a pass you buy at the railway station and top up with cash You can use it across all the different train lines in Tokyo and also at many shops and restaurants br The Ks lend you a pocket modem  you carry  it around for a free wifi signal Fits in a jacket pocket and completely invaluable br We found the train system a bit confusing for getting into Tokyo in the most time efficient fashion  ask the Ks they will helpbr They have a coin op washer and dryer particularly helpful if you have kidsbrHonestly this was a once in a lifetime experience and one we will remember and cherish forever Cannot recommend this place highly enough

这是我来日本住的最喜欢的民宿K非常热情送了2大瓶水和好喝的果汁1大瓶在日本的酒店和民宿来说K的房子也是非常宽敞而且比图片还好漂亮住的非常舒服阳台上有桌椅老公很喜欢因为不用走出去找地方吸烟成田机场直达地铁AOTOK会来地铁站AOTO站接我们去住处走的时候也是可以约好时间送我们去AOTO厕所和洗漱是分开的厨房面包机咖啡机电饭煲微波炉冰箱炉灶都有楼下有洗衣机睡的是榻榻米有两个房间用日式推拉门隔开住在这里出行的话是地铁京成立石站步行10分钟内去地铁站的路上有一条小商业街和便利店药店超市吃饭买饮料零食都很方便下次来东京还要住K family有朋友要来日本也极力推荐这里

The K Family particularly Mr T took the word accommodating to the next level Not only was the apartment beautiful comfortable and incredibly clean but it was also chockfull of thoughtful and exciting touches such as a bathtub with a jacuzzi function train station pickup and dropoff services daily towel switches and so on which made all the difference in a great stay Although the place is a little far from city center I cannot recommend this place more highly for the laidback second stay in Tokyo I was looking for

Stylish and comfortable apartment  We had enough room for our family of 2 parents and 2 teens plus 9 yo  Sleeping on tatami area was great experience  Location very close to station restaurants and shops  Several international ATM in the area including at station  Very helpful and attentive host  he collected us from Aoto station on arrival and dropped us off on depart  Neighbourhood is authentic suburban Tokyo  We loved our time in Wahuu apartment
Great apartment Nice and clean The pick up drop off to Aoto was excellent Thanks

Super host with super good place with bed on tatami in Japanese style house but modern clean and cozy Neighborhood is quiet Location is super close Keisei line train station The host is very welcoming and informative about the surrounding area also thanks for the welcoming fruitjuice I stay here with family during winter season the heater worked well
这是一套让我特别满意的房子非常干净房东每天都来打扫和我以前住的民宿都不同位置很好离地铁三分钟周边吃饭的地方的地方很多离东京塔很近我很喜欢这里下次再来东京还是会选择这里并且推荐各个其他朋友
Must stay brK family are the best hosts weve had Thoughtful and helpful Apartment is gorgeous and has everything you need 1010 Would stay again in a heart beat and frankly was sad to leave this place

Our stay at the K Family Airbnb was so nice It was such a beautiful space and the K Family went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable When we arrived they gave us a warm reception including some delicious apple cider The neighbourhood of Tateishi is nice and quiet without any tourists  a great place to come back to after a hectic day in Shibuya or Akihabara If you appreciate a quiet and immersive side to your Tokyo trip you absolutely should book this Thank you K Family 3
K family were really nice and helpful The place was just as described It was clean and close to the Keisei Tateishi station

Imposible un alojamiento mejor El piso es amplio con limpieza diaria situado en una zona tranquila y tradicional a apenas unos pasos de la estación de metro para ir a cualquier parte de Tokio Además la comunicación con los dueños un matrimonio joven y encantador con los que puedes contar para cualquier cosa por mínima que sea y que hablan un inglés perfecto incluso puedes hablar un poco de español es inmediata y te recogen y te llevan de vuelta a la estación que mejor comunica con el aeropuerto Otra de las ventajas es que te dan un pocket wifi sin cobro adicional por lo que tuve wifi todo el viaje gracias a ellos sin tener que alquilarlo por mi cuenta He viajado mucho pero puedo decir que la hospitalidad y las buenas sensaciones que he sentido en Tokio gracias a hospedarme en este piso no la he tenido en ningún otro lugar Sin duda cuando vuelva a Japón que volveré me quedaré de nuevo aquí Muchas gracias K Family

I had a great time in Tokyo The place was perfect for what I was wanting Everything you might need for a comfortable stay is there and the place was very clean Highspeed internet in the apartment and a portable WiFi hotspot to take with you when you go out sightseeing the cleanliness and new towels got to give 5 stars for that The area has a lot of food shops convenience stores and small restaurants and bars but is also very quiet at night The building is only a few minutes walk to the KeiseiTateishi Station which gives access to most areas in Tokyo in 1535 minutes The host gives great personal service He picked me up at Aoto station by car Aoto Station was accessible by a direct train from Narita airport so there was no need to change trains That was a big relief I highly recommended this place for anyone looking for a clean comfortable stay in Tokyo

This is a great place in the best location for my needs and the hosts were thoughtful with recommendations The space was clean and amazing as advertised  Highly recommend and will stay here again if the opportunity arises

Had a wonderful stay at this very traditional looking Japanese room  The room comes with balcony that was a nice place to enjoy the Fall air while relaxing  My family liked that this apartment had a bigger than normal  bathtub since we have a baby and it made it easier to bathe  The hosts were extremely friendly and accommodating and did us a great service by picking us up at the station on the day we arrived and driving us back to the station when we checked outbrThere were lots of shops nearby for our daily needs and the apartment is close to a 24 hour convenience store which we found very helpful  10 out of 10 if youre thinking about booking this place done hesitate  If I ever find myself travelling to Tokyo again I would book here again

Id like to recommend this apartment to anyone looking to stay in a real Japanese decorated room  We specifically wanted to try sleeping in a Tatami Japanese straw mat flooring room and we could not find any other Tatamirooms available  on AIRBNB  Tt was clean and comfortable and we really enjoyed the space and the experience  There are many restaurants just a few blocks away and a shopping street there has its own retro charmbr I dont usually take the time to write reviews but the hosts were so kind and attentive I feel like its the least I could do I would definitely come back and stay here again

Its a very great place  Clean and located in a quiet neighbourhood I traveled alone and the space is spacious and super nice brThe host is super helpful and always be there to help me solve my problems  brThanks again
房东非常的热情会去车站接送br住宿地点便利步行5分钟到电车站到银座等地30分钟br楼下就是步行街饭店林立br附近有三个超市规模比较大的步行8分钟其他两个中小型超市步行距离都在3分钟左右如果自己做饭的话买食材就非常的方便br下次再来日本一定会再住在这里

Amazing place and amazing hosts Super flexible with timing and helped pick us up from train station stored our luggage and took time to explain things to us Also gifted drinks and water Spacious apartment comfortable bedding Great experience

너무 친절하시고 설명도 잘해주셔서 여행기간동안 정말 편안하게 쉴 수 있었어요 역까지 자동차로 데릴러 오시고 숙소까지 데려다 주시고 마지막날에도 자동차로 역까지 데려다주셔서 짐도 편하게 옮길 수 있었고 집도 너무 깨끗하고 편안하고 넓어서 제 집처럼 잘 썼습니당ㅎㅎ 청소서비스도 부탁드리면 무료로 해주셔서 쓰레기통도 잘 비워주시고 너무 감사했어요 남자친구랑 첫 도쿄 여행이었는데 덕분에 완벽한 여행이 됐습니당ㅎㅎ 도쿄 중심지랑은 좀 멀고 외진 곳에 있기는 하지만 타테이시역이 바로 앞에 있어서 저는 교통편은 크게 불편하지 않았어요 나리타 공항에서 스카이액세스 타고 아오토역에서 내리면 데릴러 와주셔서 엄청 편했구 전철도 파스모카드 사서 타고 다녔더니 무리없이 잘 다녔습니다 혹시 위치때문에 망설이고 계시다면 정말 추천드립니다 가격대비 정말 너무 괜찮고 훌륭한 숙소였어요

숙소 엉청 깨끗하고 주변 시장도 너무 좋고 평화로워요 다시 일본여행 하게된다면 또 이 숙소를 이용하고 싶을정도에요 추천드려요

리뷰를 작성하지 않는 편이지만 작성을 해봅니다br일본에서 근처 역에까지 마중 나와서 짐 들어주고 픽업 서비스 해주는 숙박업체 처음 봤습니다 5성급 호텔도 이 정도는 안하지 않나요br집이 깔끔하고 정돈된 느낌은 기본으로 깔려있고 호스트 분들도 주변 정보를 최대한 알려주는 등 매우 친절하셨습니다br오랫만에 방문한 도쿄에서 처음부터 끝까지 너무나 기분좋게 묵고 갑니다 한국분들 여기는 꼭 가볼 가치가 있습니댜
Friendly welcome Host picked us up at the station and recommended us places to go which was nice Explained everything in the home clearly Great place to stay

had an amazing time at K Familys place Mr T and Koji picked us up at the station and show us around the place the nearest station places to eat and how to get to our next destination while we stayed there The place is really spacious with complete amenities There is really nothing bad to say about our stay Everything was perfect
They are wonderful hosts With real kindness They also give advice on restaurants and visits which are really goodbrThanks for everything
房東先生非常友善熱情民宿跟照片一樣乾淨寧靜舒適br非常好的住宿體驗希望下次有機會來東京再來入住
Great place very helpfully in every which way and they went the extra mile
They were great from start to end always being helpful and providing a lot of local recommendations

I stayed 4 nights with 3 friends of mine in Shinjuku guesthouse this AugustSeptember Min and his brother were one of the greatest hosts weve ever met They helped us with every question we had and also helped to take care of one of us who unfortunately got sick during the trip The rooms are spacious and clean We loved sleeping on futons and tatami The apartment is brand new and is located close to Shinjuku station which is basically the centre It has free and fast wifi a fully equipped kitchen washing machine and also a terrace If you stay there dont forget to use the fire escape stairs and go to the rooftop We enjoyed many talks up there  If I would go back to Tokyo I would definetely love to stay there again and would recommend this place for any traveler

Min was for me the best host I ever had I consider him like a friend now He came to pick me at the subway station when I arrived and give me a lot of advice about what to do in Japon We speak a lot together He is really interesting guy and he is really present during and after my stay by his appartement I have actually faced some big allergical reaction during the end of my trip in Japan outside of tokyoDespite I found no help or medical care in Nagoya I decided to go to ER in Tokyo I had no reservation anywhere so he has let me come to his place and have take care of me after my hospitalisation without asking anything Min is a great host and such a good person Im realy happy and lucky to have meet him thanks again for everythings

Bonjour à tous Nous sommes resté 7 jours au sein de Shinjuku Guesthouse avec mon groupe de musique et nous avons passé un très bonne semaineLappartement est bien placé pas loin du centre ville de Shinjuku avec beaucoup de commerces à proximité propre et plutôt fonctionnel Nous avons également cohabité avec dautres personnes et lambiance était très bonne Mention spéciale à Min lhôte qui a été formidable toujours là pour nous conseiller discuter et nous faire rencontrer du monde en fonction de nos affinitésUn très bon rapport qualitéprix que je vous conseille vivement Eric
Min was such a wonderful and gracious host He accomodated me and my friend in every way and I can now consider him a friend I can definitely say that if I ever return to Japan Ill be staying with Min
It was very nice to stay at this guest house Great location great view Min the host is the best of all He made this guest house feels like one big happy family

A great place to stay  The nearest metro station is just one minute away  Tons of restaurants and grocery stores nearby  The place is clean full of light and very pleasant  I am not sure if it was purposeful or luck but my roommates were all samegender  The kitchen  living room was a nice place to gather with other guests in the evening and Min was a very generous host  A really pleasant experience  I would stay there again for sure

We stayed 2 nights at Mins place and really appreciated The location is perfect close to the subway and the main JR line brWe were with many other people in the appartment and that was really interesting to talk with them over a drink or a dinner at night brI highly recommend this place
very nice and gentle host had a very nice and talkative evening together with some fellow koreans fun it was
Min is very kind and easy goingLocation is perfect very near to supermarketsLooking forward to visit again without brining children

신주쿠 게스트 하우스에서 정말 즐거운 시간 보내고 갑니다 좋은 사람들도 많이 만나고 아져씨가 잘 해주셔서 정말 감사했습니다 잊지못할 몇가지 에피소드가 있었지만 대체적으로 만족합니다 기회가 된다면 꼭 다시 방문하고 싶습니다I had great time in Shinjuku guesthouse I mat other country guys and spand time with them If I will visit again in tokyo I want to stay here ond more time Thank you min and bless you

Love the room in the house The view from the 8th floor is amazing Min is a very nice host We love talking with him He is also very helpful we were once need his help at 10pm and he came right away Would certainly recommend him to everyone The apartment is very close to metro station convenience store lots of little shops for us to find food

新宿区 was a great place to stay an Min was an excellent host  The location was great also right by Shinjuku and Shibuya  Min was there to help with any questions we had and also to give us some recommendations  Would recommend this lodge to anyone traveling through Tokyo on a budget

Staying at Mins guesthouse was a nice experience Min is a great host thats checks up on things personally making sure all is according to your wishes I would definitely stay again at his place when I return to Tokyo Samuel
cool
Min was a great host very accommodating  He also responds very quickly to inquiries

Min takes a personal interest in everyone who visits and so it has a homely feel even though there are a few visitors At night Mins hospitality makes everyone feel comfortable to sit around and chat The location is great Very close to the nearest Tokyo subway and lots of supermarkets around 247 And a nice view from the 10th floor Highly recommended

Im really glad that i stayed at Mins Guesthouse the location is great 15min walking from Shinjuku station many restaurants markets you can have anything you need and Koreatown is just a few blocksThe Guesthouse is really clean and you have the feel that you are in your own place as a guesthouse you also can make a lot of friendsMin is an awesome host he will help you in all your needs and also a great company for drinking heheim sure to stay here again See you next time Min

We had a really great time staying at Mins place Its perfectly locatedit has easy access to train stations and main attractions in the city Min is a great host too Will definitely come back here on my future trips to Shinjuku
Very friendly and very helpful Really enjoyed my stay
Min you are a great host I enjoyed my time staying at your place  I would recommend to friends and hopefully be back soon

We were a group of 18 people Min arranged the locations in order for all to be together which is not an easy thing in Tokyo All along our stay Min was very kind friendly and very helpful with us He was present on a daily basis to clean the flat The flat is very well placed in Tokyo near Shinjuku JR station and 2 metro lines stations Line E and F To summarize you will be very well welcomed by Min in his Guest House You can plan to book his guest house without any apprehension

I was in Tokyo to visit the city and practice AikidoThe position of the ShareHouse was ideal for me 3 min walk from a metro station and 15 min walk  from the Hombu Dojo to practice Aikido No problem to find food a lot of restaurants and markets in the street A 7 eleven is useful to withdraw cash A lot of young people were sharing a large triplex you can meet a lot of nationality and cultures Of course you are sharing space too Sometimes sleeping is more difficult because of Sharehouse activities and of the noisy street I recommend this room if you are young do not come to sleep andor if you are a group from 2 to 10 or moreThe Guest Min is very helpful and friendly Washmachine is available as well as everything to cook

Min was a fantastic host and has a skill bringing people together I stayed for several days at his guesthouse and met a dozen interesting and lovely people The place is clean and the view gorgeous Especially the rooftop is an eyecandy  The area is convenient and interesting as well Whenever I get back to Tokyo this will be the place to stay

Great location Only 3mins walk to higashi shinjuku station There is 2 Japanese supermarket below the apartment 24ht sushi restaurant just nearby as well Very suitable for BACKPACKERsbrOne thing not very good is that there is only 1 bathroom so you got wait awhile if someone is using it Other than that all is good
I stayed in the share house for two nights and had a great time All of the things that were needed were met I also had the opportunity to meet other people from around the globe which is great

I had a good time at the Shinjuku guesthouse Its centrally located a close walk to Shinjuku station There is a good 24 hour supermarket downstairs and the view is cool Min is a good host with some good tips about the neighborhood
Estupendo lugar en Shinjuku Cerca de toda la diversión de la zona Excelente anfitrión y otros huéspedes amables Lo pasé muy bien

I like to separate my review into categories so here goesA About the apartment1 The location is very convenient Just 200 meters from the HigashiShinjuku subway station 2 The rooms are reasonably sized and good enough for 23 people3 There are some excellent places to eat in a 200 meters radius like an amazing sushi place very good curry soup joint a Hokkaido speciality and a very good japanese style barbecue placeB About the host Ming1 Very nice and helpful2 Tries to accommodate requests3 He gave us a special discount as my friend was leaving early and so that I dont have to pay for the entire room for 1 day4 The room we got initially was quite small for 2 people and so he shifted us to another room as soon as it was available5 He will also be happy to take you around and tries to keep guests informed about events around the areaThings to be careful about1 Tokyo is very hot Try to make sure that during summers you do NOT get a room on the top floor pent house2 The things that upset me most was the inadequate number of bathrooms and toilets There was just 1 bathroom between 9 people and 2 toilets 3 Because of the high number of people using these spaces sometimes they are not clean especially the bathroomOverall the place is good if you are on a tight budget The location is very convenient I give this place 38 stars I had to give 4

Min is a very nice and friendly guy His appartment is very clean and very nice place especially the location just 510mins walk to the Shinjuku stationIt is just a pity that we only stayed in there for 1 night Next time to Tokyo I must go back again and stay longer

Shinjuku Sharehouse honestly made my experience in Tokyo The Sharehouse itself is easily accessible and a 2 minute walk from HigashiShinjuku station which makes it convenient to travel to the main sites of Tokyo My tatami room was clean spacious and comfortable Bathrooms were clean The kitchen serves as the lounge area where its impossible not to meet everybody and make friends This is the togo place if youre looking to meet new global friends stay at a convenientlylocated place and have an amazing host Min we love you

I had a wonderful experience staying at Mins guesthouse He was so friendly and i feel so safe staying on his place Ive met interesting people had a drink and it was fun Room is clean place is accessible Lots of restaurants and stores nearby I just love the friendly environment there brWill definitely stay there if i ever i visit Tokyo again Kampai

Min is a super guy and really made my trip to Japan I stayed in the private room for a few nights because it was the first time I had stayed in a share house and felt like I wanted privacy but after a few days switched to the shred rooms because I felt so comfortable It really is a great place and so close to everything Min went out of his way to make my stay comfortable and answered any questions I had about the area or even life in Japan I feel like Min is the perfect example of an AirBnB host there enough to make your feel welcome and even invite you for dinner but still give you all the privacy you want to enjoy your time I will definitely be back to Tokyo and plan on spending more time at Shinjuku Sharehouse

Everything said here before was true Min is an amazing host Hell take you out to eat drink more than you can imagine   will show you around if you need anything else You cant ask for a better location than that Tons of places walking distance especially Golden Gai and only few stations from other major areas of the citiesPlace is very clean you can cook if youd like use the fridge washer is available It was the perfect place for me during my trip Will definitely stay there again the next time Im in Tokyo

Min was a great a host he gave me all the information to easily find the place and waited for me to explain everything about the house he was helpfull and very communicative even more he often goes out to drinkhave dinner with the guests The house is in a convenient location just couple of minutes from the metro the apartament was really clean and had everything you could need towels hair drier wifi  my room was great big sunny and with balcony I definitely recommend you to stay at the Shinjuku Sharehouse its a great place where you can meet cool people from all over the world
Great host who is very accommodating Amazing location with easy access to food transport and entertainment Nice and clean rooms with fresh linen

The location of the guesthouse is extremely convenient as I soon realised how easy is to access multiple Tokyo metro lines from the place The room itself was clean and welllit with an access to a small balcony I came off season so there were not many guests staying Thus there were not any issues accessing the only shower in the guesthouseMin is an extremely responsive host with a really cheerful personality He gave me some useful tips and I only wished we worked our schedules out to grab a drink together Perhaps next time

My stay with Min Min was a great experience and I would highly recommend it to anyone staying in Tokyo  He was very welcoming and had great suggestions on places to see and where to eat  The location was perfect for me and it was a great start to my trip  Next time I am in Tokyo this is where I will be staying
Clean good neighbourhood good price Min is great to be around Perfect

Min was an excellent host The place was in a convenient location close to the metro line and the core area of Shinjuku Min was extremely helpful in making me feel at home I wish I couldve stayed longer and explored the local area
Min was super helpful and friendly and his apartment was clean and in a very central location A great way to start our journey in Japan

We had a great stay at Shinjuku Sharehouse Min is a wonderful host We didnt get the directions quite right and it was raining and he contacted us by txt and met us with an umbrella he has since improved the directions That is serviceThe accommodations are very much RyokanJapanse style  small room with futon and shared bath  very comfortable if you are used to this style There is a shared loungekitchen space that overlooks the city Lovely sun comes in in the morning We got lucky and were the only ones staying at the time so it was like our own place But usually you will find other guests which is nice and socialMin is an interersting guy to talk to and you should spend an hour or two if you get the chanceThe location is convenient to lots of restaurants and the HigashiShinjuku train stop
Awesome  easy going and friendly host nice place as well All will like it Will definitely be returning

Tokyo is amazingof course including the place where I live Mins apartment is traditional Japanese designed style Not very big but everything included in there If you like Tatami thing this is the right place for you to choose  Convient for you to go to Shinjuku Station central shopping place

In a nutshell Awesome I can recommend it without any doubts This is what every AirBnb experience should be likeThe sharehouseGreat location 23 min walk from Higashi shinjuku metro station which is beside a nice coffee shop to get your morning started There are several 247 stores on the same street I rented a private room with a balcony on the 10th floor the room was clean and Min made sure I had everything I needed There is also a very nice common area with a kitchen tv table balcony  a pleasant place to hang out and meet other guests The hostIn my opinion the best part of this experience Min is the perfect Airbnb host you could only imagine He really looks after his guests and hes simply a really cool guyA couple of examples from my stayFirst of all my flight was delayed Min waited for me at the sharehouse till 0100 at night and greeted me with a smile and explained everything I needed to knowWhen Tokyo unexpectedly got cold in the beginning of April Min came in and gave everybody remote controls for personolized heaters just in case we are cold  I didnt expect bad weather so I didnt have any warm jacket with me When I got really cold during a walk I came back to the house and asked Min what is a good place to buy a jacket What did Min do His first response was  Take my jacket Yes he lent me his own jacket although he didnt have another one for himselfThe last day he invited me to lunch and we had a good talk and laugh  To summarize  It was the perfect choice to book this guesthouse If Im in Tokyo again this is where Im staying

The shinjuku guesthouse is a terrific place to stay in Tokyo Its location is very convenient and the place is clean You are just a short walk to both the shinjuku station and the golden gai brThere are always guests to meet which makes the guesthouse a great place to stay brMin is terrific host He was incredibly helpful and even took us to a few great places
Min Min was very helpful and gave many good suggestions for where to go in the Shinjuku area Great view

At this place I felt like at home Really Clean simple and comfortable rooms good background perfect location I like Shinjuku very much and marvelous night views Good restaurants bars and shops are just around a corner At this guesthouse I have met lonely nomads like me as well as groups of 9 tourists And everything was handled smooth and everyone satisfied The place is run by Min who is such a great host Easygoing helpful and charming If you are a traveler and Shinjuku is your destination consider staying in his guesthouse

We had a great stay at Mins bb The location is perfect near to the metro and to the Tokyo nightlife Min is a perfect host the place is clean and he help us for everything we need

I really enjoyed staying here The location was great walking distance to shinjuiki The place was very clean and well kept We had a blast hanging out with other people who stayed here I found the place quiet enough to sleep Min was great very friendly person He helped me send my luggage ahead through a service and I very appreciated that For the combination of location amenities you really cant beat it at this price

Mins place is an example of people who take their Airbnb hosting seriously Occupying the top 3 floors of a very conveniently located building in Shinjuku the large expanse of glass windows gives the place an open feel and a a nice view of the city streets  Min lives elsewhere but comes in to clean every morning and to meet new arrivals  Hes a great guy friendly personable and with excellent command of English and I would assume Japanese and Korean though I didnt try those  The unit is well stocked with guest essentials and more towels than one could easily count the wifi connection is great and the inroom AC was strong and a welcome retreat from the hot Tokyo summer  Im glad I stayed there and would do so again next time I visit the city

Mins the best Was more than accommodating Gave specific directions from Narita and even met us at ShinOkubo Station to help us back to the sharehouse Showed us the area and we had a great time Everyone else staying there was super cool too and we made lots of friends Not only was it my first time in Japan it was my first time out of country and I couldnt have felt more at home Theres a lot to do in the area and it is extremely easy to get around to any of the major areas in Tokyo This place was so much fun Im actually only on the airbnb website right now to book it again Highly recommend

I would like to say with all the positive reviews about this host is ALL TRUE because it was a fantastic experience It was my first time visiting Japan and also my first time visiting japan by myself Min provided me with FULL directions and CLEAR instructions on how to get to the Shinjuku share house by public transport from the central of Tokyo which was clear and simple one route takes about 10 mins from central Shinjuku by train As i was not great with directions and it being my first time Min had kept in contact with me all the way and made sure i found my way to the right area As i walked into the apartment complex i was greeted by the lovely Min which not long after a nice introduction i felt very comfortable After a quick rest Min then showed me around the complex where everything was bathrooms toilets etc then showed me to the rooms i was staying in Shared a room for  3 nights  then a private room for 4 nights which was all clear and simple  Nothing much to it at all  The location is very close to anything and everything in Shinjuku and everything is a walkable distance  you could walk for about 15 mins and end up in the next city it was amazing Train stations were very close too one which is about 510 min walk and another in central Shinjuku which will take no longer than 15 mins walk but time flies when youre observing the area and exploring that you would not even notice the time You will never get bored with this city Over the 7 nights in total i have stayed at the Shinjuku Share house i felt at the end it was like my second home Min was very friendly and he took a couple of us for a night out just to get to know us as he likes to discover different cultures around the world Min is very good at taking care of his guests including myself  always a guy that is has a happy HELLO in the morning which was pleasing The Shinjuku share house is well maintained Min comes in every morning to clean  as reviews have stated on here but will not intrude in your personal area The cleaning is done in the main kitchen bathroom and toilet area Overall i could not ask for a better host It is a great way for solo travelers that come to Japan to get to know other internationals travelling and maybe happy to share their Japan experiences together as i have I came to Japan by myself not knowing anyone and had left Japan back home with a bunch of great friends i met from around the world including Min I will definitely come back soon and stay here again Thanks again Min

Stayed for 4 days and had a great time in tokyo Apartment great location for shinjuku nitelifestation and for Aikido hombu dojo if you trainmet some good guys and gals who celebrated my birthday with me in local golden gai barsMin and Haru great hosts very welcoming They even got me a giftWould stay there again CheerskampaiJason

Excellent location and nice tatami room Mins wife let me after a late flight showed me how everything worked and where everything was Convenient having a kitchen and washing machine and good value for money Good having various ways to contact Min and easy directions

For independent travellers to Japan this is an excellent way to meet with fellow travellers  enjoy Tokyo brClean Well run Good value for moneybrG8 location with JR train  subway close by  all Shinjuku  doorstepbrThe flavour of guesthouse changes daily with the arrival  departures of new travellers so expect some raucous nights but overall a Great vibe  one I look forward to return visit

What a great time I had the host was fantastic he went above and beyond to provide me with more than just a room he provides a great atmosphere for those who wish to be social Just a great experience The host speaks great Englishthe host also multilingual and embraced the diverse nationalities that were staying everyone that I spoke to said they will return I know I will Also very close to the best eateries around and the host knows the city very well and will help point you in the right direction when you explain your interests One last thing its very clean and has all the facilities needed
Min was amazing and the place is very comfy I stayed in a private room and had no issues at all and would totally stay again Very well located

I loved staying at Mins The location is great as a female solo traveller its safe and it leads to the heart of Shinjuku within 10 mins and hes been nothing but kind and helpful  I really felt like home  it had everything including soju which he offeredHe provided me with tons of photos of the room and the house pretty cool place way before I arrived Would definitely recommend the place to my friends

Min the host did his utmost to help me get to the location by sending me photos on whatsapp and being available around the clock to respond The address was very well described and easy to reach Not the fanciest of the buildings but the house is on the 6th or 9th floor thus offering some view on Shinjuku You directly feel the warm welcome of Min when you step in and you connect with other fellow travelers A cosy clean place with shared living room and dining table and bathroomshowers Whether you are traveling solo or with friends this is a great option since you will be located in one the most buzzing areas of Tokyo Need to know more ping Min

This was my second stay at mins Shinjuku guesthouse and as expected i had a fantastic time  There are truly many things to like about staying at Mins guesthouse including the option of a single room in a Tokyo style flat meeting fellow travellers from all over the world great location clean flats etc  Most of all Min truly makes staying in Tokyo a welcoming experience Thanks MinHighly recommended

The sharehouse was easy to find with the instruction sent beforehand I got the tatami room which is really spacious The rest of the flat is clean convenient the bathroom is not a problem I never had to wait as other guests used it at various times of the day Min  a very nice and interesting man  is here to check if everything is going well I could meet some cool people in a relaxed atmosphere The closeness to Shinjuku makes the sharehouse a very convenient place if you want to wander in or around Tokyo
Highly recommended very comfortable large private rooms All the guests were friendly it was great to meet people from all around the world Close to all the action in Shinjuku to Min is a great host
fuss free and near shinjuku city centre

Great stay at Mins guesthouse Hes super nice very responsive and makes you feel at home The place is very clean heaters in the room and shared toilets one downstairs one upstairs and shared shower room Common area is great for cooking or socializing with other guests Very Japanese style house with pretty much no furniture in the room and thin futon on the floor  I found it comfortable Very minimalist which is what you should probably expect in Japan Location is great only 1020 mins to main Shinjuku area Few minutes to subway Grocery stores nearby within few minutes Overall great stay lots of fun and interesting people to meet

clean and the place is in the best location of tokyo near subway and walk only 15 min to shopping area Min is very nice guy quick responded to my question and is very open to everyone

2nd time staying was s blast as usual Best of all Min is busy revamping the house  constantly improving it to give his guests the most comfortable experience There will definitely be a third time for me when I am in Tokyo

Min sent me all the information on how to get there before I arrived We kept in contact as my visit came nearer and he was there to greet me when I finally arrived I stayed in one of the downstairs tatami rooms and it was big and clean Bathroom shower and laundry facilities all worked fine Its a 10 minute walk from Shin Okubo station which is handy remember that Tokyo is very very big Close proximity to Kabukicho robot restaurant Golden Gai shops restaurants etc

A lovely stay Hoping to come back again to Tokyo and stay here The space is shared so you meet other travellers many who are staying long term The tatami mat for sleeping was surprisingly comfortable and the room has ACheating you can adjust to your liking The showers and bathrooms are shared but it was always quite easy to use when I wanted to use never had to wait since there are two Min  Haru have a beautiful house with many cool decorations and figurines Bring a coin from your home country to put in the currency display on the table  thank you so much for a great time it was a short but sweet stay I really appreciate it Ashe

BOOK NOW brBest location hosts and cost you meet many other travelers brI stayed in the tatami room this time and it was so cool Very comfy even if you are sleeping on the floor lol with the futons of course This was my second time staying here in a 3 week period both times were great brI will definitely be staying here when I come back to Japan Thank you Min  Haru for the wonderful stay

As mentioned in some reviews before the apartment only has one shower for all bedrooms When I stayed there there was a total of ten guests and sometimes I had to wait a very long time Because theres so much rotation in the shower it is often dirty but the host and his wife do the best they can to maintain it clean The bedroom is spacious but unfortunately very noisy at night because it faces a busy street so I didnt sleep very well If you enjoy meeting people and stay in a hostel like place this is a good place for you and dont expect nothing fancy but for the same price you can also find a central good hotel with privacy and a bathroom for yourself like the one I stayed before staying here The host is a good person and will try to help you in anything you need and the room was clean
