So where to beginIll start with the hostMr Sun Ki Min is about as cool caring and helpful a host as you could possibly wish for If you have a problem of some sort or would just like an idea for where to go eat something he will gladly assist you And when hes there hes always up for an interesting chatThe apartement itself three stories and a lot of space by japanese standards reflects his positive attitude in every way It is clean tidy and offers almost every utility you could ask for Free and fast wifi great bathroom ample equipped kitchen and a spacious living room adjoining There is also a washing machine to be used for free as well and every floor has its own balconyYou are really not left wanting for anything Oh did I mention that you can go onto the roof as well theres a fantastic view just waiting for you up thereSo now you might be thinking thats too much positivity where is the big BUT Well its entirely up to you if you come there with the right mindset then you will leave happy as can beI already know Ill come back to Tokyo one day Guess where Ill be stayingThanks again Sun Ki  senpai

Min is an awesome host always there when you need help and he knows almost everything  The guesthouse is very good located close to the Shinjuku station and the heart of the nightlife Its very clean and comfy and the view from the rooftop is really nice I would definitely stay here again
Min was a really good host  both welcoming and helpfulThe apartment is big with bright rooms Its situated very close to many stations and is a really good temporary home for your stay in Tokyo

Ming has a fun place The weekend I was there was especially busy  a lot of travelers coming in and out It was cool to come back after a long day of solo exploring to find people hanging out in the common area If you are flexible and like staying with other people this is a great place Ming is a friendly guy always up for conversation and his place is very close to the metro

It was my first airbnb experience and I do not regret it I spent 2 weeks thereThe location is perfect only 5 min walking to Shinjuku station The district is very exciting and vibrant a lot of restaurants bars and shopsThe guesthouse is a lively and convivial place and Min is really awesome Friendly so nice and so fun I really enjoyed my stay thereI highly recommend this guesthouse

Had a really nice stay Nothing to complain about Great location and owner Min is a fantastic person that helps you with everything you need This is the first time I used air bnb and its not going to be the last

Staying at Mins place was a lot of fun Tons of interesting people a place smack in the middle of Shinjuku perfect for exploring the citybrI bet the rooftop is great during the springautumn even in the winter it provided a nice view of TokyobrIf you enjoy having a drink in the evening with a bunch of people then Mins guesthouse is right for you
We had a great stay with Min his apartment is well located and his communication when planning our stay was fast and helpful would recommend
Min is a very helpful and friendly host He knows just what travellers need We were a group of 5 visiting Tokyo and definitely had a great experience staying at Mins guest house Thank you Min
Fun guesthouse very happy to stay here Met some interesting folks and it was nice to come back here after a long day and just chill out in the main area with everyone else
Min is a great host Great location and at a reasonable price Wish I had known about this place sooner Would definitely stay again

Great place to meet people from all around world That is due to the hosts great hospitality and receptiveness Always welcome you with open armsPretty good location with nice view from the rooftop Overall great value for travellersLooking forward to stay here again

Hello helloMin and his place is a great one full of modern amenities all in a comfortable setting It can house quite a lot which is fun to interact and meet people from various places The HigashiShinjuku stop is around the corner with many restaurants and convenience store options around as wellMin himself is a pleasure very nice and accommodating with an actual curiosity to engage with you Overall definite recommendation
Min is a very friendly host very helpful  Great location and a great price Would definitely stay again

Min was great  super friendly and happy to recommend restaurantsGreat location  2 minutes from restaurants shops and bars including the Golden Gai  six alleys filled with tiny barsOur room was bigger than expected and the loungekitchen area was great for meeting other travellersWill stay again when were next in Japan

Min is a great guy Helping everyone to find their interest He is a wondeful host as well Highly recommended place near heart of Shinjuku Nearest subway station is HigashiShinjuku but main Sinjuku station is not far also

My bestfriend and I stayed at the Shinjuku Shared House for just over two weeks while visiting Japan for the first time and exploring Tokyo and I have to say it was one of the best experiences of our livesMin the owner is an incredibly helpful and friendly guy always a phone call text or email away if anything goes wrongThe immediate area has everything you need from supermarkets and bars to local temples so no matter your reason for visiting you can find a taste of it within walking distanceHigashiShinjuku Station is also less than a minute away making all of Tokyo accessible The most time we ever spent on the subway was 35 minutes and that was getting to Odaiba Make sure to pick up a Pasmo card for the subway system if you think youll be using the subway to explore We also used the Tokyo Subway Navigation App which is free on Android and iphone shows you which stops to get onoff at how much it will cost and how long each trip takesThe apartment itself is always clean and full of interesting people On the nights we werent out exploring Tokyos nightlife wed always be able to find a handful of people in the living space ready to share a drink food or storiesMin does a wonderful job of making this place a relaxing and friendly environment for everyone When I get the chance to return to Tokyo I will also return here brilliant fun brilliant people brilliant placeIf you do decide to stay here make sure you take yourselves to the rooftop and then up the ladder and get a picture of the sunrisesunset it is absolutely stunning

Had a great stay at Mins place Min is a great person always helpful on every occasions The place is clean and if you love making new friends from other countries this is the place for you The location is very strategic as there are many restaurants and grocery stores around that area If you dont like asian foods there is McDonald just around the corner Taking subway is fairly convenient too His place is just situated behind Kabukicho you will love this place if you want to have fun at night time If youre coming in a big bunch of people you should aware there is only one shower room as of now I was told another 2 shower rooms will be built in the future Proper planning on showering time should solve the problem Overall it is a great place with great people
It was great It is in a nice neighborhood

I had a real good time in the Sharehouse  brMin was a great host si nice  brThe common space is real plus to meet people there is always someone youll never be alone but of course you can also have privacybrI met great people who becam friends we had really nice moments brAbout the location  Perfect  brClose to the station nightlife  restaurants convenience stores etc  brIf i am going to Tokyo Ill stay there again  Highly recommended
It was a great stay at Mins place We were group of 17 Min was very accomodating Hes hands on in everything Location was perfect See you on our next visit
Min is an excellent host very hepful and even offered to meet me at the train station to make sure I didnt get lost finding the place The room was clean and very convenient for the Shinjuku area

Minh is absolutely amazing He not only had suggestions on places to go and see but he also helped us meet other people staying in the sharehouse This is not just a place to stay It is an experience It is a way to meet some great people and have an epic adventure Oh and did I mention that it is literally a block from the metro in the downtown area Well it is  If youre looking for a place to stay in Tokyo this is where you should be

Min has a very nice set of apartments in Central Tokyo It conveniently located right next to a subway stop and walking distance from Shinjuku and Kobukicho Combined with the very reasonable price you really cant beat this place Its way better then anything else I saw on Airbnb in the same area and price range

Staying at the Shinjuku Sharehouse was an awesome experience The place is very conveniently located with key areas such as Shinjuku and Shibuya being a few minutes away by subway The room itself was clean and all the promised amenities were in order But the best part about the place was meeting fun people from all over the world who were also staying there Min is a fabulous host and he makes everything super easy He gives guidance on how to get quickly settled into Tokyo and even throws mini parties at the Sharehouse common area Overall I had a great time and I strongly recommend Mins place Arigatou Gozaimasu Min

This places location is great only 100200m from a subway station which easily links you to all the entertainment that Tokyo has to offer In addition the view from top of the building allows you to view a vast area of TokyoInstructions were clear enough to find the house and the owner waited at the house himself to ensure that you are settled into the room that you purchased and he also provided a quick introduction to other housemates if they were in the living area of the house Being social was encouraged but not forced providing a relaxed atmosphere Overall very happy with the place

Min is a excellent host not only does he provide very good living accommodation to a very good standard hes always up for socialising taking us to great restaurants and bars giving us info on locations to tourist spots and places around the city honestly would recommend Min and his house share any day its in the shinjuku area which is already is a great area in its own right and metro  JR lines are very close by

A really good host and really fun shared house experience Was there only two nights but wished I could stay longer Guests are very friendly around late 20s and early 30s and very relaxed attitude Not much privacy in the 6th floor apartment just open space but I did not find it to be an issue brMin was very helpful and was there to greet me when I arrived Very communicative and told me about all the other guests He often goes out and drinks with the other guests but i unfortunately didnt get to experience that due to my short stay and busy schedule He keeps the apartments cleanbrFairly convenient location next to subway and couple blocks from JR station In Korean neighborhood with lots of restaurants and some grocery stores A bit near the red light district which is a bit annoying but still sufficiently out of the waybrWould definitely recommend and would come back in the future Good way to meet friendly new people

Booked this place last minute and was really glad Cheap clean safe and really well located Mins wasa great host  full local knowledge and always up for a laugh All the other guests were respectful of privacy but still happy to help each other out or grab a drink Well worth a stay

Loved my stay at Mins share houseThe apartment was great with balconies overlooking the city and a nice common area for meeting other travelers  Min himself was a fantastic host  He invited us travelers out to dinner with his friends showed us some special places he loves and made a really fun night for us in Tokyo  Min is a real peopleperson He loves getting to know people from other cultures and offering all the advice he can   There is no question in my mind that the next time Im in Tokyo Im staying with MinNot to mention a fabulous location thats walking distance to all the best nightlight and restaurants in the city at an unbeatable price  The Share House helped make my time traveling alone in Tokyo great
Super nice area for visiting Tokyo The flat has everything you may need and Min is very helpful
Min was very communicative and helpful We enjoyed our stay in his share house and meeting other travelers At times you might have to queue a bit for the bathroom
Min is a very friendly and welcoming host Very easy to communicate with and always available to answer our questions requests Thanks for a great stay

Min is very kind and helpful personconfortable place close to Higashi Shinjyuku Station there are good peopleThank you
It was a pleasant shared room for 4 people The location in Shinjuku was good The view from the balcony was great

I really enjoyed the place I stayed It was clean had a kitchen and fridge where we can store food and the other guests were really nice I stayed in a room with three other guys two of them which I became close friends with  It was close to Higashi Shinjuku and a ten minute walk from Shinjuku were all the shopping and partying takes place It was also near supermarkets a bank and a Don Quijote which is a discount store opened 24 hours Not to mention bunch of drink vending machines on every corner

Shinjuku Sharehouse was a wonderful place to stay at Min is so friendly easy going and happy to help The place is kept very clean and tidy It was fun to meet all the different people passing through but nice to also have my own space I  recommend this place with absolutely no hesitation Its a short walk to shin okubo station and near some fun places

I used the airport shuttle from Narita to Shinjuku Station Mins place was less than 10 mins away by taxi from where I got off and with his help I was able to locate his place very quickly His place is about 5 mins walk from HigashiShinjuku station where you can get around pretty much anywhere in Tokyo with ease Not only that I was fortunate enough to befriend some great folks all around the world Will definitely choose Mins place the next time I come to Tokyo Thanks Min xx
Min is the best host ever The place was super clean and quiet Min provided all information that i needed Ill definitely come backCheers

I enjoyed my stay here very much Although I was sharing the space with 6 other people everyone was considerate and I still felt as though I had my own space The place was also very clean and homely and felt very safe It was also really nice to meet people from all around the world I made some really good friends while I was staying there brThe location of this place is fantastic right in the heart of Shinjuku It makes getting around Tokyo so easybrI cannot speak more highly of Min Firstly he managed to squeeze me in very last minute He is extremely helpful giving everyone suggestions as to where to go during your stay where to eat how to get places Hes very easy going and welcoming and SUPER prompt with replying to messagesbrI would recommend to anyone to stay here and I would come back in a heart beat

Im already coming to Mins place in two weeks Doesnt that say alot Near to stations and in the city Many shops and restaurants around the hostel But the best think is the people you meet and Min of course

We stayed 6 days at Mins House and we had a great time Min is super friendly and helpful like always  Stayed at this place 2 years ago and had a great time as well You can also meet a lot of nice people in this sharehouse I recommend this place to everyone who is travelling alone or with friends Best Host ever

That was my first visit in Japan and every time when I needed any information about for example where is the post office where can I buy fridge magnets where is good ramen etc I asked my host and he was really helpfull Also localisation of that place was great for me because there is near to shinokubo station or maybe 1015 minutes on foot to shinjuku east station and subway even closer And most important for me 15 minutes on foot to hombu dojo without rushing  35 minutes to don qijote store and similiar to seven eleven Great evenings on the roof where you can enjoy nightly view of Tokyo and dining with new friends  It is a place with good vibes You can enjoy your staying alone in private room or meet awesome people in dormitory Washing machine microwave fridge aircondition  evrything what I needed was there  Thank you Min and best regards  A dla ziomali z Polski  po prostu polecam
房东很早就加了微信准确告之了地址并且保持沟通房东一直在客厅陪我聊天引导客人聚会交流这个非常好当我退房后房东提前告诉我可以在退房后把行李放在客厅为我们考虑得非常周到该房源非常好找临街非常干净价有所值周边有很多好吃而且价格实惠的餐厅药妆店也很多购物非常方便最近的地铁站只需要做5分钟离伊思丹步行只有15分钟是享受和体验东京生活非常好的房子

Min was very welcoming and helpful He made my stay in Tokyo easy and very welcoming I felt at home and almost felt like a local His weekly gatherings over the weekend were a great way to immerse yourself into the community I went to Japan to learn Japanese Cuisine at a school near by and he made it easy for me to understand on how to reach the destination The location was great You are so close to many train stations and restaurants Overall 1010 will come back if I visit Tokyo again

I highly recommend this place if you are travelling for sightseeing or business purposes The host Min is very friendly and help you to feel at homeThe location is 4 min waking from metro Shinjiku main station is also not very farYou can meet other travellers in 9th floor living roomYou can also can have dinner party at rooftop expirencing nice breeze and Tokyo skylineYou can walk to supermarkets or any other needs and is available  247

Min is a friendly host very helpful and making me sure to find the place The Tatami room is clean and have a good view The location is great close to the center of Shinjuku but also unbelievable quiet Don Quijote ドンキホーテ is 2 minutes walk away so it is very easy to get basically everything you need  Definitely recommend for backpackers

Min was a great host The sharehouse is in a extremely convenient location that is right next to the higashi shinjuku station and walkable to many top restaurants night life destinations and shopping The room and facilities were very clean and the setup offers as much or as little interaction with other guests as you would like High marks for Shinjuku Sharehouse
Best place to explore Shinjuku and the rest of Tokyo Easy to reach and easy to go out Super friendly people great room very clean and quiet awesome company only the best about Mins place

Min is a great host definitely made this trip awesome Couldnt imagine it going as well if I I stayed elsewhere I will definitely be back

Great location close to the shinokubo station on the yamanote line The space is great lots of light super clean and has a nice little balcony brMin is a great host  super communicative with directions and was always available via text He fosters a nice small hostel environment and even cooked dinner for all the guests on the rooftop deck

Min kindly offered me one of his tatami rooms This sunny room is located right in the heart of Shinjuku and surprisingly includes a small balcony I certainly enjoyed chatting with Min and other tenants who have helped me a lot with understanding the public transportation systems and arranging my trip I would definitely recommend a stay here

The Shinjuku Sharehouse is a very lovely place It is a 3 minute walk from a train station and 13 minutes from central Shinjuku Min is a great host He quickly responds to any questions helps out with anything you need and is a very friendly even hosting some dinner parties with all of the travellers Its a great way to meet new friends too Sitting around and chatting with him and other travellers will be something I will miss as the stories and experiences everyone shares is enjoyable The room itself was awesome the best Ive stayed in Tokyo I had a great view from my window and shared balcony It was very clean spacious with two closets and a small table Min provides all the amenities from a Japanese toilet to a shower and bath The common spacekitchen is a lovely area A board of travellers shows the memories everyone has made there and their friendshipsOverall definitely a recommend place to stay Looking forward to the next time I visit Tokyo
good place Nice host
everything was good Mr Min was very kind and ready to help

非常好的房间房东是已经移居日本的韩国人房东人非常好会英语韩语日语  每个房间都有独立的密码锁房间内有空调 房子周边的交通购物很方便 有很多24小时的店 还有一个360度无死角天台 可以看到东京市区的夜景 天台上也有桌椅晚上买上几瓶鸡尾酒和吃的在天台听听音乐和朋友喝喝酒感觉很好  房东不会中文我本身会一些日语所以和房东交流完全没问题  客厅的桌子下面收集了很多世界各地的钱币墙上也有来自世界各地的各种语言的留言每个房间的书架上也有不同语言的书籍看的出房东是一个很热心很爱交朋友的人 下次去东京还会再去

Killer location brClean approachable and friendly Quick responses  troubleshooting was a piece of cake Min knows how to connect to people Hes a natural people person and we appreciated every minute of our stay

I had an absolutely fantastic time at this place Min is such a great host and hes really put together a sharehouse thats great for travelers Id absolutely stay here again if Im looking to stay near Kabukicho and would highly recommend this place to other travelers brThis is a private traditional Japanese tatami style room Youll have a Japanese style futon it is quite firm and a private balcony with a nice view overlooking the street The room isnt super soundproof and the street tends to be noisy with ambulances and fire trucks and the occasional drunkard so Id recommend bringing earplugs brThe main floor has a shared kitchen and living room area where youll often find Min other travelers or occasionally a visiting local hanging out This place was so homey and inviting that I often found myself hanging out in the living room and meeting others Theres also a shared shower laundry machine and toilets Theres also a rooftop with a great view of the surrounding area Absolutely awesome
The room was big and it was nice to have balcony We had a really nice time thanks to Min hospitality

My stay with Min  Haru was perfect The experience was like how I wish all my Airbnb experiences could be The home is absolutely how it looks in the pictures Its clean and smells good Min and Haru are so friendly down to earth and easy to talk to They spend time trying to get to know their guests and making sure the guests get to know each other They really try to establish a community within the shared space I enjoyed their company so much that spending an afternoon in their company was well worth the time The location is excellent They help you understand how to get around and use public transportation And its clean and super organized I loved it I definitely recommend this place Its affordable and the place is awesome Im going to miss those two but Ill be back

désireux de découvrir Tôkyô ce point de chute est parfait que vous soyez seul ou plusieurs Pour un premier voyage cet appartement à plusieurs bon points comme le fait que Min parle couramment anglais quil soit dévoué par ex ma valise sétait égarée à Zurich et il à passé tout les coups de tél nécessaires pour que mon bagage soit livré devant sa porte Un autre bon avantage est lemplacement il est dans un quartier vivant et sympa juste à côté de la plus grande station de trainmétro de la ville ce qui est pratique pour tout visiter il y a tout ce que vous voulez à une poignée de minutes et un très bon sushi juste en bas vraiment abordable Le seul inconvénient est un de ses atouts aussi vous serez proche de Shinjuku station pratique pour tous vos déplacements même en province car beaucoup de lignes partent de là mais elle est vraiment ENORME 36 millons de passagers jour deuxième plus grande gare du monde plus de deux cents sorties alors si vous ne la connaissez pas déjà un peu sy retrouver peut être une gageure Si vous débarquez de France ce sera le terminus naturel du train qui vous ramène de Narita  Se rendre ensuite chez votre hôte nest pas facile surtout avec une grosse valise Je vous propose donc quelques instructions pour arriver plus facilement chez lui Le truc pour marcher moins et pas se perdre cest daller à la station suivanteEn descendant du quai vous tomberez vite sur la yamanote line de la compagnie JR east code couleur vert Vous devrez acheter un ticket dans un des automates Au dessus une carte trouvez en une en caractères latins Vous allez à shinôkubo juste après Les chiffres écrits à côté cest le prix 130yens soit 1 euro en ce moment Après prenez votre métro direction ikkebukuroueno et là à shinôkubo tout est simple une seule sortie Devant la bouche vous passez sous les rails à votre droite puis vous  reprenez la première à droite juste après et vous suivez les rails sur une petite routeallée sur 500m environ vous allez croiser une rue plus importante que vous ne pouvez pas traverser directement tournez à gauche càd ne repassez pas sous les rails et restez sur ce trottoir vous êtes sur le bon plus que 600m pour arriver chez Min restez attentifs il y plein denseignes cest assez confus mais regardez bien toutes les devantures de votre côté vous allez passer devant une supérette un peu grande kmart en bleu cest la seule de la rueLimeuble est le précédant lentrée est dans la ruelle qui part sur votre gauche assenceur 9m étage youpi vous êtes arrivé

Min is a great host  he went out of his way to arrange early morning 4am transportation for me to the airport and for my friends to Tsukiji fish market The space was a little tight for the 6 of us but Min responded to our concerns quickly Thank you for having us

Without Min my trip to Tokyo would have fallen flat His knowledge of Shinjuku and the surrounding areas is unlimited and hes not shy about having a drink either His place is three floors with plenty of options for accommodations All the bedrooms were very clean The wifi is great Theres a stove and small oven suitable for grilling fish I really couldnt have asked for more
Seriously  the best place to go in Tokyo

Its a nice and clean place The room as advertised The toilets and hot water all working well Clean Towels provided Location quite close from shinjuku station But becareful airbnb map is not trustful You must really contact min for the actual location in google maps Min is really helpful Cheerful personality and sometimes he bought you breakfast Hehe Otsukare samadesta
Great location really nice host Good for the money
Warm welcome excellent location met a lot of good people so amazing experience It was by far the best home stay I did Thanks a lot min and sure I gonna go again to your place if I come back to Tokyo
I had a good time at Shinjuku Guesthouse Min is a great host If I ever come back to Tokyo I would make another booking Thank you for giving me accommodation Min

Min was a great host I got lost in Shinjuku when finding Mins place but Min got on his bike found me and directed me to the apartment If you had any questions Min would gladly help you The rooms a great and social If you travel alone as I did this is a good place to get to know new people from around the world and have a great time I will stay at Mins place on my next trip to Tokyo Thanks for all Min
Je suis très satisfaite de mon séjour chez M Min    la chambre est minimaliste bien proprelambiance internationale et sympathique Quartier très central pratique pour rayonner partout dans Tokyo

I stayed for one week in this spacious appartment Sometimes it gets crowded but when theres few people around its really an amazing place where you can meet other travelers easily Min is really kind and interested in people and also always easily reachable when in need of help and he occasionally comes to the appartment to check things out which i thought was really convenientTheres lots of convenient stores and places to eat close by and a don quijote store where they sell everything as well The subway is only a few minutes away I definitely recommend this place
A nice place to stay clean and comfortable with a welcoming and friendly host Mins sharehouse is near the Shinjuku station in a perfect position to visit the city

I had a great stay with Min at Sharehouse Min was a friendly host and the accommodations were clean and comfortable Location seemed to be good as well with a subway stop close by I would definitely recommend Mins place to any friends visiting Tokyo

Min was a very pleasant host to deal with Even went out to look for me when I couldnt find the guest house my bad Lovely man to chat with The location is so close to Shin Okubo station so going to places was ease lots of eateries around the guest house not a single dull moment

Sunki was a superb host He greeted me by inviting along with other guests to an Izakaya If you are looking to meet other travelers and locals Sunkis place is where to go The accomodation is simple and on the budget side but this place is really about the atmosphere I really enjoyed my stay
Min is a really kind and helpful host Ive already stayed at Mins guest house before Room is clean and the necessities are provided at the guest house
Nice place Great way to explore Shinjuku
Nice house with great views and vibe Very helpful host

Min tok kontakt med meg rett etter at jeg hadde booket for å ønske meg velkommen og forklare veien og sendte meg epost noen dager før jeg skulle bo der for å spørre om tidspunkt Da jeg ikke fant frem selv om det egentlig er veldig lett kom han og hentet meg Det er et veldig sosialt sted og på kvelden gikk alle ut og spiste med Min Min er innom hver dag selv om han ikke bor der og det føltes trygt at han sjekker ut forholdene Shinjuku guesthouse føles som et minihostel med tilhørende deling av bad og toalett som fungerte fint Du sover på madrass på gulvet i noen av rommene som var helt OK for 1 natt Alt i alt et fint besøk og det ligger veldig sentralt til men samtidig litt utenfor senteret av Shinjuku som kan være ganske masete til tider

Min was an excellent host friendly helpful and good fun to talk to The room was clean and as described and the overall ambiance of the place was great for someone travelling alone It was a great way to meet other people to go out with The location was perfect as I could easily access the north of the city and busier areas such as Shinjuku station on foot The immediate area had plenty of places and Min happily pointed out the best to go to　I would definitely go back In fact I have already booked up

The place is so well located within Shinjuku and the rooms are very clean and tidy The Landlord Min is such a nice person He helped me when I most needed and made my stay much easier The environment is brilliant as there are people from all around the world and that makes it easy to find a plan when you did not expect it It is probably the best guesthouse in Tokyo

Very well located at Shinjuku lots of shops and stores aroundHost Min was very nice and also invited me and an another guest to dinnerwhich was so hidden I would never find it by myself Through that I get to know Tokyo through an another perspective which couldnt if I stayed  in an anonymous hotel which I did in the beginning Thanks Min Hope to see you soon

I only got to stay one night at Mins but Min was very welcoming and friendly I wish wed had more time to chat and I could check out the area more which was in the heart of korean town His place is very convenient for Shinjuku just a few minutes walk from several stations Metro and JR and an easy walk to Shinjuku station itselfI had a private room which was fine Clean and tidy It was one of the wooden floor ones so a bit hard though Min provided plenty of futon bases so ok for me Others may prefer a tatami roomThere were several other people staying and it was quite lively but didnt disturb meId stay again

Min was extremely lovely and helpful The room was basic as described but everything was clean and comfortable A lovely welcoming place that felt more like a friendly apartment than a guest house Min was around during the day and more than happy to offer advice or just have a down to earth chat The location is perfect for exploring Shinjuku and about a five minute walk to a train station 12 minut walk to main Shinjuku station I will definitely be staying here again next time Thanks so much Min

Min is an awesome guy who keeps a super tidy house and loves Korean BBQ which everyone should I stayed for about a week and Min other guests and I went out to a close by All you can eat and drink Korean place which is a favourite of his twice actually its that good I defiantly recommend doing this if you get the chance The place is really convenient for all your Tokyo needs with the closest station being ShinOkubo which has the Yamanote Line which runs through almost every destination you could want to go There are tons of places to eat nearby but this being Japan that is true almost anywhere however there are still loads of great places nearbyI would definitely stay with Min again when I come back to Tokyo and would especially recommend him for people traveling alone as you will get to meet loads of cool people

I had a very positive experience staying at Mins Shinjuku Sharehouse Min was a great host who was very friendly and was fun to hang out with He shares his past travel experiences and life wisdomThe sharehouse was a great place to meet fellow travelers I really enjoyed all the people I met there I dont think I would have enjoyed my visit to Tokyo as much if I had stayed in a private hotelI will book Mins sharehouse again the next time Im in Tokyo

The accommodation was effortless A location and accommodating host Min was generous with his time and gave me space to explore the city I didnt use the kitchen facilities but the toilets and shower was clean and well stocked Thanks Min

Good location Min is very kind he make arrangement to my request of leaving my bag at the place before time stated As my stay in Tokyo is short I am out most of the time Manage to chat with others guest in the night a nice experienceOverall is a nice stay

Shinjuku Sharhouse was an awesome place to get to know Tokyo from The location is right in the middle of real Tokyo center with everything you coild need steps away Min was an amazing host relaxed and easy going He explained everything answered lots of questions I had introduced me to some other nice travellers and made me feel at home The room was sunny and clean just as it looks in the pictures I highly recomend this as a great budget option for singles or groups I felt safe and comfortable Thanks so much
As from previous it was still a great stay Min will make you feel like its your own home Until next time

Min was a fantastic host Communication with him was easy and he personally arrived on the day I checkedin to ensure the process was as smooth as possible The guesthouse itself is clean and has all the amenities that one needs It is located in Shinjuku and close to access to public transport I would definitely recommend this guesthouse for travelers looking for a centralised cheap and clean guesthouse
Great place to stay in a beautiful area Would visit again Thanks min
Very clean place Close to subway station Good experience
Very good and clean place to stay Min is very friendly and nice host Managed to get dinner together with other guest Really having a good time Will come again if I would like to visit Tokyo again
Min is a really nice guyThe room is neat and tidyVery good

Min was a great host very helpful and friendly Whenever i asked Min for help whether it was when i got lost and needed to find my way or to find a good place to eat or shop he was very quick to reply and help me find what i needed  Mins place is very cosy and clean has nice views on Shinjuku from the rooms as well as everyting needed for a comfotable stay The guesthouse is close to lots of cafes and restaurants with delicios food shops of all kinds and several stations so the location is perfectTraveling on my own the guesthlouse was a perfect place to stay and make new friends Overall great Airbnb experience

Perfect 2nd stay at Mins place chose to return because it was perfect the 1st round too Very comfortable perfectly clean and hygienic has all the facilities I need and more just for added comfort Plenty of people to meet and have interesting conversations with  and simultaneously enough space and peace and quiet to relax on my own time and get a good nights sleep Great location  close to metro convenience stores supermarkets restaurants parks tourist attractions definitely will return
Good stay  efficient comfortable clean and hygienic 3rd time staying  will definitely return
Realy good time in Tokyothe room is perfect close to everthingIf I came back it will be herethanks so much

Had a great time staying here Min was very accommodating and the rooms were terrific The location is probably the best part as you are only a 10 minute walk at most from near anything you could ever need convenience stores supermarkets shopping outlets metro lines restaurants etc Ifwhen I come back to Tokyo I would absolutely stay again

Min is awesome He is a great and caring host He wants you to have a pleasant stay and he will give you good inside tips and take you out for dinner and beers Good clean place close to all attractions Recommended

The location is very good right in the shopping centre of TokyoShijuku Few minutes fr subway station Very convenient However its a hostel so its a little too crowd The room is small and its noisy since the walls are very thin Also we need to take turns to take shower during rush hours I couldnt sleep very well because I can hear everyone talking and walking after mid night So if u r a sound sleeper it should be fine w u
Very clean and comfortable apartment as described Excellent location Min was fantastic helpful and friendly in all respects Thanks a lot

Min was wonderful present useful and always in a good mood He send very specific instructions which made the place ease to find even for a first timer The guest house is well situated minutes from all Shinjuku has to offer on one side and delicious Korean food on the other  The place was great bedrooms upstairs or downstairs and a great common area in between with tv kitchen laundry room and bathrooms The wifi was perfect and the view most inspiring
Min is very nice and supportive Very well located guesthouse It can get crowded but overly satisfied

Min was a fun host He made time for small talk and made me feel very welcomed at his place The apartment was clean and tidy If youre looking more for a communal vibe and would like to meet some fellow travelers Id highly recommend staying at Mins
Min was a great host even took us for drinks The place was busy but the atmosphere was good Thank you Min

Min was a very nice host not complicated at all very fast with replying and providing the right information Good situated in Shinjjuku and as described in the profile Very professionalWould definitely go back thereThank you Min
Cozy place recommend all on all

Min is the man  The place is nice near shinjuku and you ll probably meet cool people from around the world Min gives you fines adresses for food and he is very helpfull in  every kind I ll come back  brThank you

Highly recommend 3rd time staying at Mins place Wouldnt stay anywhere else if I was in Tokyo His place is clean welcoming and efficiently set up for short and  long term guests Min is flexible and friendly and the location is perfect for exploring Tokyo with easy access to the overground and underground trains Mins place is also full of interesting people from all over the world so I have made good friends every time Ive stayed there Will definitely return Thanks Min
Great place for those who are looking for a bed and shower If youre in Tokyo for exploration this will be more than enough

Its my first backpacking experience and Mins been really helpful and provided me with all information I need The place itself is clean and tidy The location is also very convenient 5 mins walk to the closest train station Its been a great experience to live in the shared house and meet other travellers will definitely stay there again if I went to Tokyo again
Its my second time here The location and the place just perfect for me

Min is a really good host and fun to talk with I really enjoy my stay there and its a really cozy place  brBest part is that you can meet people from different countries and have a really good chat with them or drink haha brHighly recommend anyone who travels alone to stay here

This is my first Airbnb experience in Mins sharehouse the feeling is totally different with living in a hotel or hostel but like living in your home or in the university hall with friends Min is very kind and helpful As soon as I finish my booking Min contacted me and send me necessary informationThe location of sharehouse is great really near the Higashi Shinjuku metro station and only take few minutes to walk to Shinjuku JR station so you can easily go to other places of Tokyo but also can fully enjoy yourself in the exciting Shinjuku without worry about the traffic The sharehouse is very clean necessary facilities are all ready Min made a lot of decorations by himself very sweet There is a lounge in the 9th floor After a day of trip guests would gathering there at the evening talking with each other eating some snacks watching TV or listening the music the atmosphere is relax and sweet most impotently making you want to come back in the future At last Min is really a good talker

The host was very friendly and made me feel very welcome The place was very clean and the facilities were more than adequate Min is very helpful and provided alot of information He also had quite alot of interesting stories to share and it was fun talking with him The location is also very convenient and I met alot of interesting travellers at this place Highly recommended

Min was the sweetest host Ive ever had I felt like he was actually interested in getting to know me and help me out on my travels which is admirable considering how many travellers must go through the place This place is so cute and super clean on the inside I was kind of shocked walking in Great location if Im ever back in town I will definitely pop by

Very friendly bloody Japanese Min i like the hospitality and ease to communicate brClean place and good vibe due to different people come in every daybrI didnt get to enjoy the drinking on the rooftop this time will do next for sure

Min is really reachable and you understand it as soon as you arriveHe explained how everything worked to me in the flat even the basics one He can give you some advices of places you should visit and try to make connection with other gu0sy of the sharehouse which is pretty cool for people coming alone in TokyoHe really likes doing airbnb and the bonus of the flat is the rooftop where we had drinks and barbecues all togetheri clearly recommand this flat clean well located with everything you need

Min is the most amazing host I had ever meet He is very kind nice and so funny  brAlso his Airbnb is very clean and very good located I had such a amazing time here thanks to Min  his wife  packpackers  OMG THERE IS A ROOFTOP brThank you
Min is a very chill and nice guy The room was great and clean Location is very convenient
Min is very helpful and friendly The bnb was very nice and clean and always filled with interesting new people Couldnt have asked for any more

I can say nothing but extremely positive things about Min and his accommodation Location is amazing extremely convenient and offers nice views of the busy HigashiShinjuku area Room was perfectly clean and the dualfloor and rooftop access was amazing For convenience I dont think it can be beaten you literally have about 5 convenience stores within 2 minutes walk around the location Subway station is about a 5minute walk with good and versatile transport links Min himself is a really great guy extremely funny warm and is great at trying to engage with everyone and get people interacting with each other which is great when youre looking to meet new people especially when travelling solo for the first time as I was Whenever I plan on coming back to Tokyo this will be my goto accommodation I could not recommend it more

Je nest quune chose à dire EXCELLENT    Min était vraiment génial et très gentil avec nous avec se gros avantage de pouvoir faire des soirées en terrasse D Au niveau de la chambres cest propre le quartier est très vivant et assez bruyant mais on si habitue très vite  et puis il est bien desservie par les transports en commun  Si je retourne au Japon cest sûr que je retournerai chez Min
Min is very kind and happy He was always helping me and making sure everything was fine Thanks Min

I had a great time here Min is a great guy He is very friendly helpful and fun to hang out with Staying at his place really felt like staying with family You can sit down on the roof with people and have fun after coming back in the evening The place is clean and the location is very convenient Would definitely stay here again when I come back to Tokyo

Asian female travel solo Experience was amazing Location is awesome Lots of convenient stores and restaurant nearby brEasy to navigate upon arrival Amenities are simple but sufficient brThe place is immaculate and cozy Coad room but you still have your own privacy Will definitely be back again brThanks minsan once again

It was awesome time i spent in this house and especially the host was very kind and friendly and people who met there were good we could talk each other friendly and drink together i like to stronly recommend u this house

한국인들에게  도쿄의 번화가를 돌아볼수있는데에 있어서 최적화된 위치 사장님 영어 한국어 일본어 모두능통하심 화장실쾌적 인테리어에서보이는 미적감각 모든 부분이 완벽하고 다음에 올때에도 이 곳에 머무를 예정brTo Foreigners First of all the location of this place is just perfect main streetsHarajuku MeijijingumaeSibuyaAsakusa etc dont need to transferYou could also just walk to Kabukicho and Sin Okubobrinterior of this place is pretty artistic which makes you very comfortable feelings I was shocked that hostage made all the beds frames by himselfwe can see how he pay attentions to his customersBathroom was cleantoilet flushes freaken greatall of it was very comfortable  If i have another plan to visit Japan  hell yeah i ll stay in this placebr
Great location and easy check in Min was welcoming and helpful I recommend staying here if your visiting Tokyo

Min is a very friendly host and his sharehouse is pretty comfortable Its located in a really convenient place to explore Tokyo It has access to all the amenities one could ask for All in all I can recommend Mins place to anyone whos looking to stay in the heart of Tokyos night life and still be within a budget

Min est une personne très accueillante et très serviable Nous avons pu échanger de bon moment ensemble Son auberge de jeunesse dispose de tout le nécessaire pour sy sentir bien et lemplacement est idéalbrJe recommande ce logement

There is a reason Min is a superhost  of all the hostelssharedspaces ive stayed in Tokyo this was the cleanest most comfortable and most well managed  In addition to the accommodations being clean comfortable and as described Min was incredibly friendly and interested in getting to know the people staying with him  He routinely invited us up to the common space to have drinks and dinner with his wife the rest of the occupants  Unfortunately i was only able to drop by momentarily but it was nice to meet everybody  Also great location if you are interested in some late fun filled nights in Shinjuku  Its in walking distance from all of the neighborhoods famous nightlife  also pleasant view from our rooms small balcony as well as the roof hope to stay here again

Very walkable just next to Kabukicho Close to metro as well Place is clean and safe Its time to plan for your trip and meet some new friends here Min is a so helpful and friendly host too Thanks Min anyway
Great host Min is the man Awesome location close to everything
If you want to experience night life in Tokyo you should choose here

If you want somewhere to stay that is centrally located this is it Everything is just about a 3 to 4 stop away by metro Shinjuku Harajuku Shibuya Just get on the metro and ride  Metro is right down the sidewalk We had a wonderful time staying at Mins place He even did a guest meet up on the rooftop with food and good conversation Dont think twice about booking this place just do itbrJoe  Melaney San Diego LeucadiaCalifornia
신주쿠에서 얼마 멀지도 않은 히가시 신주쿠에 위치해서 일본지리를 잘 몰라도 정말 찾아가기 쉬웠습니다 또 사장님께서 일본어 영어 한국어를 모두 잘 사용하셔서 한국어로 체크인하는데 아무 문제가없었습니다 방도 정말 좋았구요 4박5일 친절한사장님과 좋은 게스트하우스 그리고 멋진 친구들덕분에 잊지못할 여행이 된거 같습니다

This was one of the greatest airbnb stays of my life Great host place  location and excellent vibebrMin was great Very nice and chill always answered my question quickly and the little barbies he threw on the roof were some of the highlights of my tripbrThe place was really nice Very clean nice vibe all the necessary resources for a comfortable stay The roof was great and had a nice viewbrThe area was perfect to get acquainted with the hustle and bustle of Shinjuku life Right next to Kabukicho you can walk 5 minutes for golden Gai 5 minutes for the main nightlife areas and a short 10 minutes from Shinjuku station The subway station is right on the corner of the block and if utilised right can get you everywhere fairly quickbrI had a great time here and definitely recommend to any solo or group travellers looking for a place to stay

This place is extremely nice very clean and cosy location is excellent with metro station just 2 minutes away full of bars restaurants supermarkets shops and the whole Shinjuku area jut 5 minutes away Its a perfect place to explore Tokyo since all districts are 3045 mins away by metrotrain from it Min is an excellent host he always is ready and happy to help with anything you need and no wonder how awesome it is to enjoy the rooftop in the evening with some drinks and barbecue I really recommend this place

Had a pleasant stay at the sharehouse in the 6F Min is easy to communicate to and responds almost instantly He was clear with directions and very helpful I arrived a few hours later at night when I landed and he was so gracious to wait for my arrival to help with my luggage up the stairs elevator was down at the time and to check in Location is very central about a 12 min walk to shinjuku station and lots of restaurants and the heart of shinjuku accessible within minutes The only con is that there is only one shower shared by everyone However the hot water was made up for it Would highly recommend if wanting to stay in the heart of shinjuku

Min is a great host he helped me with settling into the place suggesting spots to go around the area and even had BBQ parties on his rooftop Definitely will visit Mins place again if Im coming to Tokyo

히가시 신주쿠 역이 바로 앞에 있고 교통비가 아깝다면 신주쿠역 까지 도보로 한 15분 정도 걸으셔도 무방합니다 번화가 까지는 도보로 10분 내로 갈 수 있어서 편리했습니다 한국 분이시라면 사장님이 한국인이시기 때문에 의사소통애 대한 걱정도 안하셔도 됩니다 샤워실이 하나라는 점 말고는 청결도와 위치 모두 좋았습니다 저녁에는 숙박중인 사람둘과 맥주도 마시면서 이야기도 할 수 있어 즐겁게 지냈습니다
Very friendly and sociable host Min  thank you so much for making my Tokyo trip so enjoyable and pleasant
사장님이 너무 친절하시고 비오는 날 우산도 챙겨주시는 세심한 배려에 숙소 위치는 또 말할 것도 없습니다 샤워실이 한개라 걱정되긴 했지만 쓰는데 전혀 불편하진 않았습니다 그리고 무엇보다 뷰가 너무 좋아용 ㅠㅠ
Min is really friendly Will come back soon

호스트님이 일단 너무 친절하셔서 좋으셔요 체크인할때 주위에 먹을거리나 교통같은거도 잘 알려주시고 친근하게 대해주십니다 밤에 마음맞는분들끼리 맥주도 먹을 수 있고 방도 청결합니당 위치도 일단 히가시 신주쿠역과 굉장히 가깝고 jr선 타기 위한 신주쿠역이나 신오쿠보역도 걸어가기 부담스러운 거리는 아니라서 좋아용 바로 주위에 편의점 스시집 게다가 돈키호테까지 있어서 금상첨화 입니다 굳이 단점을 꼽자면 샤워실이 하나밖에 없구 7인실을 쓰게되면 물론 감안하실점이지만 수면에 예민하신 분들은 불편하실수도 있을것 같아용 제가 갔을땐 코 골던 분도 계시긴 했었어성ㅠㅠ 그래도 이 점을 충분히 감안하더라도 지금까지 해외여행 다니면서 묵었던 숙소중에 가장 만족스러웠습니다 다시 도쿄에 와도 이 숙소에 묵을것 같네요ㅎㅎ 고민하시지 말구 예약

MinHaru are Welcoming open and friendly hosts  I Shared a room and the common space with nice people Everything is clean and the place is well located with a nice view on the rooftop I recommend this place and Will come back for sure if around Tokyo once
Nice place and people  Thanks

Shinjuku Sharehouse was a great stay and I enjoyed my time there very much Min was very attentive and answered any questions I had Also he was very friendly which made it easy to communicate Would absolutely stay there again if I go to Tokyo in the future

This was my first time coming to Tokyo and I was traveling by myself but luckily the Minsan and Harusan were very helpful and recommended so many places to go Moreover the location was very near the station and easy to spot so no worries There are lots of shops and restaurants as well in the neighborhoodbrThe rooms were very neat and tidy but there is only one bathroom for every guests so if the rooms are fully booked you might consider waking up early to prevent queuing for a shower

Min and Haru their place was and will always be my solid Tokyo base  The location is really good and everything in the sharehouse is just so incredibly chill that it pretty much feels like a second home For this second trip Min and Haru helped me out a lot which I am super thankful for And last but not least I had a fantastic time in Shinjuku with the other guests

If youre planning to stay in Japan look no further Min and Harus sharehouse is an amazing location to explore all of Tokyo Japan Their place is clean safe quirky and all of their other guests were all very friendly I even made a couple of good friends while staying there Min was full of suggestions on what to do during my stay and very helpful I cant wait to go back to Japan just for the simple fact that Ill be staying at this place again Thank you for making my first trip out of the country safe memorable and fun

Min and Harus place is so great I went back again

The sharehouse is on a very convenient train line its very easy to get around with less than 10mins walk in either direction Everything was spotless and our housemates were great Min was very helpful with hints and tips about the area and lovely to talk to in general Theres access to WiFi a restaurant in the same building a common room for cooking and hanging out tea and coffee and small fridge in the dorm and convenience stores nearby Great place were actually dropping in again tonight on the end of our holiday as a last stopover before the flight home Definitely would recommend

Good place for a short stay in Tokyo about 1015 minutes from Shinjuku station and 710 minutes from HigashiShinjuku and Okubo stations Convenience stores are very close bybrI visited in summer so if you happen to get a bed next to the window the sunlight streaming in in the early morning 6am can be disruptive to sleep There is also only one shower room although I never had to wait to use it during my stay brThe sleeping area is compact but spacious enough to feel like you have your personal space even if the rest of the beds are occupied Min and Haru also provide all guests with one small towel a day

Would absolutely recommend staying here The space itself is really cool and clean and well situated for the metro or walking in to Shinjuku The hosts  these are the highlight of the place So friendly and welcoming The last night of my trip was spent having dinner and drinks with them and the other guests and it was one of the highlights of my trip I have already recommended them to friends and when Im even back in Tokyo this will be my place to stay Thank you Min and Haru

Min  Haru are the BEST hosts one can ever have Hospitable friendly and knowledgeable Haru made us a home cooked birthday meal even and Min took some of us guests on a tour of the city Be sure to check their youtube channel as well This was my first time staying in a sharehouse and they run it so well I have stayed in other airbnbs across Europe and the US and none came close The location is within walking distance to all major public transportation not to mention a ton of nightlife br5 minute walk to Golden Gai Alley 88 incredible

The place is very well located and you can walk to train stations or Shinjuku The hosts are very kind and helpful facilities in the place are good My room was located in 6th floor and I could hear noises from street as cars and ambulances so if your sleep is very light I suggest to use ear plugs or noise cancelling headphones I recommend this place for its price and location

숙소 자체가 분위기부터 편리함까지 모든걸 갖췄고 호스트께서 정말 친절하고 친근하게 대해 주셔서 하루 일정을 마치고 내 집 같이 쉴 수 있었습니다  호스트께서 영어 일어 그리고 한국어에도 능하셔서  타국에서 의사소통이 두려우신 게스트분들께 적극 추천 드립니다 숙소 위치가 도쿄 전역을 이동하기 유리한 신주쿠역과 도보로 이동하기 가까운 자리에 위치해서 처음 도쿄에 오신 게스트분들도 도쿄 전역을 관광하는데 어려움이 없을겁니다 쉐어룸의 장점을 살려 여러 사람들과 만나볼 수 있고 쉐어룸 개인 침대마다 커튼이 달려있어서 자신만의 공간도 보장 받을 수 있었습니다 제가 다시 신주쿠를 가게 되면 망설임 없이 신주쿠 쉐어하우스를 예약 하고싶습니다

I stayed here for a week in the room with the bunk beds The living room and shower are on a different floor There is only 1 shower in the whole sharehouse the whole place felt very homey and was comfortable Dont expect it to be spotlessly clean like a hotel The place is cleaned and managed by the host couple Min and Haru I think the nicest part of staying here is all the people u will meet The hosts themselves are very friendly and welcoming The other guests I met during my time there were really nice as well It is very near kabukicho area so if u like the night life its very convenient It can get a little noisy at times sleeping in bunk beds especially since everyone gets up at different times I would love to stay again but Ill probably book the private room next time

Min and Haru were fantastic Min is easily the most personable host you will ever meet and he does a great job of including everyone in activities He even invited me over for a homecooked dinner after I had moved out but jet lag got the best of me In the grand scheme of things it is a hostel so if you are in a shared room and not in a private room you can only hope for quiet roommates There is one restroom in the shared room and a shower as well as another restroom in the floor with the living room so I recommend taking a shower first thing in the morning or late at night Overall I loved everyone I met Haru and Min were great and Ive already made plans to stay there again PS Location is walking distance to the Subway and close to all things Shinjuku
Muy buen alojamiento los host son increibles
The flat was nice and even if there were a few guests sharing it  did not feel overcrowded The metro was very close reachable within minutes walking

Min was a great host He was very prompt in replying to my inquires over airbnb and he came and met me at the station He was personable and easy to talk to Nothing to complain about the room either it was clean and had a nice view If you dont like sleeping on the floor then it might not be for you Internet worked like a charm and was accessible throughout the house There is a washing machine for you to use if you require I would definitely stay here again
Min is very hospitality and amiable owner

Min is an exceptional host and the whole guesthouse experience compared to hotels or hostels is definitely worth it Great price comfortable and located in great neighbourhood I made some friends while there although because of the smaller number of guests compared to a hostel for example you might not have the same luck I did Min and I shared many discussions about the world and he has a wealth of knowledge about Tokyo and about JapaneseEastern culture

If you go to Tokyo Japan then i must recommend you stay with Minhis place is really great with traditional japanese tatami flooring and the sliding doors Wifi tv and air conditioning the whole place is very very clean and is in a very good location across the road from the train station surrounded by 24 hour convenience stores and down the road from a 24 hours mcdonalds and the view is spectacular as you can see all the surrounding high rise buildings and the cityMin is THE nicest person we met in Japan he is very welcoming and a really great host he did everything he could to make us feel comfortable and ensure we enjoyed our time in Japan i will definitely go back to Japan just to stay at Mins place
Thank you very much to Min We had a great time with a great host and the location was ideal Would recommend to anybody who is wanting to stay for a good price in Tokyo Thank you Min

This is my 2nd time and I return to Mr Mins Guesthouse And my 3rd time will be coming by this year Mr Min is friendly responsible keeper and you will like him

Travel to Tokyo has twice lived in Mins house my family and I are very fond of here Min is a good friendly people large windows of the room you can see the street is a rare good place another from the subway close nearby supermarket there are many life is very convenient function Next time you go to Tokyo or will choose Mins house We highly recommend

I stayed in four different locations during my stay in Tokyo unfortunately I waited until the last minute to book accommodation and Mins Shinjuku Sharehouse is easily my favorite  Min is a really warm and hospitable host  While his reservation confirmation provides detailed directions useful on the intricate streets of Tokyo when I returned to the city after a brief stay in Kyoto he was gracious enough to meet me at the station and guide me to the apartment  For rainy days he has extra umbrellas for guests to use on the day I left he generously gave me one of them  Apparently he and the other guests go out on Friday nights which sounds like tons of fun although I missed out because I was staying less than a week and had to leave the previous dayAs indicated by the name the apartment is located in Shinjuku which is one of the central hubs of Tokyo  Using the metro system its easy to get to other parts of the city without having to do dozens of transfers The surrounding neighborhood is packed with Korean restaurants though you can easily find other cuisinesThe apartment has a nice little common room in the kitchen area with a couch and sound system  Like all the rooms theres a balcony that looks out onto a great view of Shinjuku  At night especially you can feel the pulse of the city    I stayed in the single room which allows for some privacy  My advice would be to make a reservation request ASAP as the rooms book out quickly

Staying at Mins place was a pleasure  He took me out in Shinjuku and introduced me to others staying at the sharehouse  The location was exellent  30 minutes from anywhere you would want to go in Tokyo

Min is the best host and the coolest guy i met in Tokyo Always helping and perfect instructions for a stay without problems Also great view from the guesthouse lots of nice guests and perfectly central location close to shinjuku station I recommend

Min is very niceand the position of the house is quite near higashi shinjuku stationBut its a little inconvenience that theres only one bathroom with all these 4 floors of roomsAnd rooms are a little different from my imagination
Nice and warm sharehouse although I havent enough time to share my experience in this trip Hope to see you soon Min

This was my first experience with Airbnb so everything was new for me To be honest I am really happy about my choice The apartment is used only by travelers which make the experience very social There is a kitchen in common where you can meet anytime all the other people and organize some good party Everything is clean and comfortable The queue for the shower can be sometimes a little long but if you are smart and organized youll find it free with no problem I never waited more than 10 minutesThe area is nice and close to many bars you can walk to shinjuku station in 1015 minutes or just take the Metro for 2 stops Good connections with the all city through that station Min is a great host he waits for you when you check in and he will party with you until late night Very welcoming and warm guy and funIn the end I totally advise to stay here especially if you travel alone or with friends and you want to meet people and party together I will definitely come back to this place if I am in Tokyo again

Min was such a great host He was waiting when I arrived and made sure to send clear directions in advanced  The sharehouse is located in Shinjuku within walking distance of plenty of nightlife but the residence itself was calm and quiet I was in a private room and the other rooms in this apartment I think were all either private or shared for two people so it was easy to get to know and meet other people but also have your own space if needed I was traveling solo and it was a great for my needshighly recommend and would love to stay again the next time Im in Tokyo
I stayed in a great private room in Shinjuku Everyone else in the share house was extremely welcoming and fun I had many Soju drinks with some Canadian and Korean pals Hope to be back
재밌었습니다 내 집같은 편안함
A nice place and convenient house brIts easy to go Shinjuku and near metro brMin is a nice guy br
非常友好健谈的房东位置也很中心房间也挺宽敞
Min was a kind and helpful host always ready to help when he was there

Min was at the hostel when I arrived and a super nice guy He gave me a thorough tour of the place from where the towels were how the shower worked to where I would be staying and how to use the AC He was helpful in pointing out the subway and a nearby sushi place His wife was there toward the end of my stay and she was absolutely lovely The place was SUPER clean and guests really fun This is in an awesome location closed to lots of bars the robot show and the red light district Highly recommend

Shinjuku Sharehouse was a great place to stay The owner Min made it a very welcoming place and took the effort to help me out when I fell sick Facilities were very good with a working hot shower and towels and the location was just a little north of the night life districts of Shinjuku which means that you can easily walk over to most of the attractions and yet have some peace and quiet at the end of the day Its also very near ShinOkubo JR Station and Higashi Shinjuku Station Oedo Line making it an ideal base for exploring the rest of Tokyo Overall thumbs up

This was my first time to stay in a Hostel and I was lucky that i stayed in a private room in Shinjuku  The room is so nice and clean with a balcony  Min is a nice host and he is so kind and helpful to answer any of my question He is also working hard to keep the place cleanAlso i feel very satisfied with the facilities here especially the hot shower The location here is also very convenience I met funny lady and guys here and we shared great journey at the Halloween days in Japan and had made my special experiences here  HEY BROS THANKSHope to come back Highly recommended

Cosy and spotless share house in a very convenient location just a 10 minutes footwalk to Shinjuku station right next to Korea town with heaps of eating options many  convenience stores around But what makes this place very special are two things First theres a nice common area which makes it very easy to socialize But most of all Min the owner of this place is an awesome  guy He was around when I arrived and introduced me to the place and the other travelers You can contact him if you need any assistance and its very fun to have a few beers or soju with him Id always come back to this place when back in Tokyo Highly recommended

Min made me feel extremely welcomed Everything was exactly as expected friendly guests and host clean and organized I would recommend staying at his place He organized a night out for all the residents that were staying at his place
Great location clean comfortable

I had a really great time staying at mins place and would highly reccomend it Excellent location easy to find and the apartment was great Very clean and comftable great social space to hang out in and min is a really great guy and even let me store my big backpack for 2 days while i went to kyoto Thank you again for a great stay and i will be booking here again when i come back to japan
Nice place Min is very kind and lot of patient to brief me about the share house facilities and shops which are helpfulbrEasily to find and go out for shopping sightseeing
Excelent place to stay And very practices area I will stay there in another ocation Thanks Min for all I have spend a wonderfull time

Min was honestly a really cool guy he spent a good time talking to us just having fun He could tell you all about Tokyo even useful tiny details you wouldnt think about asking I also met other interesting people in the shared house and made good new friends I very thoroughly enjoyed my time there and its sad that I had to leave

I am really sure that this place is the most awesome one to stay for travelers who wants to make friend from all over the worldbrThe host Mr Min is super openminded person and I am sure you will have great time with himbrThe room is never cold or hot and everything was perfect I really liked the night view from the balconybrThe host Min always tried to make his place better and he always waited for his guests to come whenever it was even until late night and since his english is almost perfect he really liked communicating with guestsbrThe location was also perfectbrHave nothing to complain about this place and I strongly recommend this placebrYou will never regret

I stayed at Mins place together with 6 friends for two weeks in FebruaryMarch I really like the host Min and his sharehouse This is the second time Im staying here the last time being in 2014For this trip he had done some redecoration We had a big room for ourselves for 7 people with new furniture and new air condition Anyone who has stayed in Japan for the winter knows that it can get pretty damn cold in the Winter indoors The new AC managed to cope with this though and we had a very cozy feeling in the roomI would say that the size of the room is perfect for 6 people but it could handle us 7 with no problem The location is great walking distance from Shinjuku station which means walking distance to other stations and most central trainlines The other guests at the different floors have always been nice and interesting this time being no exception The kitchenarea of the sharehouse becomes a natural place to kick it back for a while to hang outMin the host is very helpful and positive He gladly comes with suggestions on where to go etc just great This is pretty much the perfect place to stay in Tokyo unless you have a hard time with a hostelkind of place

Min was very friendly when I arrived to the share house and I felt very welcome The place is pretty tidy has lots of nice decorations and a great balcony view brRoom is a bit drafty at times but there are heaters and if the shared room is full of people the collective body heat keeps it very warm brIt is also in a convenient location for the subway and JR lines as well as proximity to convenience stores and late night restaurants
ホストの方は日本語が上手なお方でした滞在中私の事情ですがあまりお話する機会がなかったのでまた色々お話してみたいです
방도 깨끗하고 집주인께서도 친절하셔서 좋았습니다

Min è veramente un super host amichevole e ti mette subito a tuo agio La camera è esattamente come da foto ed il quartiere è a due passi dal cuore di Shinjuku Sì trovano negozi e ristoranti a tutte le ore metro e stazione JR sono a pochi minuti a piediEsattamente come descrittoGrande Min

Min was an awesome host He was friendly easy to communicate with and even threw small rooftop parties for the guests The place was a rough 10 minutes walk away from the Shinjuku area so it was a great location to go around all over Tokyo I liked how the rooms were very clean and had an outside terrace Also the common room had a large fridge and a TV so the guests could comfortably spend time I would definitely revisit the place on my next trip to Tokyo
친구3명과 지낼 숙소를 찾던중 Min의 backpackers에서 묶었는데 무엇보다고 편안한 분위기에서 여러나라의 게스트들과 교류하며 즐거운 여행을 할 수 있었습니다 또한 탁트힌 옥상에서 맥주를 마시며 여독을 풀 수 있어 그 또한 큰 여행의 즐거움 이였습니다 자유로운 여행을 즐기는 배낭여행객이라면 이 숙소를 적극 추천드립니다

Had so much fun at Mins place I stayed on the 6th floor with 5 other people I didnt know We all became friends and hung out during the daysevenings The room is nice and has all the regular accommodations youd expect The 9th floor is where you can do your laundry take a bath cook or hang out with others Min brought us to the rooftop to celebrate the departure of me and another person There we had a pleasant evening grilling meat and having some drinksbrThis room is easy to find using Mins directions and pictures but if you get lost just contact him as he responds quickly You leave your luggage out in the room but people will respect your stuff Mins a fun guy and youll definitely have a good stay
신주쿠 하라주쿠 시부야 오모테산도 등 유명한 곳의 이동이 편리하였고 가까워서 무척이나 좋았습니다 숙소는 매우 청결하였고 아기자기하여 잠들기에도 편했고 아침 저녁으로 옥상에 올라가 시원한 바람을 맞으며 누워있기도 하였습니다 한동안 그 곳이 계속 생각 날 것 같네요
에어비앤비로써 서비스 위치 청결함 등 아주 좋았습니다 기회가 된다면 다시 꼭 갈게요

Min was very welcoming and amicable  as soon as I arrived he showed me around the sharehouse and explained where everything was then we sat in the common area talking for a whileThe sharehouse is clean and wellkept and the bed was really comfortable Its also great to go out and explore with the other people staying there if your schedules match upThe rooftop view should be great for seeing the sunrise or sunset  its a shame I was only staying in Tokyo during a typhoon hopefully Ill get better weather next timeTrain lines are close so you can easily visit the rest of Tokyo from the sharehouse  its in a great locationI wish I had explored the nearby Shinjuku area more as well but that will have to wait until next timeThanks Min
Min was a great host  funny welcoming and went out of his way to help us find his place and feel at home Would definitely recommend staying with him

Min was a wonderful host he went out of his way to make everyone feel welcome and create a really fun chill social vibe and got to know his guests the room was clean and felt very safe two air conditioners made it very comfortable the lower bunk beds have a curtain which I loved for that little bit of privacy I didnt see any storage space that being said I only had a backpack and didnt inquire about it so maybe I just missed it but there was plenty of floor space for everyones bags and it didnt feel cramped at allbrwalking distance to Shinjuku Shibouya and Golden Gai lots of public transportation near by brthe directions to the house were confusing when coming from the airport especially for an English speaker visiting Japan for the first time I would recommend ensuring you have data to use Google maps or other GPS systems with familiarize yourself with the different train systems in Tokyo and pay attention to the pictures Min sends of the enterance theyre a huge help brI had the best time staying here and cant wait to come back

Min was a great host he gave clear instructions to get to his place from where I was and his place is within 5 min walk to the Higashi Shinjuku train station He also gave me a nice single bed that is cute and cosy His place is also near convienience stores restaurants and even 15 mins walk to Shinjuku I was travelling alone so it is perfect for solo female travelers too Min was also helpful to guide me to places of interest and he speaks good English And i made new friends since it was a shared room Highly recommend it if you travel on a budget and wants a strategic location
Had a great time at Mins place Hes a funny guy helpful and informative and always keen for a beer The rooftop was a cool hangout after a long day and a good start to a night out
Like staying with family always a great time and fun meeting new people there also
I love this place So clean and tidy and in a great location Thank you so much Min See you again
HIGHLY RECOMMEND  Shinjuku SharehousebrThis was my first airbnb in Japan and it was absolutely perfect Location is

Great place Love the decor and the room I stayed in was nice The place has a nice honey cozy feel to it I would live in a place like thisbrThe host was welcoming too His English was great Nice and friendly guy that engages in conversation We talked about real estate prices in Tokyo versus other parts of the worldbrOne complaint I do have is that at night the sirens get loud They stop after a certain point not too too late but they happened every night for the two nights I was there Not sure if it wad we were next to a police station or if there was a festival nearby brThere is a part where stairs are pretty steep to some of the rooms but you can get around without stairs so if you have a bad knee I would suggest contacting the host to make sure that you can avoid thembr

Min  his wife made me feel very welcomed upon arrival at the Sharehouse We immediately started drinking beers and sake and I got to meet some of the travelers staying there as well The sharehouse was very clean walking distance to restaurants shops bars clubs  subways in Shinjuku Thank you Min for your hospitality I highly recommend staying here versus a hotel Save a lot  Overall amazing experience

This was my first  last airbnb in Tokyo and it was absolutely perfect Location is great easy access to a JR station and subway A good spot for Shinjuku nightlife Its also in the heart of Koreatown Min does an excellent job communicating quickly responds to any questions and is very helpful in every aspect Min  his wife up keep the sharehouse daily so its always clean Its also a great place to meet other travelers especially for solo travelers Loved it so much I booked again Thank you Min
Our stay was very comfortable and Min was beyond friendly and helpful Definitely recommend
Great location  Easily access to shinjuku and rest of the place by metro
房東很好而且附近有很多餐廳 十分方便

The location is great near the HigashiShinjuku Station Min was very nice and kind host he explain everything clearly and introduce me to everyone who already stayed there He even upgrade my room for free Ill definitely will come back there when I visiting Tokyo again

Min is a very nice host I have stay at different hostels in tokyo before and I can sure that this is the best shared room that I ever had The room is big there are many common spaces which you can easily find someone to chat with
Great location great host very nice room No regret at all

Jag bodde här i ca två veckor och jag har inget dåligt att säga Tvärtemot så har mina två veckor här varit väldigt bra Vilket är glädjande för alltid lite nervöst när man ska bo med människor man aldrig träffat tidigarebrLäget är bra priset är bra flertal olika stationer inom gångavstånd finns restauranger och barer nästintill överallt brMen vad som för mig har gjort det så glädjande att bo här är Minairbnb hosten Han pratar bra engelska trevlig och väldigt välkomnande brVarvaranan dag lagade vi mat med ett gäng från boendet och Min såklart på taket där han har både bord och stolar Om man inte vill eller är upptagen med annat skippar man såklart bara detta men möjligheten finns om vädret tillåterbrOch utsikten på taket är fantastisk speciellt under kvällenbrDå jag behövde resa hem väldigt tidigt på morgonen bestämde jag mig för att sova på dagen för att sedan orka vara vaken hela natten blev då erbjuden att spendera sista dagen i ett privat rum som för en kort tid var ledigt gratis vilket var oerhört uppskattatbrThank you for these two weeks Min hope to see you again

This place is really nice Rooms and beds are comfortable and everything is very clean The location is perfect nearby the subway station or 10 minutes walking from Shinjuku stationbrAll these things are nothing compared to the hosts special skills Min is simply an amazing person and hes doing everything to make you feel home Together with other guests we had great time in there Party if you want to or just chill in your room This place is simply a must
very clean very friendly very easy to find overall an awesome guesthouse

Staying at Shinjuku sharehouse was a great experience well located really close to metro station I really enjoy my stay Min is very helpful with all I needed Thanks Min next time in Tokyo Ill stay there for sure

Its all been said before but really Mins Shinjuku Sharehouse is all form of awesome I was initially skeptic of hostel dorm style living but the people I shared with were great and Min has designed the large open plan room in such a cool way

People I think you will NOT find any better place than this Haru and Min are so so friendly you can walk directly to the main street of Shinjuku from there The shared places are so clean Min is always caring about how clean the place is I really felt like I was with my family I could say that I was with my Japanese family Thank you Haru and Min I will go back

I stayed at a lot of places during my travels in Japan and this was my favorite Very clean all the amenities you need and you get to meet new people and have a few drinks with them You are about a 7 minute walk from Golden gai tiny bars and 10 minutes from the main cityshopping area Also about a 15 minute walk to Shinjuku train station I would definitely stay here again if I am ever back in Shinjuku

Min and Haru were such awesome people Hospitality was top notch and they also taught me about the place during my stay Not to mention the decoration of the place was SUPERB Definitely would recommend this place for everyone
Min is a five star airbnb host This was the second time I stayed at his airbnb and its always a pleasure  Thanks for this trip and letting me stay Hope to see you again one day

Min and Hart were amazing hosts we felt very welcome at the place The location is perfect for checking out the Korean town in Tokyo and especially if you want to check out the nightlife in Tokyo The place is cute decorated with good taste and thanks to the nice common room and rooftop terrace its absolutely no problem that the rooms are small

My best friend and I really enjoyed our stay with Min and Haru They are very kind and accommodating hosts We liked the last night a lot when the house got together and ate on the roof it was fun getting to know people from different places They had a lot of amenities there that we didnt think we needed but ended up using like when we borrowed the umbrellas to go out They had tea and towels and laundry you could use as well which was nice it was very clean and everyone was super nice
